T11arhebt2u:829: na ca nityasvabhāvatāmābibhrāṇena nīlavikalpasya viṣayeṇa nīlasādhyānyā vārthakriyā kriyate /
T11arhebt2u:833: iti jñāne pratibhasamānaṃ sāmānyaṃ na kāñcidarthakriyāmupakalpayatīti prasādhya anarthakriyākāriviṣayasyāpi
T11arhebt2u:835: iti pramāṇalakṣaṇe mīmāṃsakairviśeṣaṇamupādeyamiti darśayannāha- “tasmād” yata evamanarthakriyāsādhanaviṣayatayā
T11arhebt2u:841: anena hi viśeṣaṇenānumānavikalpasya ca prāmāṇyaṃ sidhyati,
T11arhebt2u:842: ālocanājñānapṛṣṭhabhāvinaśca vikalpasya prāmāṇyaṃ vyudasyata iti sarvaṃ sustham /
T11arhebt2u:854: yataśca kāryataḥ tadviṣayatvāt smṛtirevāto “na pramāṇam” darśanabalotpanno vikalpaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:858: tacca vidhivikalpe 'pi samānamiti kathamasau smṛtirna syāditi /
T11arhebt2u:861: tathā hi- yadevānagnivyāvṛttaṃ vastumātraṃ mahānasādāvanubhūtamāsīt tadeva pradeśaviśeṣe dhūmadarśanāt smaryate /
T11arhebt2u:863: evammanyate- yat mahānasādāvanagnivyāvṛttaṃ vastumātraṃ prāganubhūtaṃ na tat taddeśādisambandhitayaivānumānavikalpena
T11arhebt2u:864: smaryate kintu yatra pradeśe prāgananubhūtaṃ tatsambandhitayā /
T11arhebt2u:871: pramāṇaṃ tu kasmānna bhavatīti ced āha- “vastvadhiṣṭhānatvāt” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:876: tatrāpi pradhānādivikalpasyaiva bhāvānupādānatayā sādhyatvāt tasyā api vastvadhiṣṭhānatāstyevetyadoṣaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:878: ityāha- “arthakriyāyāṃ” sukhaduḥkhalakṣaṇāyāṃ yad “yogyaṃ” śaktaṃ “tadviṣayatvāt tadarthinām” arthakriyārthināṃ “pravṛtteḥ” prāptityāgalakṣaṇāyāḥ
T11arhebt2u:879: yadi nāmarthakriyāyogye tadarthināṃ pravṛttistathāpi kathaṃ vastvadhiṣṭhānā pramāṇavyavasthā?
T11arhebt2u:880: , arthakriyāyogyādhiṣṭhānā hi tathā sati syāt iti cet;
T11arhebt2u:882: tato 'rthakriyāyogyādhiṣṭhānatvena vastvadhiṣṭhānatvaṃ kathaṃ na syāt iti bhāvaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:883: idaṃ ca vastvāśrayeṇa pramāṇavyavasthāpratipādanamanadhigate svalakṣaṇa ityukte kadācit paro brūyāt- vastumātranibandhanā hi pramāṇavyavasthā na svalakṣaṇāśrayaiva /
T11arhebt2u:888: tathā ca vastuviṣayamapi prāmāṇyaṃ bruvatā svalakṣaṇaviṣayamevoktaṃ bhavati,
T11arhebt2u:892: “tato 'pi” yathoktād vikalpād na kevalaṃ nīlasvalakṣaṇānubhavād “vastunyeva” svalakṣaṇa
T11arhebt2u:894: pravṛtte” adhigate svalakṣaṇe tatsāmarthyajanmā vikalpo na pramāṇamiti sambandhaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:899: yadi nāma tadadhyavasāyena vastunyeva puruṣasya pravṛttistathāpyanadhigatasāmānyagrāhiṇo 'sya darśanāt pṛthak prāmāṇyaṃ kimiti neṣyate?
T11arhebt2u:900: iti cet; āha- “pravṛttau” svalakṣaṇa eva satyāṃ “pratyakṣeṇa” ālocanājñānākhyena “abhinnayogakṣematvāt” /
T11arhebt2u:905: abhinnaḥ kṣema ālocanāvijñānādiva vikalpādapi svalakṣaṇa eva pravṛtteḥ /
T11arhebt2u:906: ayamasyābhiprāyaḥ- yadi vikalpo nirvikalpacetasaḥ prameyāntaraviṣayastadā tatraiva puruṣaṃ pravartayatu tatsādhyāmarthakriyāmadhigantum /
T11arhebt2u:908: tadviṣayatvābhimatasya sāmānyasyābhinnajñānalakṣaṇāyā evārthakriyāyā upagamād vikalpodayādeva ca tatsiddheḥ /
T11arhebt2u:909: nahi nīlānubhavāt prameyāntaraviṣayāḥ pītādipratyayāḥ puruṣaṃ nīlavastuni pravartayanti,
T11arhebt2u:915: iti / tato nīladarśanasyaiva nirvikalpasya prāmāṇyaṃ yuktam,
T11arhebt2u:916: na tadabhinnopayogasya smṛteriva vikalpasyāpi darśanāt pṛthageva /
T11arhebt2u:917: anyathā niṣphalāṃ pramāṇāntarakalpanāṃ kurvataḥ smṛticchādveṣaprayatnādi pramāṇamanuṣajyata iti pramāṇānāmiyattā viśīryeteti /
T11arhebt2u:921: na caivam, ato 'nekānta iti pramāṇasaṃplavavādī darśayannāha- “pūrvapratyakṣakṣaṇena” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:931: yadā kṣaṇaviśeṣasādhye 'rthe hitāhitalakṣaṇe vāñchā prāptiparihārecchā yogināṃ paropakāramuddiśya bhavati kasyacit kathañcit kvacidupayogāt tadā /
T11arhebt2u:932: yathā darśanamārge duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntirddamānāmanuśayānāṃ vāsanāṃ nirodhayati,
T11arhebt2u:936: tat eṣāṃ grāhakāṇi paracittajñānāni pṛthageva pramāṇāni /
T11arhebt2u:938: bhagavatāṃ kaścidevārthakṣaṇaḥ kasyacideva parārthasyānugrāhako biabandhako veti
T11arhebt2u:939: sarvabhāvān pratikṣaṇaṃ vīkṣamāṇānāmadhyakṣacetasāṃ tadviṣayakṣaṇānāṃ bhinnārthakriyāsūpayogato nānāyogakṣematvāt /
T11arhebt2u:940: tad yadi pratikṣaṇaṃ kṣaṇavivekadarśino 'dhikṛtyocyate tadā bhinnopayogitayā pṛthak prāmāṇyāt nānekāntaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:941: atha sarvapadārtheṣvekatvādhyavasāyinaḥ sāṃvyavahārikān puruṣānabhipretyocyate tadā sakalameva (Hbṭ 38)
T11arhebt2u:942: nīlasantānamekamarthaṃ sthirarūpaṃ tatsādhyāṃ cārthakriyāmekātmikāmadhyavasyantīti prāmāṇyamapyuttareṣāmaniṣṭameveti kuto 'nekāntaḥ?
T11arhebt2u:946: rañjanādikaṃ nīlādikakārtyaṃ tatra “na teṣām” uktareṣāṃ jñānakṣaṇānāṃ “sāmarthya”
T11arhebt2u:948: pūrvapratyakṣakṣaṇaviṣaya eva tebhyo 'pi pravṛtterādyasyaiva tatra prāmāṇyam /
T11arhebt2u:949: tathā hi- arthakriyārthināṃ tatsādhanaprāpaṇasamarthe jñāne pramāṇavyavahāraṃ kurvatāmaviklavadhiyāmarthakriyāsādhanabhedādeva
T11arhebt2u:950: prāmāṇyabhedavyavahāro jñāneṣu yuktaḥ anyathā smṛtyāderapi prāmāṇyaprasaṅgaḥ kathamapākriyeta?
T11arhebt2u:951: , ādriyeta vā niṣphalā pramāṇavyavasthā prekṣāvatā iti? /
T11arhebt2u:953: ityāha- “aparāpare” ca te “dhūmā“śca taiḥ “pramitā“śca te “sannikṛṣṭāgraya“śca teṣviva
T11arhebt2u:955: yathā prāmāṇyabhedo na yukto viduṣāṃ tathātrāpi /
T11arhebt2u:956: yadā tu pañcatapastaptukāmo bhavati tadāparāparadhūmapramitasannikṛṣṭāgniviṣayāṇāmapyanumānānāṃ sāmarthyabhedāt prāmāṇyamanivāritameva /
T11arhebt2u:959: '; ityudāharaṇe nīlavikalpasya prāmāṇyaṃ nirākṛtya prakṛte yojayannāha- “etena” nīlasvalakṣaṇadarśanottarakālabhāvino nīlavikalpasya prāmāṇyanirākaraṇena
T11arhebt2u:970: pūrvakameva svalakṣaṇaviṣayaṃ darśanaṃ yat pareṇālocanājñānamiti vyavahṛta tat pramāṇaṃ
T11arhebt2u:971: na tu tadvalabhāvī vikalpo yathoktena nyāyeneti sthitametat- “pakṣadharmasya sādhyadharmiṇi
T11arhebt2u:973: tadevaṃ pratyakṣataḥ pakṣadharmaniścayaṃ bruvatā prasaṅgena darśanapṛṣṭhabhāvino vikalpasya prāmāṇyanirākaraṇāt
T11arhebt2u:981: kasmād? yataḥ pakṣadharma eva tadaṃśena vyāpta eva ca hetuḥ kāraṇaṃ tasyāḥ,
T11arhebt2u:982: nānya ityabhidhānāt parokṣārthaviṣayaṃ sarvaṃ pramāṇamanumāne 'ntarbhāvitamiti saṅkṣepataḥ saṅkhayāvipratipattiḥ samyagjñānaviṣayā nirastā /
T11arhebt2u:983: tathā, vyāpakāṃśasya gamyatvapratīteḥ tadaṃśavyāptivacanena sāmānyaviṣayamanumānaṃ na svalakṣaṇaviṣayamityākhyātam tasyāsādhāraṇatvāt,
T11arhebt2u:989: tathā, tasya dvidhā prayoga iti vakṣyamāṇatvāt parārthānumānaṃ kathayiṣyate,
T11arhebt2u:994: tatā hi- pradhānapuruṣārthopayoginastattvasya caturāryasatyalakṣaṇasyānumānata eva niścayāt tasya prādhānyam /
T11arhebt2u:999: anubhūyamānaphalaṃ vā dṛśyamānaṃ tatpravṛttiviṣayo nispannatvāt phalasya /
T11arhebt2u:1000: tasmād yadanāgataphalaṃ sukhaduḥkhasādhanaṃ pratyakṣamapi tatrāpyanumānameva pravartakam /
T11arhebt2u:1001: na hi tasyānāgate sukhaduḥkhe prati yogyatāṃ pratyakṣaṃ nirddhārayati,
T11arhebt2u:1003: taduktam- ” na hyapratyakṣe kārye kāraṇabhāvagatiḥ” iti /
T11arhebt2u:1004: tasmāt pūrvānubhūtasukhaduḥkhasādhanasādharmyāt pratyakṣaviṣayasyāpi vastuno 'nāgataphalayogyatāniścayaḥ na pratyakṣataḥ /
T11arhebt2u:1009: phalamanāgataṃ prati yogyatāyā anumānata ityubhayorapi pravartakatvam /
T11arhebt2u:1010: samyagjñānapūrvakatvaṃ ca hitāhitaprāptiparihārayoraktam na tvanāgataphalaṃ prati yogyatāyāḥ pratyakṣato 'niścayāt /
T11arhebt2u:1016: anvayavyatirekaniścayasya tu bhinnopāyasādhyatayā bhedenaiva nirddeśaḥ kārya iti
T11arhebt2u:1018: 'pi” na kevalaṃ pakṣadharmaniścaya uktaḥ kintvanvayaniścayo 'pi “svabhāvahetau” ucyata iti śeṣaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:1019: “sādhanadharma” sya yad “bhāvamātraṃ” sattāmātraṃ mugdarādinimittantarānapekṣaṃ tasya “anubandho” anugamanaṃ vyāptiḥ tasya “siddhiḥ” yā sa svabhāvahetāvanvayaniścayaḥ
T11arhebt2u:1022: yatra yatra sādhanadharmasya bhāvaḥ tatra tatra sādhyadharmasyāpi nimittāntarānapekṣo bhava ityetasyārthasya siddhiḥ svabhāvahetāvanvayaniścayaḥ
T11arhebt2u:1024: ? “tadbhāvatayā” sa sādhanadharmo bhāvaḥ- svabhāvo yasya tasya bhāvatayā tadbhāvatayā /
T11arhebt2u:1025: yo hi sādhanadharmaḥ sādhyadharmasya svabhāvaḥ sa kathaṃ taṃ nānubadhnīyāt,
T11arhebt2u:1030: sādhyasādhanasaṃkalpakāle tu paramparayā tattadvayāvṛttapadārthanibandhanāyāṃ kalpanābuddhau bhedena pratibhāsanāt sādhyasādhanabhāvo na vihanyate
T11arhebt2u:1031: na hyasau pāramārthikaṃ sādhyasādhanadharmayorddharmiṇaśca kṛtakatvādau bhedamavalambate,
T11arhebt2u:1033: ekārthasamavāyaḥ kṛtakatvānityatvādeḥ sambandhaḥ iti cet; na,
T11arhebt2u:1038: samavāyād vṛttikalpanāyāṃ ca kṛtakatvādayo nityābhimateṣvapyātmādiṣu varteran /
T11arhebt2u:1039: ya eva hi kṛtakatvādeḥ śabde samavāyo yabdalāt tatraiva tad vartate sa eva nityābhimateṣvapi,
T11arhebt2u:1040: tasyaikatvenopagatatvāt ityātmādau vṛttiḥ kṛtakatvādeḥ kena nivāryeta? /
T11arhebt2u:1041: atha 'ya evābhūtvā bhavanadharmā bhūtvā cābhavanadharmāsthirarūpo bhāvaḥ tatraiva kṛtakatvādayo dharmā vartante ';
T11arhebt2u:1043: saiva tarhyabhūtvā bhavanasvabhāvatā bhūtasya cāsthirasvabhāvatā tadviparītarūpasamāropavyavacchedaviṣayāyāḥ kalpanābuddhernibandhanaṃ kiṃ neṣyate?
T11arhebt2u:1044: tayaiva paramārthābhedavatorddharmayoḥ sādhyadharmiṇi vṛtteḥ kimantarālagaḍunā kṛtakatvādinā vyatirekavatā upagatena? /
T11arhebt2u:1045: tathā hi- na sattāmātreṇa kṛtakatvādayo dharmāḥ sādhyadharmapratipattinibandhanam,
T11arhebt2u:1048: sa ca vikalpaḥ svapratibhāsinamevakāraṃ bahīrūpatayādhyavasitamanusaran kṛtakānityādirūpatāṃ vastunaḥ pratipadyate,
T11arhebt2u:1052: tad varaṃ yadeva tatkalpanānnibandhanaṃ tadeva tathāvidhavikalpaprasavanimittamastu,
T11arhebt2u:1054: tadabhyupagame ca caritārthā vyatirekavanto dharmā ityalaṃ tatkalpanayā /
T11arhebt2u:1055: avaśyaṃ ca vyatiriktānityatādvāreṇāpi vastuna evānavasthāyinamātmānaṃ pratipadyate,
T11arhebt2u:1058: anyathā vyatiriktānityatayā nityatvāt tadavagamārthitvenāyamanityasādhyārthakriyārthī nityaṃ śabdādikamāśaṅkamānaḥ kimanityatāvicāraṃ prati āhītāsthaḥ? /
T11arhebt2u:1068: asmākaṃ tu kathañcid bhedābhedavatāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tatsvabhāvatayā naiṣa doṣaḥ'; iti;
T11arhebt2u:1074: tato 'pi tayoḥ kathañcid bhedābhedau sta eveti cet; na,
T11arhebt2u:1076: tathā hi- dharmayostadekasvabhāvādapi bhedavatostena svabhāvena kathañcidabhedanimittamabhinno 'paraḥ svabhāvo 'bhyupagantavyaḥ,
T11arhebt2u:1078: na ca kalpanābuddhāvanantobhayarūpasvabhāvaparamparā pratibhāsata iti kimiti tatkalpanayātmānaṃ vipralabhante bhavantaḥ? /
T11arhebt2u:1079: kathañcit ca bhedopagamāt kathaṃ bhedapakṣabhāvināṃ doṣāṇāmanavasaraḥ? /
T11arhebt2u:1083: iti vyavasthāpyate yadi tena bhedastadā bheda eveti kuto 'nekāntavādaḥ? /
T11arhebt2u:1091: tasmāt tattatpararūpavyāvṛttisamāśrayāyāṃ kalpanābuddhau bhedavatāmiva dharmadharmiṇāṃ pratibhāsanāt sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:1092: tanmātrānubandhastu vastutaḥ tattatsvabhāvatayaiva yuktaḥ iti manyamānena “vastutastadbhāvatayā” ityuktam /
T11arhebt2u:1095: kā punarasau vastutastadbhāvatā yayā hetubhūtayā sādhyadharmasya sādhanadharmabhāvamātrānubandhaḥ sidhyati?
T11arhebt2u:1100: tasya yā “vṛtti” pravṛttiḥ “bādhakapramāṇavṛttiḥ” tatsādhyatvācca vastutastadbhāvatāyāḥ sā bādhakapramāṇavṛttiruktā /
T11arhebt2u:1101: tasyāṃ hi satyāṃ vipakṣāt nivṛtto hetuḥ sādhyadharmavatyeva dharmiṇi vartate iti sādhyadharmasyānarthāntarasya sādhanadharmasvabhāvatā sidhyati
T11arhebt2u:1109: sa ca vastutastadbhāvatayā sidhyatīti tatsiddhyupāyaṃ bādhakapramāṇavṛttiṃ darśayati-
T11arhebt2u:1110: “akṣaṇikatve” kṣaṇikaviparyaye sati “artha kriyāvirodhāt” arthasya- kāryasya kriyā-
T11arhebt2u:1111: niṣpattistasyā virodhāt “tallakṣaṇaṃ” sārthakriyā lakṣaṇaṃ yasya “vastutvasya” arthakriyāsāmarthyātmana,
T11arhebt2u:1117: tadanayā bādhakapramāṇavṛttyā sādhyadharmasya vastutaḥ sādhanadharmasvabhāvatā sidhyati /
T11arhebt2u:1121: evaṃ svabhāvahetau viparyaye bādhakapramāṇavṛttyā tādātmyasiddhito 'nvayaniścayaṃ pratipādya koryahetau pratipādapannāha- “kāryahetau” anvayaniścayaḥ iti prakṛtam /
T11arhebt2u:1129: na ca kevalaṃ pratyakṣaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvamasandigdhaṃ sādhayati,
T11arhebt2u:1132: ṣūpalambhapratyayeṣu dṛśyātmakaṃ sat nopalabdhaṃ bhavati agnyādisāmagrīsannidhānāt prāk tādātmyādisāmagryāmupalabhyamānāyāmupalabhyamānaṃ tatkāryaṃ sidhyati /
T11arhebt2u:1141: na cāgnīndhanādibhāve niyatasannidheradṛśyātmanaḥ kutaścit dhūmasya bhāvaḥ syāt ityāśaṅkanīyam /
T11arhebt2u:1146: pratibandhe vā tatkāryatā tatkāraṇatā vā syāt /
T11arhebt2u:1156: tadanvayavyatirekānuvidhānādeva ca dhūmasya tat kāraṇaṃ kalpeta /
T11arhebt2u:1158: tadapi tatra kāraṇamastu iti cet; na,
T11arhebt2u:1164: yato dhūmadarśanāt tanniścayena pravṛttau tadvisaṃvādaḥ syāt /
T11arhebt2u:1165: nahi sarvasattvakarmādhipatyajanitatve 'pi jagadvaicitryasya dṛṣṭakāraṇahānitastatkāryadarśanād vā pravṛttānāṃ atatprāptirityalamatiprasaṅgena
T11arhebt2u:1166: kiṃrūpaḥ punarasau kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'nupalambhasahāyapratyakṣanibandhana ityāha- “tadbhāve bhāvaḥ tadabhāve 'bhāvaśca” iti /
T11arhebt2u:1167: ya eva hi kāraṇābhimatasya bhāve bhāva eva /
T11arhebt2u:1171: sa hi tābhyāmanyo bhavan svabhāvato 'pratipannakāryakāraṇarūpayorvā bhaved,
T11arhebt2u:1178: yato nānyayogasteṣāṃ pūrvarūpaṃ nāśayati vināśahetvayogād vakṣyamāṇakāt /
T11arhebt2u:1180: nahi teṣu niṣpanneṣvaniṣpanno bhinnahetuko vā tatsvabhāvo yuktaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:1181: ayaṃ hi bhedo bhedaheturvā viruddhadharmādhyāsaḥ kāraṇa bhedaśca tataścet na bhedaḥ,
T11arhebt2u:1182: anyanimittābhāvāt ekaṃ dravyaṃ viśvaṃ syāt ityādi prasajyeta /
T11arhebt2u:1184: tataśca pūrvake vastunī tadavasthe eveti na tayoranyayoge 'pi kāryakāraṇarūpatāpattiḥ /
T11arhebt2u:1186: tadā svabhāvata eva tayoḥ kāryakāraṇarūpatvādanyastadbhāvaḥ kathaṃ na vaiyarthyamanubhavet? /
T11arhebt2u:1191: nahi tad arthāntaraṃ svasattāmātreṇa tabduddhī pravartayati /
T11arhebt2u:1196: na hi yannimito yo 'nyatrātabduddhibhāji tabdyavasāyaḥ sa tadanupalakṣaṇe yuktaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:1202: (Hbṭ 48) niruddhayoradhyāhṛtya tatpratyayakalpanāyāṃ ca kalpitaviṣaya eva kāryakāraṇatādhyavasāyaḥ syāt na vastuviṣayaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:1208: yadā ca kāraṇena janyate tadā kiṃ svakāryasahito janyate,
T11arhebt2u:1212: yadi svakāryasahitastudubhayoranyata eva bhāvāt parasparamasambandha iti kāryasambandhitāsya hīyeta /

T11arhebt2u:2368: eveti na tatrapareṣāṃ bhāvaḥ saṅgacchata iti cedāha- “svahetoḥ” kṣitibījasalilādisāmagrīlakṣaṇasya
T11arhebt2u:2370: tataḥ “upanidhiḥ” kāryadeśe sannidhānaṃ “dharmo” yeṣāṃ te “tathābhavantaḥ” kāryadeśe sannidhīyamānāḥ “nopālambhamarhanti“- '
T11arhebt2u:2373: na hi tadaparasannidhimantareṇa tatraikasyāpi bhāva upapadyate /
T11arhebt2u:2377: tataśca pratikṣaṇamupadhīyamānātiśayasyotpādāt kevalānāṃ ca tajjananasvabhāvavaikalyāt tadaparapratyayayogajanyasvabhāvatvāt samarthajanakasya hetoḥ /
T11arhebt2u:2379: tasmād yatsāmagrījanyasvabhāvo yo bhāvaḥ sa tatraikābhāve 'pi kāraṇavaikalyānna sambhavatītyekasāmagrījanmanāṃ sahabhāvo niyataḥ /
T11arhebt2u:2380: sarveṣāṃ teṣāṃ bhāva eva kāryasya bhāvāt sarva eva janayantīti '
T11arhebt2u:2397: tau cānvayavyatirekāvekatraiva kārye dṛśyete nāparāparatreti tasyaivaikasya janane samarthā gamyanta iti nāparaparajananam /
T11arhebt2u:2398: te tu yadavasthā janayanto dṛśyante- kiṃ tajjananasvabhāvāstadaiva?
T11arhebt2u:2401: tatra prāgapi tatsvabhāvatve paścādiva prāgapi janaprasaṅga iti pratikṣaṇaṃ bheda ucyata iti /
T11arhebt2u:2406: bahūni bhinnasvabhāvāni kāraṇāni kāryaṃ tvekamabhinnasvabhāvamiti “na kāraṇabhedāt kāryabhedaḥ syāt” /
T11arhebt2u:2407: tataścakṣurādayo na bhinnenātmanaikasya kāryasya janakā eṣṭavyāḥ /
T11arhebt2u:2408: kintvabhinnameṣāmekakāryajanakaṃ sāmānyabhūtaṃ rūpamupeyaṃ yenābhinnaṃ kāryaṃ janayanti /
T11arhebt2u:2409: tacca samagrāvasthāyāmeva tatkāryaṃ janayati na vyagrāvasthāyām /
T11arhebt2u:2415: tato yadasya samagreṣu cakṣurādiṣu janakaṃ rūpaṃ tadekaikābhāve 'pi vidyate na ca janayatīti '
T11arhebt2u:2421: evaṃ manyate- kiṃ punaridaṃ kāraṇamabhimataṃ bhavataḥ? /
T11arhebt2u:2426: nanu tadavasthāyāṃ pratyekameva sāmagrīśabdavācyānāṃ jananasvabhāvatvābhyupagamāt pratyekameva cakṣurādikaṃ kāraṇam /
T11arhebt2u:2427: yadyevaṃ ko 'yaṃ niyamo yadanekasmād bhavatānekena bhavitavyam viparyaye bādhakapramāṇābhāvāt,
T11arhebt2u:2428: ekenaiva tat kāryaṃ kartavyamiti ca na niyamakāraṇamutpaśyāmaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:2432: taduktam- “tasyaiveikasya janane samarthāḥ nānyasya iti nāparāparajananam” iti /
T11arhebt2u:2437: taccānekabhāva eva bhāvāt tatkāryamucyate tasya kuto 'nekatāprasaṅgaḥ? /
T11arhebt2u:2438: yattvabhinnaṃ rūpaṃ janakamucyate tasyaikasthitāvapi bhāvāt tatkāryajananasvabhāvācca tataḥ kāryaprasavaprasaṅgaḥ,
T11arhebt2u:2439: tadanyasannidhau tasya viśeṣābhāvāt tadāpi vāna janayet /
T11arhebt2u:2440: tasmād yeṣuṃ bhāvābhāvavatsu kāryaṃ bhāvābhāvavad dṛṣṭaṃ ta eva viśeṣā janakā iti kuto 'nekāntaḥ? /
T11arhebt2u:2444: “yathāsvaṃ” yasyāḥ sāmagryāḥya ātmīyaḥ svabhāvastadbhedena “tadviśeṣopayogataḥ” tasya- vijñānalakṣaṇasya kāryasya,
T11arhebt2u:2446: teṣūpayogataḥ tadupayogaiḥ bhinnasāmagrīvyāpāraiḥ kāryāḥ ye svabhāvaviśeṣāḥ- kāryāṇāṃviśiṣṭāḥ svabhāvāḥ teṣāmasaṅkarātparasparavyāvṛttarūpatvāt
T11arhebt2u:2447: sāmagrībhedād bhinnarūpataiva kāryāṇāmiti kathanna kāraṇabhedād kāryabhedaḥ syāt? /
T11arhebt2u:2455: nanu yadā viṣayendriyamanaskārebhyo vijñānasambhavaḥ tadā teṣāmupayogaviṣayasyaikatvāt kathamasāṅkaryam? /
T11arhebt2u:2460: kiṃ nu vai samagrāṇāmanyānyakāryajananena janakatvam yatastadabhāve tanna syāt /
T11arhebt2u:2461: janakatvaṃ hyeṣāṃ tadbhāva eva kasyacid bhāvāt /
T11arhebt2u:2464: nanvekasyāḥ sāmagryā anekasya bhāve sāmagryantarajanyebhyo bhavatu bhedaḥ,
T11arhebt2u:2467: tatra yadā cakṣūrūpamanaskārebhyo vijñānajanma tadā cakṣūrūpakṣaṇayorapi bhāvād vijñānenābhinnahetujatvāt tayorvijñānātmatā,
T11arhebt2u:2468: vijñānasya vā tadrūpatā kathaṃ na prasajyeta? / āha ca-
T11arhebt2u:2477: anyādaśī ca vijñānāderiti tadvailakṣaṇyādeva kāryāṇāṃ vailakṣaṇyam /
T11arhebt2u:2478: syādetat- sarveṣāmanvayavyatirekāvanuvidhīyete tadā cakṣurādikṣaṇairiti kuto 'yaṃ bhedaḥ- ihopādānabhāve bheda(bhāveneda)
T11arhebt2u:2486: niyamena ca vijñānamātrabhāve samanantarapratyayasya vyāpāro na cakṣurādeḥ /
T11arhebt2u:2487: cakṣuḥkṣaṇāntarodaye ca pūrvabhāvinaścakṣuṣo na svavijñānayogyatāhetoḥ samanantarapratyayasya /
T11arhebt2u:2490: pratyayanibandhanatayā svasantatipatitakāryaprasūtinimittaṃ tad upādānakāraṇaṃ yat santānāntare prāgavasthāpekṣaviśeṣodayanibandhanaṃ tat sahakārikāraṇam
T11arhebt2u:2491: sā ceyaṃ bhāvānāṃ svahetuparamparayātā prakṛtiryayā kiñcit kāryaṃ svasantānavyavasthānibandhanaṃ
T11arhebt2u:2492: janayantyaparaṃ ca santānāntaravyapadeśanibandhanamiti tasyā eva sāmagryā avāntaraviśeṣakṛtatvāccakṣūrūpavijñānakṣaṇānāṃ
T11arhebt2u:2498: na ca tadabhyupagamyata iti na kācit kṣatiḥ /
T11arhebt2u:2499: atha sāmagrīlakṣaṇasya kāraṇasya bhedaḥ sāmagryantarād vailakṣaṇyaṃ kāryasyāpi bhedo 'tatkāraṇebhyo bhinnasvabhāvatocyate /
T11arhebt2u:2500: tadā tasyeha bhāvāt kathaṃ na kāraṇabhedāt kāryabhedaḥ syāt?
T11arhebt2u:2505: ubhayaṃ caitat kāryeṣu pramāṇaparidṛṣṭamiti darśayannāha- “yathā” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:2506: mṛtpiṇḍādibhyo hi bhavato ghaṭasya na kāraṇānekatve 'pyanekarūpatā /
T11arhebt2u:2508: tatra sāmagryantarajanyāt tāvad bhedaṃ darśayati- “mṛtpiṇḍāt” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:2510: vyagrasvabhāvāni kāraṇāntarasahitāni iṣṭakādilakṣaṇāni tadanyajanyebhyo 'bhinnasvabhāvāni yāni kāryāṇi sādhayanti tebhyo vilakṣaṇameva samagrāṇi ghaṭātmakaṃ kāryaṃ janayanti /
T11arhebt2u:2511: tathā hi- kulālādinirapekṣo mṛtpiṇḍaḥ tadanyajanyād vṛkṣādervilakṣaṇamevopādānabhāvena mṛdātmakaṃ kāryaṃ janayan dṛṣṭaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:2514: evaṃ kulālādikamapi tadanyopādānasahitaṃ sahakāribhāvena yatkāryaṃ karoti tadvilakṣaṇameva mṛtpiṇḍasahitaṃ tatkāraṇāhitaviśeṣaṃ ghaṭātmakaṃ kāryaṃ janayatīti samudāyārthaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:2515: tatra mṛtpiṇḍād bhinnaḥ svabhāvo ghaṭasya ye tadanyopadānakāraṇatayā mṛtsvabhāvā na bhavanti vṛkṣādayastebhyo bhavati /
T11arhebt2u:2518: tadanyebhyo yeṣāṃ mṛtpiṇḍastadanyanimittasahita upādānamiṣṭakādīnāṃ tebhyo bhinnaḥ svabhāvo bhavati /
T11arhebt2u:2522: ghaṭaḥ tadanyasmādekaikakāryād dvidvikāryācca bhinnasvabhāva eva jāyata iti sāmagrībhedād
T11arhebt2u:2523: bhinnānyeva kāryāṇi parasparamasaṅkīrṇasvabhāvāni bhavantīti tadupayogakāryaviśeṣāsaṅkaraḥ siddhaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:2531: kāryāṇi bhavanti “tat” tasmāt “evam” uktena prakāreṇa kulālāt mṛtpiṇḍarahitādanyasāmagryantarbhūtāt
T11arhebt2u:2534: na mṛdaḥ kevalāyāḥ tatsāmagrībahirbhūtāyāḥ saṃsthānaviśeṣaḥ kulālopādānopakṛtāyā eva mṛtsaṃsthānaviśeṣātmakakāryahetutvāt /
T11arhebt2u:2536: tadevaṃ sāmagrībhedād bhedaṃ kāryasyodāharaṇe pratipādya sahakāriṇāmanekatve 'pyanekātmatāvirahaṃ
T11arhebt2u:2537: pratipādayannāha- “na ca tayoḥ” mṛtkulālayoḥ sahitayoḥ parasparopādānopakṛtātmanoḥ
T11arhebt2u:2538: yaḥ śaktiviśeṣaḥ pratyayāntarasahitāvasthāto viśiṣṭā yogyatā tadviṣayasya tadanyāvasthāviṣayād
T11arhebt2u:2542: tābhyāṃ janito yo viśeṣo mṛtsaṃsthānaviśeṣātmakaḥ sa eva tadanyasāmagrījanyād bhidyata iti bhedo asya /
T11arhebt2u:2548: parasparātmatāviraheṇa kāraṇena saṃsthānaviśeṣeṇa mṛt na pratibhāseta,
T11arhebt2u:2551: na hi yo yasya svabhāvo na bhavati sa tenātmanā svagrāhiṇi jñāne pratibhāsate,
T11arhebt2u:2555: tasmāt mṛtsaṃsthānayorekātmataiveti na kāraṇānekatvāt kāryasyānekātmakatā aikāntikī,
T11arhebt2u:2556: yato bhinnasvabhāvebhyaścakṣurādibhyaḥ sahakāribhyaḥ ekakāryotpattivirodhādekarūpatayā teṣāṃ sādhāraṇaikakāryakriyā,
T11arhebt2u:2560: ca kāryāntarasyāpi yathā ekapratyayajanitaṃ kiñcidekaṃ nāsti tathā'nekapratyayajanitamapīti
T11arhebt2u:2565: nanu ca mṛtsaṃsthānaviśeṣayorekasvabhāvatve 'pyahrīkādibhiḥ saṅkhayādibhedād bheda iṣyate tatkathamanekapratyayajanitasyaikatve etadudāharaṇam syāt? /
T11arhebt2u:2566: sarvatraiva hi dravyaparyāyayoḥ saṅkhayāsaṃjñālakṣaṇakāryabhedād bhedo deśakālasvabhāvābhedāccābheda iṣyate,
T11arhebt2u:2568: tathā hi- eko ghaṭaḥ rūpādayo bahava iti saṅkhyābhedaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:2575: evaṃ sarvatra dravyaparyāyoḥ saṅkhayādibhirbhedaḥ deśādibhistvabheda iti mṛtsaṃsthānayoḥ kathañcit bhedāt mṛtkulālābhyāṃ janitasya kāryasyānekatāstyeva
T11arhebt2u:2576: yathā tvekatā tathā tābhyāṃ tasya abhinnātmajanyataiveti yadanekakāraṇaṃ tadanekameva,
T11arhebt2u:2577: yat punarekaṃ tat sahakāriṇāmabhinnarūpajanyatayaikakāraṇameveti na vyabhicāra iti /
T11arhebt2u:2581: svabhāvato bhedopagame vāparasparātmatayā bhṛtsaṃsthānayoḥ saṃsthānamṛtsvabhavaviśeṣābhyāṃ tayorapratibhāsanaṃ durnivāram /
T11arhebt2u:2582: yadi hi svabhāvato na bhedo dharmadharmiṇoḥ,
T11arhebt2u:2584: na hi pararūpāḥ bhidyamānā api saṅkhayādaya ātmabhūtamabhedaṃ bādhituṃ samarthāḥ /
T11arhebt2u:2588: na ca bahuvacanasya niyamenādarśanād rūpādayo 'tra nimittam,
T11arhebt2u:2589: rūpādinimittatve hi guruḥ iti na kadācidekavacanaṃ syāt /
T11arhebt2u:2590: sambhavi dharmirūpamātramabhidheyatvena vivakṣitam iti cet / na /
T11arhebt2u:2592: brīhaya iti ca jātivacane dharmiṇo rūpādīnāṃ cānabhidhānāt na kiñciduttaram /
T11arhebt2u:2593: ubhayarūpasya ca vastuno guruśabdavācyatvāt kathaṃ sambhavino dharmirūpasyaikatvena vivakṣā? /
T11arhebt2u:2601: atrāpi indanāt śakanāt dāraṇācca śaktibhedo gamyata iti cet / na /
T11arhebt2u:2603: na hi śaktireva indati śankoti dārayati ca /
T11arhebt2u:2609: yeṣāṃ ca paryāyāṇāṃ na kācidarthānugamamātrā tatra kiṃ vaktavyam? /
T11arhebt2u:2612: tathā hi- na kūṭasthanityatayā nityaṃ dravyamahrīkairiṣyate, (Hbṭ 100)
T11arhebt2u:2616: paryāyā eva paryāyarūpeṇa nirudhyante na tu dravyamiti nityamabhyupagamyate /
T11arhebt2u:2617: na ceyaṃ kūṭasthanityatā vā dravye sambhavati,
T11arhebt2u:2625: tatra pūrvaṃ bhavati bhedanivandhanam yadīha sambhavet /
T11arhebt2u:2629: paṭādayo 'pi hi vibhaktapariṇāmā anekaṃ kāryaṃ kurvanto dṛṣṭāḥ /
T11arhebt2u:2633: yata ekasya kāraṇātmanaḥ ekakāryarūpatopagame tadanyarūpābhāvāt tadanyakāryātmatopagatirna syāt /
T11arhebt2u:2634: kintvapūrvameva kasyacid bhāve prāgavidyamānaṃ bhavat tatkāryam /
T11arhebt2u:2635: tatra viṣayendriyamanaskārāṇāmitaretaropadānāhitarūpabhedānāṃ sannidhau viśiṣṭasvetarakṣaṇabhāve pratyekaṃ tadbhāvābhāvānuvidhānādanekakriyopagamo na virudhyate /
T11arhebt2u:2646: tathā hi- te tadavasthāyāṃ pratyekaṃ viśiṣṭasajātīyetarakṣaṇajananātmakāḥ,
T11arhebt2u:2648: tatra vijñānajananasvabhāvataiveti tasyājananasvabhāvatā vyavacchidyate tasyā eva pratiyogitvāt nānyajananasvabhāvatā /
T11arhebt2u:2651: na hi tadanyāpekṣayā viparyavyāvṛttimupādāyānekena śabdenābhidhīyamānaṃ vastu anekarūpatāṃ pratipadyate,
T11arhebt2u:2656: tannimittānāmekatra bhāvāt adoṣa iti cet / na /
T11arhebt2u:2668: ekasyānekakriyānabhyupagame ca yo 'yaṃ rūparasagandhasparśaviśeṣāṇāṃ kvacit sahabhāvaniyamaḥ pramāṇaparidṛṣṭaḥ sa na syāt /
T11arhebt2u:2673: anekenaikasvabhāvatāṃ cānubhavataḥ tadvadanekatāyā durnivāratvāt anyathā dharmadharmiṇāṃ kathaṃ (Hbṭ 102)
T11arhebt2u:2675: tathā hi- yamātmānaṃ purodhāyāyaṃ dharmī paryāyāścaite iti vyavasthāpyate,
T11arhebt2u:2678: na hi parasparopādānakṛtopakārānapekṣā viṣayendriyamanaskārāḥ sahaikakāryārambhiṇo yuktāḥ /
T11arhebt2u:2685: tataśca svasantānakṣaṇamitaropādānaṃ ca yugapadupakurvataḥ kathamekasyānekakāryatā na syāt? /
T11arhebt2u:2687: dravyaparyāyāṇāṃ caikasvabhāvatāmācakṣāṇa ekasyānekakāryatāṃ pratikṣipatīti kathaṃ nonmattaḥ?
T11arhebt2u:2690: ekasvabhāvatve ca dravyaparyāyāṇāṃ tatkāryabheda ekavastunibandhana eveti kāryabhedād bhedamabhidadhānaḥ sphuṭamahrīka evāyamityupekṣāmarhati
T11arhebt2u:2692: vaiśeṣiko 'pi dravyasyaikasya dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ samavāyikāraṇatāṃ bruvāṇaḥ karmaṇaścaikasya
T11arhebt2u:2702: tathā hi- deśakālayorabhede 'pi rūparasagandhasparśāḥ paryāyarūpeṇa bhidyante tataḥ kathamabhedasiddhiḥ? /
T11arhebt2u:2712: anuvṛttivyāvṛttyośca svabhāvatve lakṣaṇāt svabhāvasya bhedo vaktavyaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:2717: tataśca padārthadvayameva syāt na tvekaṃ dvirūpamiti /
T11arhebt2u:2723: kathaṃ tarhi sa eka ityucyate anekaḥ san? /
T11arhebt2u:2730: yogyatvācca viśvasya kṛtākṛtānāmekābhidhānābhidheyatvasya kvacidasambhavāt śaktibhedācca viṣayabhedaṃ brūvāṇaṃ prati abhihitam /
T11arhebt2u:2733: tathā hi- śaśāṅkodayaṃ bahavo nirīkṣante tasya kathamekatvamabhyupagatam? /
T11arhebt2u:2735: sarvathedaṃ na kathañcidapi saṅgacchate yaduta ekasya dvairūpyamiti /
T11arhebt2u:2736: vijñānaṃ tu nīlapraticchāyatayotpadyamānaṃ pītādipratibhāsavyavacchedena prativiśiṣṭaṃ khyāpyate,
T11arhebt2u:2737: na punarasya bhāvato dve rūpe staḥ /
T11arhebt2u:2738: atha punardravyaparyāyayoḥ sammūrcchitatvāt narasiṃhavadekaṃ śabalarūpatvāt dvīrūpamucyate /
T11arhebt2u:2742: te ca paramāṇavaḥ pratyekaṃ narasiṃharūpā na bhavanti,
T11arhebt2u:2745: jātyantaraṃ ca sa eva narasiṃhābhyāṃ syāt,
T11arhebt2u:2750: iti kevalamanekatve 'pi bahuṣvekakāryadarśanāt senādivadekavyavahāradarśanakṛto 'yaṃ viparyāso jaḍamatīnām /
T11arhebt2u:2753: tathā hi paryāyā abhinnadeśakālasvabhāvāśca paryāyarūpeṇa ca bhidyante pūrvoktācca dharmadharmiṇorniṣedhānnobhayavādasambhava iti /
T11arhebt2u:2783: bhinnaṃ paryāyarūpaṃ hi dravyarūpād bhaved yadi // 10 //
T11arhebt2u:2784: tadaitat syādabhede tu naitat saṃbadhyate vacaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:2790: svabhāvasyaiva bhedena kiṃ bhedaśca na kīrtitaḥ? /
T11arhebt2u:2791: na hi paścādbhavan bhedaḥ kāryāṇāṃ tasya bhedakaḥ // 14 //
T11arhebt2u:2793: ekāntena vibhinne ca te syātāṃ vastunī sa ca // 15 //
T11arhebt2u:2813: ekamiṣṭaṃ jananyā ca jāyāyāḥ kiṃ na caikatā? // 24 //
T11arhebt2u:2815: pratyekaṃ ye prasajyante dvayorbhāve kathaṃ na te? // 25 //
T11arhebt2u:2818: madhuraṃ na hi sarvaṃ syāt kaphaheturyathā madhu /
T11arhebt2u:2819: tīkṣṇaṃ vā pittajanakaṃ yathā māgadhikā matā // 27 //
T11arhebt2u:2820: pratyekaṃ yannidānaṃ yat svato miśraṃ tadātmakam /
T11arhebt2u:2825: ye bhedābheda mātre tu doṣāḥ sambhavinaḥ katham? /
T11arhebt2u:2826: tatsadbhāve 'pi te na syuriti brūyād vicakṣaṇaḥ // 30 //
T11arhebt2u:2829: bhāgā eva ca bhāsante sanniviṣṭāstathā tathā /
T11arhebt2u:2838: aspaṣṭarūpā gamyante śabdebhyo 'pi ta eva hi /
T11arhebt2u:2847: tayorapi bhaved bhedo yadi yenātmanā tayoḥ /
T11arhebt2u:2849: bheda eva tathā ca syānnaivekasya dvirūpatā /
T11arhebt2u:2853: tasya bhedo 'pi tābhyāṃ ced yadi yenātmanā ca te /
T11arhebt2u:2857: dharmitvaṃ tasya caivaṃ syāt tattantratvāt tadanyayoḥ /
T11arhebt2u:2858: na caivaṃ gamyate tena vādo 'yaṃ jālmakalpitaḥ // 45 //“
T11arhebt2u:2860: tadevaṃ mṛtsaṃsthānayorekasvabhāvatve na kathañcidbhedasambhava iti sahakāriṇāmanekatve 'pi na kāryasyānekatvamityatra bhavatyetadudāharaṇamiti
T11arhebt2u:2866: tena yadi mṛtpiṇḍasya mṛdātmatāyāṃ vyāpāraḥ kulālasya tatsaṃsthānaviśeṣe kathyate,
T11arhebt2u:2872: tatkāryakṣaṇasahakāriṇā mṛtpiṇḍena ca pratyekaṃ sakalameva mṛtsaṃsthānātmakaṃ kāryaṃ
T11arhebt2u:2875: yat tad ghaṭagataṃ saṃsthānaṃ “yadi tata” mṛdo “bhinnaṃ syāt” tadā kulālaḥ pṛthageva kimiti na karoti? /
T11arhebt2u:2877: kulālaścānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ tasya saṃsthānasya guṇātmanaḥ kāraṇatayā gamyata iti “sa pṛthagapi” tat “kuryāt” /
T11arhebt2u:2879: “dravyāśrayya'guṇavān saṃyogavibhāgeṣvakāraṇamanapekṣa” iti guṇalakṣaṇāt sarvadā guṇo dravyaparatantraḥ,
T11arhebt2u:2882: yadi svabhāvenaiva tasya guṇātmanaḥ saṃsthānasya “kriyāvad guṇavad” ityādivacanādādhārasvabhāvaṃ tat mṛddravyaṃ,
T11arhebt2u:2883: saṃsthānaṃ vā tathāvidhaṃ kapālādheyātmakaṃ tadā kimiti kulālavyāpāramapekṣate? /
T11arhebt2u:2888: yat tat mṛddravyaṃ pṛthubudhnodarādyākāraṃ ca saṃsthānaṃ tayoryaḥ sambandha ādhārādheyalakṣaṇaḥ
T11arhebt2u:2889: tatra yā “yogyatā” tāṃ “dvayamapyetat kulālād” yataḥ pratilabhate tasmāt “kulālamapekṣate”
T11arhebt2u:2890: kulālānapekṣāyāṃ doṣamāha- “anyathā” yadi tayoḥ parasparasambandhayogyatāyāṃ kulālāpekṣā
T11arhebt2u:2891: na syāt tadā svabhāvata eva mṛtpiṇḍasya tathavidhasaṃsthānasambandhayogyatvaṃ bhavet /
T11arhebt2u:2892: tasmiṃśca sati vastuna eva tatsaṃsthānasambandhayogyatālakṣaṇā dharmatāstīti kulālasannidheḥ prāgapi saṃsthānaviśeṣeṇa sambandhaḥ syāditi vaiśeṣikīyaścodyaparihāraḥ
T11arhebt2u:2896: yadi parasparasambandhayogyatāyāṃ kulālamapekṣate “evaṃ tarhi sā yogyatā mṛddravyasya kulālād bhavati iti” āpannam /
T11arhebt2u:2898: yadi hi syāt tadā yogyatāyāḥ dravyāt pṛthakkaraṇaṃ “prāgvat prasajyeta” /
T11arhebt2u:2899: atha yogyatāyā api yogyapāratantryādapṛthaksiddhiṃ brūyāt tadā tasyā api vastudharmatayaiva
T11arhebt2u:2900: prāgapi samāveśo mā bhūditi dravyeṇa saha sambandhayogyatāyā anya yogyatā kulālād bhavatītyeṣṭavyā /
T11arhebt2u:2902: pṛthakkaraṇaprasaṅge vā punaḥ sa eva parihāraḥ tadīyaḥ,
T11arhebt2u:2907: mṛtpiṇḍakulālabhyāṃ kapāladravyasya saṃyogaviśeṣasambandhayogyasyārambhāt yadaikasvabhāvatve 'pyekasyānekapratyayopādheyaviśeṣatā tadā siddhaḥ āsmākīnaḥ pakṣaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:2912: nirbandhagrahaṇena ca mṛtsaṃsthānayoraparasparātmatayā saṃsthānamṛtsvabhāvaviśeṣābhyāṃ tayorapratibhāsanaprasaṅgāt ityanayopapattyā sādhitamevānayorekatvam,
T11arhebt2u:2913: yuktyantarāṇāṃ sambhave 'pi tadabhidhānalakṣaṇo nirbbandho na kriyate,
T11arhebt2u:2916: tadevaṃ sāmagrībhedāt sāmagryantarajanyebhyo bhedaḥ sahakāriṇāmanekatve 'pi ca kāryasyaikatvamaviruddhamiti pratipādya (Hbṭ 110)
T11arhebt2u:2921: tadanvayavyatirekānuvidhāyinaśca kāryasyaikasya darśanāt svabhāvata ekatvaṃ sādhitam-
T11arhebt2u:2922: tena kāraṇena sahakaraṇaśīlā ekasāmagryantargatāḥ pratyayāḥ sāmagryantaraiḥ saha
T11arhebt2u:2923: “naikopayogaviṣayāḥ” eka upayogasya viṣayo yeṣāṃ te na bhavanti,
T11arhebt2u:2926: yadi kāraṇaśabdena sāmagrī bhaṇyate tadā tadbhedādastyevātatsāmagrījanyebhyaḥ kāryasya bheda iuti kimucyate- na kāraṇabhedād bhedaḥ syāt';
T11arhebt2u:2928: atha kāraṇaśabdena sāmagrīvyapadeśaviṣayāḥ sahakāriṇa ucyante tadā tadbhedādanekatvalakṣaṇāt kāryasyānekatvalakṣaṇo bhedo neṣyata eva,
T11arhebt2u:2937: evam udāharaṇe sāmagrībhedāt kāryāṇāṃ bhedo naikasāmagrīviṣayapratyayabhedādanekatvaṃ
T11arhebt2u:2938: kāryasyeti pratipādya prakṛte cakṣurādau yojayannāha- “yathā iho” dāharaṇe “kāraṇabhedaḥ”
T11arhebt2u:2944: “tathā” tenaiva prakāreṇa cakṣurādibhyo vijñānasyotpattau sāmagryantarāt sāmagrīlakṣaṇakāraṇabhedo 'nekakārya ityunneyaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:2948: tato vijñānasya vikalpakasyetarasya vā tadupādeyatvena yā bodharūpatopalabdhā sā cakṣurvijñānasyāpi bhavati /
T11arhebt2u:2951: “upalambhātmanaḥ sato bhavataḥ” jāyamānasya tadaiva tadekakāryapratiniyatasya cakṣurindriyasya
T11arhebt2u:2959: bhinnebhyaḥ svabhāvebhyaḥ kevalānāmeṣāṃ yaḥ svabhāvastato bhinnā evātajjanyebhyo
T11arhebt2u:2964: yathaikasāmagryantargatapratyayabhede 'pyabhedo naivaṃ sāmagrīlakṣaṇakāraṇabhede 'pyabhedaḥ sāmagryantarajanyebhyaḥ “kāryaviśeṣasya” viśiṣṭasya kāryasyeti /
T11arhebt2u:2966: yadi sahakāriṇāṃ bhede 'pyabhinnaṃ kāryaṃ bhavati sāmagrībhede 'pyabhinnamastu,
T11arhebt2u:2967: atha sāmagrībhedād bhinnaṃ bhavati sahakāribhedādapi kimiti bhinnaṃ na bhavati viśeṣābhāvāt?
T11arhebt2u:2969: tathā hi- parasparopasarpaṇādyāśrayāt pratyayaviśeṣādekakāryoddeśenetaretarasantānopakārācca sahakāriṇāṃ pratiniyataśaktināmudayādekaṃ kāryaṃ samājāyate /
T11arhebt2u:2971: tu kāryāntaraprabhavaśaktinibandhanebhyo hetvantarebhyaḥ svabhāvabhedavato bhāvād bhinnakāryaprasūtiriti kuto viśeṣābhāvaḥ? /
T11arhebt2u:2973: nanu ca sarvaṃ kāryaṃ sādhāraṃ yathā upādāyarūpam /
T11arhebt2u:2974: taddhi bhūtebhyo jāyamānaṃ tānyevāśrayata iti bhavadbhiriṣyate /
T11arhebt2u:2977: tasya ca kāraṇasya pūrvaṃ janakatvaṃ paścāt kāryaṃ pratyādhārabhāva eva,
T11arhebt2u:2979: tatastatsvabhāvasya jananādityanekāntaḥ tadavastha evetyata āha- “ta evaite” ye 'nantaramuktāḥ “kāraṇaśaktibhedāḥ” kāraṇānāṃ śaktiviśeṣāḥ /
T11arhebt2u:2980: kīdṛśāḥ? “yathāsvaṃ” yeṣāṃ kāraṇaśaktibhedānāṃ sahakārilakṣaṇānāṃ yadātmīyaṃ sāmagryantarajanyāt
T11arhebt2u:2981: prativiśiṣṭaṃ kāryaṃ tasya janane 'vyavadheyā vyavadhātuṃ pratibandhumaśakyā śaktiryeṣāṃ
T11arhebt2u:2983: udyuktāḥ santaḥ “sāmagrīkāryasya” ekapratyayajanitasya kasyacidabhāvāt sarvaṃ sāmagryā
T11arhebt2u:2984: eva kāryamiti kṛtvā sāmagrīkāryasya svabhāvasthityāśraya ityucyante /
T11arhebt2u:2988: svabhāvāntarotpādane yāvatpratibandhako vyāpriyate tāvat kṣaṇikasya svakāryaṃ kṛtvaiva nirodhāt /
T11arhebt2u:2999: yadapi bhūtānāmupādāyarūpaṃ pratyāśrayatvamucyate tadapi svadeśasyāsya janakatvameveti na kiñcit prāgjanakaṃ bhūtvā paścāt sthāpakatāmupaiti,
T11arhebt2u:3002: punaranyathā tatsvabhāvasya jananādityanekāntodbhāvanaṃ parasyāśaṅkyāha- “apratirodhaśaktikeṣu” avidyamānaḥ pratirodhaḥpratibandho yasyāḥ śakteḥ sā yeṣām /
T11arhebt2u:3004: ye hyutpannāḥ kālakṣepeṇa kāryaṃ kurvanti teṣāṃ syādapi śaktipratibandho,
T11arhebt2u:3005: na tu ya udayānantarameva kāryaṃ kurvanti /
T11arhebt2u:3012: teṣvevaṃvidheṣu “pratyayeṣu parasparaṃ kaḥ sahakārārthaḥ” yena sahakāriṇa ucyante? /
T11arhebt2u:3020: na ca kevalā janayantīti tatsvabhāvasya jananādityanekānta eveti manyate /
T11arhebt2u:3021: etat pariharati- “na vai” naiva atiśayotpādanaṃ sahakriyā yatastadabhāvāt sahakāriṇo na syuḥ /
T11arhebt2u:3022: kva punaratiśayotpādanaṃ sahakriyā pratyayānāṃ na bhavati? /
T11arhebt2u:3032: atiśayotpādanameva tu mukhyam ityat āha- “tadeva” ekakāryakaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ “mukhyaṃ sahakāritvam” nātiśayotpādanalakṣaṇam,
T11arhebt2u:3035: kuta etat? ityāha- “tasyaiva antyasya” vivakṣitakāryaṃ prati “kāraṇatvāt” /
T11arhebt2u:3037: yataḥ saha- yugapat kurvantaḥ sahakāriṇa ucyante,
T11arhebt2u:3039: yathā cāntyasyaikārthakaraṇaṃ sahakāritvam evaṃ pūrvasyāpi kāraṇakalāpasyottarottaraviśiṣṭakṣaṇāntarārambhiṇa ityavaseyam,
T11arhebt2u:3044: syādetat- ekārthakaraṇamapi tatra sahakāritvamastu atiśayotpādanalakṣaṇamapītyata āha- “tatra ca” kṣaṇe 'ntye “viśeṣasya kartumaśakyatvāt” nātiśayotpādanamapi sahakāritvam /
T11arhebt2u:3047: na hi tatra 'ayamanāhitātiśayo bhāgaḥ svahetubhyo jātaḥ,
T11arhebt2u:3054: syānmatam- bhinnasvabhāva evāntyasya viśeṣo 'stu ityata āha- “bhavāntara“- ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:3060: yata evaṃ “tasmānna kāraṇasya” mukhyasya “sahakāribhyaḥ” sakāśād “viśeṣasyotpattiḥ” ityekārthakriyaiva sahakāritvamiti /
T11arhebt2u:3061: nanvasatyāṃ sahakāribhyo viśeṣotpattau kāryajanane sāmarthyameṣāṃ na yujyata ityata āha- “te samarthāḥ” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:3062: yadi hi te svabhāvenāsamarthā utpadyeran tadaiṣāṃ sahakāribhyaḥ sāmarthyotpattirabhyupagamyeta /
T11arhebt2u:3063: yāvatā “te 'ntyāḥ svabhāvenaiva samarthāḥ pratyayāḥ sahitā jāyante” kṣaṇamātravilambino /
T11arhebt2u:3065: yebhyaścānantarameva kāryamutpadyate” na kālāntareṇa “tatra” teṣvevaṃvidheṣu “ekārthakriyaiva sahakāritvam” nātiśayotpādanalakṣaṇam /
T11arhebt2u:3067: parasparataścānabhyupagamāt samarthasya janmaivāyuktamiti manvānaḥ paraḥ āha- “samarthaḥ kutaḥ” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:3071: kāraṇasya sahakāribhyaḥ sāmarthyamicchatīti tanniṣedhaparaṃ svabhāvata iti vacanam /
T11arhebt2u:3079: tatra yādṛśaḥ kṣityādayastadanyapratyayasannidhāvupalabhyante tādṛśā eva kevalā api /
T11arhebt2u:3080: tatastadanyasahitā iva kevalā api samarthamaṅkurajanane svaṃ svaṃ kṣaṇāntaramārabheran /
T11arhebt2u:3083: āha- “tāni” svakāraṇāni kṣitibījādīni “enaṃ” samartham “aparasya” anyasya pratyayasya “sannidhāna eva kiṃ” kasmāt “janayanti”?
T11arhebt2u:3085: , sahitānāmeva sarvadā sambhavāt iti cet āha- “kadācit” kasmiṃścit kāle “anyathāpi” kevalā api “syuḥ” bhaveyuḥ /
T11arhebt2u:3086: tathā hi- dṛśyanta evādhyātmikabāhyāḥ kvacit kārye yādṛśā yatsahitāḥ tādṛśā eva tadrahitā apīti /
T11arhebt2u:3087: janayantu kevalā api sambhavantaḥ samartham, ko doṣaḥ?
T11arhebt2u:3088: iti cedāha- “tataśca” kevalānāmapi samarthajanakānāṃ sambhavāt “eko 'pi” na kevalamanekaḥ
T11arhebt2u:3089: “kvaci” ddeśādau samarthaḥ utpannaḥ kṣitibījādoiraṅkurādikāryaṃ “janayet” yadi tatsvabhāvasyāvaśyaṃ janakatvam /
T11arhebt2u:3090: na ca kevalo janayati tatsvabhāvasambhave 'pi tato 'nekāntaḥ iti paraḥ /
T11arhebt2u:3093: “pratyayai“ryo “yogaḥ” tena kāraṇena “pratikṣaṇaṃ bhinnaśaktayo” na kadācit pūrvāparakālabhāvina
T11arhebt2u:3096: “saṃskārāḥ” sametya sambhūya ca pratyayaiḥ kriyamāṇāḥ “santanvantaḥ” santānena bhavanto
T11arhebt2u:3097: “yadyapi kutaścit sāmyād” varṇena saṃsthānena anyena vā kenacitprakāreṇa sādṛśyādekākaraparāmarśapratyayajananalakṣaṇāt
T11arhebt2u:3105: vā nāstyeveti tatsvabhāvasya jananādajanakasya cātatsvabhāvatvādityatra nānekāntaḥ
T11arhebt2u:3106: yato yo yatsvabhāvaḥ sa svahetorevotpadyamānaḥ tādṛśo bhavati na punastadbhāve hetvantaramapekṣata
T11arhebt2u:3108: pratyabhijñānasya ca sarūpatāviṣayasya sāmagrībhedādanumitabhinnaśaktisvabhāvatvena bādhyamānatayā prāmāṇyābhāvāt na tataḥ sarūpatāsiddhiḥ kṣaṇakṣayiṇāmiti
T11arhebt2u:3110: yoravasthayorvastubhedo niśceyaḥ ityādinā ekatvaviṣayaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ nirastam /
T11arhebt2u:3117: kiñcideva kasyacit kāraṇam ityuktam tatra kiṃ kasya kāraṇamiti śakyaparicchedamapyādhyātmikeṣu tāvad darśayannāha- “tatra” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:3120: tadādiryeṣāṃ atidūrātyāsannatvādīnāṃ te 'vidyamānā yasmin deśe so 'vyavadhānādiḥ deśo yasya so 'vyavadhānādideśaḥ,
T11arhebt2u:3121: rūpamindriyaṃ cādī yasya manaskārādeḥ sa rūpendriyādiḥ sa cāsau karaṇakalāpaśca sāmagrīlakṣaṇastathoktaḥ,
T11arhebt2u:3122: avyavadhānādideśaścāsau rūpendriyadikāraṇakalāpaśca sa“vijñānajanane samartho hetuḥ” nānyaḥ,
T11arhebt2u:3130: imamevaṃvidhaṃ hetuphalabhāvapratiniyamaṃ niravadyamādhyātmikeṣu darśitam anyatrāpyatidiśannāha- “anena nyāyena” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:3131: yo 'yamanantaraṃ hetuphalabhāvapratiniyame nyāya uktaḥ so 'nyatrāpi “sarvatra” draṣṭavyaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:3132: sarvatreti vacanāt akṣaṇikeṣvapi pratītirmā bhūt ityāha- “pratikṣaṇam” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:3133: yāḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe 'nyāścānyāśca svabhāvabhedānvayinyaḥ śaktayo bhavanti tatrāyamekārthakriyāpratiniyamaḥ sahakāriṇāṃ draṣṭavyaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:3134: na tu ye sthiraikasvabhāvā bhāvāḥ paraiḥ kalpyante teṣvapi /
T11arhebt2u:3141: na tu svata eva svabhāvasyānyathātvaṃ sambhavati /
T11arhebt2u:3142: tataśca sthiraḥ padārtho yadi kāryotpādanasamarthasvabhāvaḥ tato 'syākriyā nopapadyate iti sarvadaiva kuryāt /
T11arhebt2u:3146: yattu kadācit karoti kadācinna ityetanna labhyate /
T11arhebt2u:3148: kevalānāmapi tatkāryakriyāprasaṅgena kuta ekārthakriyāpratiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvaṃ sambhavet? /
T11arhebt2u:3150: yadyapi kevalasyapyakṣaṇikasya samarthaḥ svabhāvaḥ tathāpi anyasahitaḥ karoti na kevalaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:3152: anyasahitena svakāryaṃ kartavyam na samarthasvabhāvenāpi satā kevalena'; iti /
T11arhebt2u:3154: anyasahitenaiva svakāryaṃ kartavyaṃ na kevalena ityetat kevalasyāsamarthasvabhāvatve yujyate nānyatheti manyamānasya praśnaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:3160: sahitasyāvasthāyāmiva yujyata iti sahitasyaiva kriyāmicchatā kevalasyāsamarthasvabhāvataivopagantavyā /
T11arhebt2u:3161: atha matam- kevalasya yadi śiraśchidyate tathāpi na karotītyata āha “akurvan” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:3162: kāryānumeyaṃ hi sāmarthyaṃ na ca kevalasya kadācidapi kāryakriyāstīti kathaṃ sāmarthyaṃ kalpyate? /
T11arhebt2u:3163: nāyaṃ niyamaḥ yat samarthasvabhāvenāvaśyameva kāryaṃ kartavyam,
T11arhebt2u:3164: anyathāpi darśanāt iti manyamāna aha paraḥ- “kuvindādayaḥ” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:3166: devānāṃpriyaḥ ṛjuḥ mūrkho va sukhasaṃvarddhitatvāt ramaṇasvabhāvaḥ,
T11arhebt2u:3170: yo hyanabhiyukto durbuddhiśca sa “kṛtamapi” vastu vismaraṇaprakṛtitvāt punaḥ punaḥ “kārayatīti” punaḥ pratividhāpayati /
T11arhebt2u:3178: vāt” kadācidasamarthatvābhāvāt “taddharmaṇaḥ” kāryakriyādharmaṇaḥ tathābhāvaḥ kāryakriyā “antyāvasthāvat” sahitāvasthāyāmiva “anivāryaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:3183: tataḥ sahita eva karotītyata āha- “antyāvasthāyāṃ sāmarthyotpattau” kīdṛśasya “prāgasamarthasya”
T11arhebt2u:3185: (Hbṭ 120) nahi teṣāṃ samarthasya sāmarthyasya ca svabhāvabhedo 'bhimataḥ /
T11arhebt2u:3186: kathañcit tadbhede 'pi tatsvabhāvatayaiva pratīyamānatvāditi te manyante /
T11arhebt2u:3187: “apūrvotpattireva sā” apūrvasyaiva vastunaḥ sā utpattiryā tatsvabhāvasya sāmarthyasya /
T11arhebt2u:3188: nahyekasvabhāvatve sāmarthyamevāpūrvamupajātaṃ na samarthaḥ iti yuktam,
T11arhebt2u:3191: nanu pratīyamāne eva sāmarthyatadvatorutpattyanutpattī ekasvabhāvatā ca kathaṃ ninhotuṃ śakyate? iti cet / na /
T11arhebt2u:3193: anyathā pratītyanusāriṇā bhavatā dvicandrādayo 'pi na ninhotavyāḥ /
T11arhebt2u:3195: ihāpi vastuna ekasvabhāvasyotpattyanutpattī parasparaviruddhe bādhike kiṃ neṣyete? /
T11arhebt2u:3196: vyavasthitasyaiva vajropalāderddharmiṇaḥ tatsvabhāvaṃ sāmarthyamutpannamiti ca purvāparakālayorapratibhāsamānavivekaḥ kathaṃ pratīyāt? /
T11arhebt2u:3197: vijñānādikāryasyānutpattiyaugapadyodayaprasaṅgāt cakṣurādisānnidhye prāgasat tat sāmarthyamutpannaṃ kramavacceti niścaya iti cet /
T11arhebt2u:3204: iti naiyāyikādayo manyeran atrāha- “atatsvabhāvatve” sāmarthyasyeṣyamāṇe “sa” bījādiḥ
T11arhebt2u:3207: sāmarthyamityākhyā yasya padārthāntarasya sahakāripratyayasānnidhyalakṣaṇasya sa evātiśaya[śabda]vācya iti naiyāyikairabhyupagamāt /
T11arhebt2u:3209: te 'pi sahakāriṇaḥ pratyayāḥ yadyakṣaṇikāḥ teṣvapyevaṃ prasaṅgo 'nivārita eveti kṣaṇikatevaikārtha[kriyā]pratiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvamicchato 'bhyupeyā /
T11arhebt2u:3211: yo 'sāvakṣaṇiko bhāvaḥ sakaleṣu sahakāriṣu svakāryaṃ karotītīṣyate,
T11arhebt2u:3213: yena hi kāraṇena tatkāryakriyāsvabhāvatvena tadā karoti tene(nai)
T11arhebt2u:3216: “kā cānyā mṛgyate yuktiḥ yathā tad dṛśyate tathā” iti sarvatreyamapratihatā yuktiriti manyamānaḥ kumārilaḥ prāha- “kurvan dṛṣṭaḥ” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:3220: , prāk tat kurvanna dṛṣṭaḥ tena na karotītyekārtha[kriyā]pratiniyamaḥ sidhyati akṣaṇikānāmapīti /
T11arhebt2u:3221: bhāvo hi kāryaṃ karoti tajjananasvabhāvatayā na darśanabalenādṛṣṭasyāpi svakāryakaraṇāt ato nedamuttaraṃ sambadhyata ityupahasannāha- “aho mahāsamarthyam” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:3223: yasmādetadbhāvān kāryakaraṇasvabhāvavikalānapi- yadi kāryakaraṇasvabhāvatvād bhāvāḥ kāryaṃ kuryuḥ tadaitadevottaraṃ kiṃ noktam?
T11arhebt2u:3224: , yataḥ kāryakaraṇe darśanamuttarīkṛtamiti kṛtvā- “svabhāvamātreṇa” ātmasattāmātreṇa “nānāprakāreṣu vyāpāreṣu niyuṅkte” tat kathaṃ mahāsāmarthyaṃ na syāt? /
T11arhebt2u:3225: na cātra me kācidakṣamā kintu “yadi nāma kiñcit” kāraṇaṃ “kathañcid” anādṛtasya vā vyākṣiptasya vā “atra bhavata” iti pūjāvacanam (Hbṭ 122)
T11arhebt2u:3227: aprasavo dharmo 'sya tadidam- “aprasavadharmakaṃ” tato 'petasantānaṃ “syādi“ti iyamasmākaṃ cintā cittaṃ dunoti /
T11arhebt2u:3232: “tān paśyantaḥ kevalaṃ jānīmahe” ta ete kārakasvabhāvā iti /
T11arhebt2u:3239: uta bhavāneva sarvadā nyāyyavacanarahito 'pi kathañcinnyāyyamuktavān iti sañjātaparitoṣaḥ pṛcchati- kiṃ tad?
T11arhebt2u:3241: “samastāḥ” samagrāḥ pratyayāḥ sahakāriṇo yeṣāṃ teṣāmakṛtvā kāryaṃ “nopekṣāpattiḥ”
T11arhebt2u:3242: naudāsīnyapratipattiḥ iti satyam- idamapyasti bhavato nyāyyaṃ vacanamiti,
T11arhebt2u:3243: kintu idamasi praṣṭavyaḥ- “sau['kṣepa]kriyādharmā svabhāvaḥ kiṃ teṣāṃ tadaivāntyāvasthāyāṃ” samagrāvasthāyāṃ yadanantaraṃ kāryamutpadyate tadaiva
T11arhebt2u:3246: atatsvabhāvatve so 'kāraka eveti prāguktadoṣabhayāt para āha- “āsīt” /
T11arhebt2u:3249: nnaḥ” sthira ekaḥ svabhāvo yeṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ teṣāṃ kasmiṃścit kāle “kasyacit” svabhāvasya tatropalabdhasya “abhāvavirodhāt” /
T11arhebt2u:3250: kṣaṇikeṣveva hyekadā dṛṣṭaḥ svabhāvo 'nyadā na bhavet tadā tasyānyatvāt /
T11arhebt2u:3254: syānmatam- naivedamanena vākyena sadṛśamasmadvākyamityāha- “ko vāsya” ityādi /

T11arhebt2u:3256: avilambitakāryakaraṇasvabhāvaḥ “kāryaṃ ca na karotī“tyasya bhāṣitasyārtho vaktavya iti /
T11arhebt2u:3270: nahi svabhāvādanyo bhāvaḥ yatastadbhede 'pi na bhidyeta,
T11arhebt2u:3272: nanu coktaṃ svato janakājanakasvabhāvatāvirahāt pratyayāntarabhāvādyapekṣatvāt janakājanakarūpatāyāstadbhede 'pi kuto bhāvabhedaprasaṅgaḥ?
T11arhebt2u:3273: , tasyāparāpekṣasvabhāvabhedalakṣaṇatvāt ityata āha- “nahi sa sāhitye 'pi” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:3274: tadaitaduttaraṃ bhāvatkaṃ sambadhyeta yadi bhāvo yo 'sau paraḥ sahakāritvābhimataḥ sannidhīyate tadrūpeṇa kartā syāt na svarūpeṇa /
T11arhebt2u:3276: tathābhāve hi paramārthataḥ sa eva paraḥ kartā syāt /
T11arhebt2u:3277: tatra tu kartṛtvavyapadeśaḥ kalpanānirmita eva bhavet /
T11arhebt2u:3280: tataśca nāsyānupakāriṇo bhāvamapekṣeta kāryamiti tadrahitebhya eva (Hbṭ 124)
T11arhebt2u:3284: tataḥ sarveṣāmevaṃ svayamakārakatve pararūpeṇāpyakārakatvāt sarvathā kārakoccheda eveti na kiñcit kutaścit jāyeta /
T11arhebt2u:3285: tasmāt svarūpeṇaiva bhāvaḥ svakāryasya kartā na pararūpeṇeti nāsyottarasyāvakāśaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:3287: atha yena svarūpeṇāyaṃ janakastadasya sahitāsahitāvasthayoḥ sarvadāsti tadā svarūpaṃ
T11arhebt2u:3288: ca svakāryajanakamasya sthirasvabhāvasya prāgapi sahitāvasthāyāstadeva yatsahitāvasthāyāmakṣepakriyāsvabhāvamiti
T11arhebt2u:3290: athavā kadācit paro brūyāt svahetubhirevāyaṃ pratyayāntarāpekṣaḥ svakāryajananasvabhāvo janita iti kevalo na karoti /
T11arhebt2u:3292: pratyayāntarāpekṣasvakāryajananasvabhāvatāyāḥ sarvadā bhāvāt ityata āha- “nahi sa sāhitye 'pi” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:3293: svarūpeṇaivāsya kartṛtvāt tasya ca prāgapi bhāvāt pratyayāntarāpekṣāyāśca tato labhyasyātmātiśayasyābhāvenāyogāt upakāralakṣaṇatvādasya,
T11arhebt2u:3295: kevalasya kāryakaraṇamanivāryamiti akurvataḥ kathaṃ sahitāvasthāyā na bhedaḥ syāt? iti bhāvaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:3296: pratyayāntarāpekṣasvakāryakaraṇasvabhāva ityapi pararūpeṇākārakasya pratyayāntarasannidhānopalakṣitakāle kārakatvaṃ na prāgityayamarthaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:3297: tataśca kadācit kāryakriyāsvabhāvo na sarvadā iti brūvatā kathaṃ sarvadā kāryajananasvabhāvatāsyoktā bhavati? /
T11arhebt2u:3298: nanvevaṃ svabhāvabheda evāsya tadatatkālayoḥ samarthitaḥ syāt /
T11arhebt2u:3304: eva svabhāvato 'ntyāḥ pratyayāḥ saha jāyante kṣaṇikā yeṣāṃ prākpaścātpṛthagbhāvo nāsti'; ityatra /
T11arhebt2u:3305: “sa kathamekakṣaṇabhāvī” ekasminnevāntye kṣaṇe bhavanaśīlaḥ “anyathā bhavet” antyakṣaṇāt prāk paścāt pṛthagvā bhavet?
T11arhebt2u:3306: “yaśca” anyathā “bhavati sa” evāntyakṣaṇabhāvī sahakārisantānopakṛtasvabhāvo 'kṣepakriyādharmā “na bhavatīti nāyam” akṣaṇīkapakṣoditaḥ “prasaṅgaḥ” kṣaṇikapakṣe /
T11arhebt2u:3309: kārako 'ntyaḥ akārakastadanyaḥ tayoryaḥ “svabhāvaḥ” sa bhinno 'pi bhedāvivakṣayaikatvenoktaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:3312: tena kārakākārakayoryau svabhāvau tayorekatra dharmiṇi virodhāt /
T11arhebt2u:3313: tathā tayoḥ svabhāvayorjanakau yau hetū- ekaḥ kārakasvabhāvajanako 'nyaścākārakasvabhāvajanakaḥ- tayorapyekatra dharmiṇi virodhāt,
T11arhebt2u:3315: akārakasvabhāvajanakahetorutpannasyākārakasya svabhāvasyānyatvāt “yaśca bhavati sa eva na bhavatīti nāyaṃ prasaṅga” iti /
T11arhebt2u:3317: aparastvanyathā śirarūpeṣvekārthakriyāpratiniyamaṃ kalpitavān tamupanyasyati “yo 'pi manyate” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:3323: sa evaṃvidhasvabhāvo na kadācit sāhityaṃ svakāryakaraṇe 'pekṣate yato 'nyaḥ sahito 'nyaśca kevalaḥ kārakākārakasvabhāvabhedāt syāt /
T11arhebt2u:3324: sa tarhi sarvadā tatsvabhāvaḥ kāryaṃ kinna karoti? iti cet /
T11arhebt2u:3330: tataḥ (Hbṭ 126) tadātmanaḥ kāryasya sahitebhya eva bhāvādekārthakriyālakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvamakṣaṇikānāmapyupapadyata iti /
T11arhebt2u:3331: siddhāntavādī pūrvadoṣānatikramamasya darśayannāha- “tasyāpi” evaṃvādinaḥ “kathaṃ sa” nityābhimato bhāvaḥ “kevalaḥ karotyeva” '
T11arhebt2u:3337: tasmāt kevalānna bhavatīti “tadavastho virodho” yaḥ pūrvamuktaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:3338: tathāhi- yadyakṣepakriyādharmā tadāvaśyamanena kāryaṃ kartavyam na cedavaśyaṃ karoti kathamakṣepakriyāsvabhāvaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:3339: akṣepeṇā kāryadarśanādakṣepakriyāsvabhāvatāvagamyate nānyathā iti parābhiprāyāśaṅkayāha- “na kevalaḥ” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:3340: naivaṃ mayoktaṃ kevalaḥ karotyeveti kintvakṣepakriyāsvabhāva iti /
T11arhebt2u:3342: yadi karotyeveti neṣyate kathamakṣepakriyāsvabhāva iti kathyate? /
T11arhebt2u:3343: atha tathocyate tathā nanvetadevānena “vacasā paridīpitam” abhihitaṃ bhavati /
T11arhebt2u:3347: yastu nāvaśyaṃ karoti sa kathaṃ tadrūpaḥ syat? /
T11arhebt2u:3352: yataḥ “kāryaṃ” cāyamakṣaṇiko bhāvaḥ “kevalo 'pi samarthaḥ san paraṃ” pratyayāntaram “apekṣamāṇaṃ kathamupekṣeta?” naiva /
T11arhebt2u:3354: āha- “paraṃ” pratyayāntaram “anādṛtya” tiraskṛtya etat kāryaṃ “prasahya” haṭhāt “kuryāt” /
T11arhebt2u:3356: iti cet, āha- “evaṃ hi” paramanādṛtya haṭhāt svakāryaṃ “kurvatānena” kevalenāpi samarthena satā yat tadātmanaḥ kevalasyāpi “sāmarthyaṃ” tad “darśitaṃ” prakāśitaṃ bhavati /
T11arhebt2u:3357: anyathānyasahitasyaiva karaṇāt kevalasya ca kadācidapyakaraṇāt na '
T11arhebt2u:3363: kāryāpekṣayāpi virodhasya tādavasthyaṃ darśayannāha- “kāryaṃ param” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:3364: kāryasya parāpekṣāṃ brūvan kevalāt kāraṇādanutpattimasya kathayasi,
T11arhebt2u:3368: tat evaikasmāt kāraṇādutpattyanutpattī parasparaviruddhe “kathamekatra” kāryākhye dharmiṇi “syātām?
T11arhebt2u:3372: ityanena sadṛśaṃ brūṣa iti na pūrvoktadoṣānmucyase,
T11arhebt2u:3373: yata evamapi brūvāṇo viruddhameva brūte na ca lakṣayati “tat” tasmāt “ayam” akṣaṇikavādī
T11arhebt2u:3374: kṣaṇikapakṣasyānavadyatayā tadvādināṃ nirddoṣatāsampatsu amarṣalakṣaṇerṣyā eva śalyaṃ
T11arhebt2u:3375: antarduḥkhahetutvāt tena vitudyamānāni vyathyamānāni marmāṇi yasya so “'yamīrṣyāśalyavitudyamānamarmā”
T11arhebt2u:3380: tadevamakṣaṇikeṣu na kathañcidekārthakriyāpratiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvaṃ sambhavatīti pratipādyopasaṃharannāha- “tasmādidam” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:3381: yeṣāṃ hi sthirarūpatayā pṛthagapi bhāvaḥ sambhavati teṣāmakṣaṇikānāṃ “pṛthak” kevalānāṃ
T11arhebt2u:3386: nanu atiśayotpādanalakṣaṇamapi sahakāritvaṃ bhāveṣu dṛśyate tat kathamuktaṃ prāk '
T11arhebt2u:3390: (Hbṭ 128) ekārthakriyālakṣaṇameva sahakāritvaṃ sarvatra na kvacidatiśayotpādanaṃ sambhavati /
T11arhebt2u:3392: bhāvāḥ sahakāriṇo vivakṣitakāryasya hetutāṃ pratipadyante- yathā taṇḍulādibhya odanādijanmani dahanodakādayaḥ,
T11arhebt2u:3393: bījādibhyaścāṅkurādijanmani pṛthivyādayaḥ- tatra viśeṣotpādanaṃ pratyayānāṃ sahakriyocyate loke /
T11arhebt2u:3395: tya purvottarakṣaṇayorekatvādhyavasāyena tasyaivāyamatiśaya iti na dravyāśrayeṇa /
T11arhebt2u:3398: pūrvakāraṇakalāpasyaikārthakriyālakṣaṇameva tatra paramārthataḥ sahakāritvamiti na kācit kṣatiriti /
T11arhebt2u:3401: yadi tarhi kṣanike taṇḍulādidravye viśeṣo notpadyate,
T11arhebt2u:3403: tato yathā parasparato viśeṣamanāsādayanto 'pi kṣaṇikāḥ sahitā eva kurvanti na kevalāḥ,
T11arhebt2u:3406: na ca śakyaṃ vaktum- yo yasya prāgakārakaḥ svabhāvaḥ sa paścādapīti /
T11arhebt2u:3407: tathā hi- prabhāsvarādapavarakaṃ praviṣṭasyendriyamarthapratipattimakurvadapi paścāt kurvāṇamupalabhyate / taduktam-
T11arhebt2u:3409: arthā na pratibhāntīti gṛhyante nendriyaiḥ punaḥ //” iti /
T11arhebt2u:3411: viśeṣānutpattau sannidhānasyāpyasannidhānatulyatvāt dahanādibhāve 'pi taṇḍulādibhyo naudanajanma syāt /
T11arhebt2u:3412: tathā prabhāsvarādapavarakaṃ praviṣṭasya yadīndriyaṃ svopakāribhyo 'tiśayaṃ krameṇa na pratipadyate tadā prāgiva paścādapyarthapratipattiṃ naiva janayet /
T11arhebt2u:3415: śālibījādiva kodravabījasyeti niratiśayādanyatvameva sātiśayatayā tatkāryakāriṇa iti /
T11arhebt2u:3416: evaṃ tāvad yatra sahakāribhyaḥ krameṇa kāryaṃ bhavati tatrātiśayotpādanalakṣaṇamaupacārikaṃ sahakāritvamekārthakriyālakṣaṇameva tu mukhyaṃ tatrāpīti pratipāditam /
T11arhebt2u:3417: yatra tvakṣepeṇaivārthasannidhimātreṇa sahakāriṇaḥ kāryaṃ kurvanti kiṃ tatrāpi santānāśrayamatiśayotpādanamasti?
T11arhebt2u:3419: 'ye hyavyavadhānādideśā indriyādayaḥ svahetubhyo jātāsteṣvavilambitakāriṣu na viśeṣotpattiḥ parasparataḥ sambhavati,
T11arhebt2u:3422: yadi na viśeṣotpattiḥ tadā kathaṃ nirviśeṣā jñānasya kāraṇībhavanti?
T11arhebt2u:3423: ityata āha- “tatra yathāsvaṃ” yasya ye ātmīyāḥ pratyayāḥ taiḥ,
T11arhebt2u:3425: deśaśca sa ādiryasyāvyavahitadeśādeḥ tatrāvasthānamavasthā yeṣāṃ “te saha svabhāvaniṣpattyā”
T11arhebt2u:3426: svabhāvaniṣpattirvidyata ityeva kṛtvā “jñānahetutāṃ pratipadyante” tatra kiṃ parasparato
T11arhebt2u:3428: yadi hi svahetubhya eva parasparopasarpaṇādyāśrayebhyaḥ svakāryajananakṣamā yogyadeśādyavasthānalakṣaṇaviśeṣayogino notpadyeran,
T11arhebt2u:3431: yata evaṃ “iti” tasmāt “tatra“teṣu akṣepakāriṣvindriyādiṣu “ekārthakriyaiva” mukhyaṃ “sahakāritvaṃ” na santānāśrayeṇa vyavasthāpyamānamatiśayotpādanalakṣaṇaṃ gauṇamiti /
T11arhebt2u:3432: atha viśeṣotpādanalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvaṃ kathaṃ na vyavasthāpyate? /
T11arhebt2u:3433: tadapi hi loke pratītatvād vyavasthāpanīyamevetyata āha- “yatra tu” kārye nāvyavadhānādideśopanipātamātreṇaivendriyādaya iva sahakāriṇaḥ pratyayatāṃ
T11arhebt2u:3435: pratikṣaṇaṃ prakṛṣyamāṇaṃ viśeṣamutpādayantaḥ “tatra” kālakṣepabhāvini kārye kartavye
T11arhebt2u:3439: paramārthatastu tatrāpi pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ pratyayakalāpa uttarottarakāryotpādānuguṇe viśiṣṭakṣaṇe pratiniyata ityekārthakriyālakṣaṇameva sahakāritvamanubhavati
T11arhebt2u:3441: , yataḥ krameṇa kāryaṃ nirvartayantītyata āha- “tatra svarasataḥ” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:3442: “tatra” tasmin hetusantāne ye hetava upādānakāraṇākhyāḥ ye ca pratyayāḥ sahakārisaṃjñitāsteṣāṃ
T11arhebt2u:3443: ye pūrve prathama upanipātakṣaṇāḥ teṣāṃ vināśahetvanapekṣitayā svarasato nivṛttau
T11arhebt2u:3444: satyāṃ tebhya eva svarasato nivartamānebhyaḥ prathamakṣaṇebhyaḥ kāryotpādānuguṇena
T11arhebt2u:3447: evaṃ yāvadatyantātiśayavānantyaḥ kāraṇakalāpo jātaḥ tataḥ kāryasyotpattiḥ ityevaṃ sahakāribhyaḥ svabhāvāntarapratilambhaḥ,
T11arhebt2u:3451: yat samutpannaviśeṣamanantaroktena prakāreṇa kāraṇaṃ antyasāmagrīkṣaṇalakṣaṇaṃ tato
T11arhebt2u:3453: krameṇābhivarddhamānaḥ kāryasya janaka iṣyate tasyaiva utpattirna syāt prathamakṣaṇopanipātināṃ
T11arhebt2u:3455: parasparato 'navāptaviśeṣā eva kāryotpādanānuguṇaṃ viśeṣamārapsyanta iti cedāha- “aviśiṣṭāda” viśiṣṭebhyaḥ parasparato “viśeṣasya” (Hbṭ 131)
T11arhebt2u:3458: tataśca parasparato viśeṣotpādānapekṣiṇa eva sahakāriṇaḥ kāryaṃ kurvīran /
T11arhebt2u:3460: iti cet, āha- “tena” yena kṣaṇikā api parasparato viśeṣotpādānapekṣā eva svakāryaṃ
T11arhebt2u:3461: kurvanti ekakāryapratiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ ca sahakāritvaṃ pratipadyante tena kāraṇena
T11arhebt2u:3463: apekṣaṇīyebhyaḥ svabhāvātiśayotpatiśca na syāt” ityakṣaṇikavādī kṣaṇikapakṣeṇa svapakṣasya sāmyamāpādayati / yadāha-
T11arhebt2u:3465: ajñatā vā yataḥ sarvaṃ kṣaṇikeṣvapi tatsamam //
T11arhebt2u:3468: iti / tatraitat syāt prathamakṣaṇe 'pi kṣitibījādayaḥ parasparataḥ samutpannaviśeṣā eva sannidhīyante-
T11arhebt2u:3470: iti nyāyāddhi dūradeśavartināmapi hetuphalabhāvāt ityāśaṅkayāha- “atha sahakāriṇā” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:3471: sahakāriṇaḥ parasparasamparkavikalā api vastudharmatayaivānyonyamupakurvantīti śahakāriṇā kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣajananāya kṛtaviśeṣa eva samparkakāla
T11arhebt2u:3475: atha naivaṃ sahakāriṇaḥ parasparasya kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣaṇimittamaparaṃ viśeṣaṃ kurvanti,
T11arhebt2u:3476: svabhāvata eva tatra teṣāṃ yogyatvāt ityata āha- “na ca” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:3477: naiva hi sahakāriṇaḥ kṣitibījādayaḥ parasparasya kāryotpādānuguṇo yo viśeṣaḥ tadutpādane
T11arhebt2u:3484: teṣāṃ kṣitibījādīnāmupāye- yogyadeśopanipāte kāryavyaktidarśanāt apāye ca- parasparasamparkavirāme kāryānutpattidarśanāt /
T11arhebt2u:3485: yadi hi kāryotpādanuguṇaviśeṣotpādane sarvadā yogyāvasthāḥ syuḥ tadā so 'pi viśeṣaḥ sarvadā syat /
T11arhebt2u:3486: tatastatparamparābhāvi kāryamiti tadupāyāpāyayoḥ kāryasyotpattyanutpattī na syātām /
T11arhebt2u:3488: yataḥ sahakāriṇā pṛthagavasthitenānavasthābhayāt kṛtaviśeṣo nopatiṣṭhate parasparataśca prathamasamparkakṣaṇabhāvināṃ nopeyate yujyate vā /
T11arhebt2u:3489: tena kāraṇenādyo viśeṣaḥ kāryotpādānuguṇaḥ sahakāribhyaḥ samānakālatayā nirupakārasya kṣitibījādeḥ “notpadyate“,
T11arhebt2u:3491: tena samagrāvasthāvat sarveṣāṃ vyagrāvasthābhāvināmapi kṣaṇānāmaviśeṣāt tajjananasvabhāvatve 'pyajananāt samagrāvasthāyāmeva jananād /
T11arhebt2u:3493: bhaviṣyatīti kṣinasarvopāyo 'kṣaṇikavādī sāmyamevātura iva bahumanyamānastatraiva bharaṃ kṛtavān /
T11arhebt2u:3494: siddhāntavādī bhaṅgyā paramupahasannāha- “nāsmākaṃ punaḥ punaḥ” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:3495: yadi punaḥ punarvacane 'pi lokasya nyāyapratītirbhavati śataśo 'pi brūmaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:3497: nahi parārthapravṛttānāmasmākaṃ punaḥ punarabhidhāne kaścidudvego bhavati /
T11arhebt2u:3498: evaṃvādinaśca śāstrakṛtaḥ kvacit prakārāntareṇa tamevārthaṃ sphuṭīkurvato ye punaruktatāaprihārāya yatante sa teṣāmasthānapariśrama eva /
T11arhebt2u:3499: yadi nodvego hanta tarhyucyatām ityata āha- “na viśeṣotpādanādeva” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:3502: yataḥ prathamakṣaṇabhāvināṃ bījādīnāṃ tadabhāvāt kāryotpādānuguṇe viśeṣe kartavye sahakāritāvirahaḥ syāt /
T11arhebt2u:3503: kintvekārthākriyaiva sahakāriṇāṃ pāramārthikaṃ sahakāritvaṃ pūrvoktābhiryuktibhiḥ sambhāvyate /
T11arhebt2u:3504: sā ca prathamamasamparkabhājāmastyeveti kiṃ na sahakāriṇaḥ syuḥ? /
T11arhebt2u:3505: para āha- sāpyekārthakriyā na bhavet parasparato viśeṣarahitānām /
T11arhebt2u:3506: yadi punaḥ parasparato viśeṣarahitānāmapi tadekārthakriyāṅgikriyate tadā pratyekaṃ tadavasthāyāṃ tadutpādanasāmarthyābhyupagamāt tadavasthāyāmiva pṛthagapi sā bhavet /
T11arhebt2u:3507: tathāhi- te tadavasthāyāmapi parasparato nirviśeṣā eva kurvanti /
T11arhebt2u:3508: teṣāṃ pṛthagapi tadviśeṣakriyā kathamiva na prasajyeta? /
T11arhebt2u:3511: iti cet; “tathā ca” kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣasya pṛthakkaraṇaprasaṅge sati “tasmād viśeṣād bhavanaśīlam” aṅkurādi “kāryamapi” viśeṣavat kevalāt sahakāriṇaḥ syāt iti cenmanyase,
T11arhebt2u:3513: tathā hi- saṃhatāsaṃhatāvasthayonnirviśeṣā eva kṣaṇakṣayiṇo bhāvā iti yaducyate tat kiṃ tāvadviśeṣamātrāpekṣayā?
T11arhebt2u:3522: etāvattu syāt- kaścid viśeṣaḥ kvacit kārye 'nuguṇo na sarvaḥ sarvatreti /
T11arhebt2u:3524: 'aparāparapratyayogena pratikṣaṇaṃ bhinnaśaktayaḥ saṃskārāḥ santanvanto yadyapi kutaścit sāmyāt sarūpāḥ pratīyante,
T11arhebt2u:3533: tatra svarasataḥ pūrvakṣaṇanirodhe tebhya eva viśiṣṭakṣaṇotpādād viśeṣotpattiḥ'; iti /
T11arhebt2u:3534: atha kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣajanakaviśeṣāpekṣayā prāgvat prathamasamparkabhājaḥ parasparato nirviśeṣā ityabhimataṃ tadapyayuktam /
T11arhebt2u:3535: yataḥ kāryotpādānuguṇasya viśeṣasya janakāḥ kṣitibījādayaḥ kīdṛśāḥ ye vyavadhānādirahitatvenopanipātinaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:3536: tadbhāva eva tasya bhāvāt etāvanmātranibandhanatvācca janakaṃ vya(kavya)vasthāyāḥ /
T11arhebt2u:3537: te ca tathāvidhāḥ sarvadā na bhavantīti kathaṃ pṛthagapi kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣārambha eṣāṃ syāt?
T11arhebt2u:3538: , yataḥ kevalānāmapi kāryakriyā prasajyeta tad darśayati- yogyo deśo yeṣāṃ te yogyadeśāḥ,
T11arhebt2u:3544: naivaṃvidhāḥ sarvadā bījādaya iti kathameṣāṃ pṛthagapi tathāvidhaviśeṣārambhaḥ syāt? /
T11arhebt2u:3546: tatra yo 'vyavadhānādideśo rūpendriyādikalāpaḥ sa vijñānajanane samartho hetuḥ';
T11arhebt2u:3549: ihāpi tatra yo 'vyavadhānādideśaḥ kṣitibījādikalāpaḥ sa kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣajanane samartho heturiti pratīyata eva /
T11arhebt2u:3550: sa ca tathāvidhoviśeṣaḥ sarvadā na bhavati,
T11arhebt2u:3553: etadapi pūrvamevoktamityāha- teṣāṃ ca kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣa[janane] viśeṣavatāṃ yata utpattistadapyuktamasakṛdeva '
T11arhebt2u:3554: yasteṣāṃ parasparopasarpaṇādyāśrayaḥ pratyayaviśeṣaḥ sa taddhetujanane samartho hetuḥ'; iti /
T11arhebt2u:3556: yogyadeśādyavasthā jātāste saha svabhāvaniṣpattyā jñānahetutāṃ pratipadyanta'; ityanena,
T11arhebt2u:3560: na ca svahetuta eva sañjātaviśeṣāṇāṃ bhāve parasparatastadāśaṃsā,
T11arhebt2u:3562: teṣāṃ ca kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣajanakānāṃ pratyayānāṃ pratyekaṃ sāmarthye 'pi khaṇḍaśaḥ kāryotpādāyogāt sakalasyaiva pratyekaṃ karaṇāt /
T11arhebt2u:3564: teṣāṃ ca na pūrvaṃ na paścāt na pṛthagbhāva iti samarthānapi pūrvāparapṛthagbhāvabhāvino doṣā nopalīyante';
T11arhebt2u:3566: tatastathāvidhaviśeṣasya svopādānamātranibandhanasyānabhyupagamena kevalānāmaprasaṅgāt kutaḥ kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣārambhadvārakaṃ kāryamapi syāditi? /
T11arhebt2u:3567: kutaḥ punarayaṃ kāmacāro labhyate yadaṅkurādikāryaṃ sahakāriṇaḥ parasparasya kāryotpādānuguṇāṃ viśeṣaparamparāṃ janayantaḥ kurvanti,
T11arhebt2u:3568: kāryotpādānuguṇaṃ tu viśeṣaṃ vyavadhānādirahitadeśopanipātamātreṇetyata āha- “kāryadvaividhyaṃ ca yasmāt tasmādevaṃ vibhajyate” /
T11arhebt2u:3570: ata āha- sahakāribhiravyavadhānādideśairanantaraṃ sañjanitāḥ parasparasya prāgavasthāpekṣaviśiṣṭakṣaṇabhāvalakṣaṇā
T11arhebt2u:3573: anyacca tadviparītaṃ yat sahakārisannidhimātreṇa bhavati na parasparakṛtāṃ viśeṣaparamparāmapekṣate /
T11arhebt2u:3583: kāraṇamapi kiñcit svasannidhimātreṇa kāryajananasvabhāvaṃ svakāraṇebhya eva bhavati,
T11arhebt2u:3588: śālyaṅkuraśca tabdījajanyasvabhāvo na yavādībījajanyasvabhāva iti na bhāvānāṃ svahetubalāyātāḥ pramāṇādhigatāḥ svabhāvāḥ paryanuyojyāḥ /
T11arhebt2u:3589: ye tu yajjananasvabhāvāḥ pramāṇato 'dhigatāḥ te kiṃ sarvadaiva tatsvabhāvāḥ?
T11arhebt2u:3592: tatra sarvadā tatsvabhāvatve paścādiva prāgapi tatkāryakriyāprasaṅgena pararūpeṇākārakasya bhinnasvabhāvatā kārakākārakāvasthayoḥ śāliyavabījādīnāmiva tattvacintakairūcyate /
T11arhebt2u:3593: sadṛśāparabhāvanibandhanaṃ caikatayā pratyabhijñānaṃ lūnapunarjāteṣviva keśanakhādiṣu ityatra virodhābhāvāditi /
T11arhebt2u:3597: tasya yat kāryamaṅkurādikaṃ tajjanmanimittaṃ “sahakāriṇāṃ” prathamakṣaṇāntaraṃ viśiṣṭadvitīyakṣaṇabhāvarūpo
T11arhebt2u:3598: yo viśeṣaḥ kāryotpādānuguṇaḥ “ādyo” bhavati “sa teṣāṃ” sahakāriṇāṃ prathamasamparkabhājāṃ
T11arhebt2u:3599: parasparakṛto yo viśeṣastajjanmā na bhavati parasparopasarpaṇādyāśrayādeva pratyayaviśeṣāt tasya bhāvāt /
T11arhebt2u:3603: kutaḥ? “tatprakṛtitvāt” tasyādyasya viśeṣasya parasparopasarpaṇādyāśrayāt pratyayaviśeṣādāsāditatadanukūlaviśeṣaiḥ sahakāribhiḥ parasparopakāranirapekṣairjanyasvabhāvatvāt,
T11arhebt2u:3606: atha sahakāriṇā kṣityādinā kuśūlādyavastho 'pi bījādiḥ tenāpi kṣityādiḥ kṛtaviśeṣa evopatiṣṭhetānavasthaivaṃ syāt iti /
T11arhebt2u:3609: yathā prathamasamprarkabhājaḥ kṣitibījādayaḥ parasparasya viśeṣamanādadhānāḥ kāryotpādānuguṇaṃ viśeṣaṃ janayanti,
T11arhebt2u:3610: tathā sthirarūpā api bhāvāḥ tadekakāryapratiniyatāḥ parasparakṛtaviśeṣanirapekṣā eva bhaviṣyanti'; iti,
T11arhebt2u:3612: kṣaṇikavadakṣaniko 'pi yadi kāryaṃ karoti karotu nāma /
T11arhebt2u:3614: kintu yena svabhāvena kāryaṃ karoti sa yadi “avilambitakāryakartṛdharmā” akṣepeṇa karotītyevaṃśīlo dharmo yasya sa tathoktaḥ,
T11arhebt2u:3615: tadā “pṛthagbhāvasya sambhāvāt kevalo 'pi” na kevalaṃ sahitaḥ “tathā syāt” tatkāryakārakaḥ syādityuktaṃ bahuśaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:3616: “atatsvabhāvastu” akṣepakartṛsvabhāvavikalastu “tadāpi” sahitāvasthāyāmapi prāgvat “akāraka eva” pararūpeṇa kartṛtvasya pūrvameva niṣedhāt /
T11arhebt2u:3617: tadevamekārthakriyayā viśeṣotpādanena cākṣaṇikānāṃ sahakāritvaṃ niṣidhyopasaṃharannāha- “tasmāt” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:3618: dvividhasyāpi sahakāritvasyāyogānnaivākṣaṇikasya kaścit sahakārīti kevalo 'pi svakāryaṃ
T11arhebt2u:3619: kuryāditi sahakāripratyayāpekṣasyākṣaṇikasya hetutāṃ bruvāṇasya kiṃ yuktamiti darśayannāha- “prāyastu” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:3620: yo hi sthirahetuvādī tasya yadi sa hetuḥ pratyayāntarāṇyapekṣya kāryaṃ karoti tadā “vyaktam” avaśyaṃ tasya sthirasya hetoḥ pratyayāntarāpekṣakārakasya svabhāvāntarasyotpattiriti /
T11arhebt2u:3622: yataḥ sahakāriṇāṃ yaḥ “saṃghātaḥ” sannipātaḥ “tatsthāyī” tatra vartamāno bhāvasantānaḥ
T11arhebt2u:3629: tasyaiva hyakārakasya tadātmā kārakaḥ svabhāvo na yujyate na tvatadātmā /
T11arhebt2u:3633: atha matam- kārakasvabhāvāntarotpattiriṣyeta yadi sthirasya hetoḥ prāgapi kārakasvabhāvo na syat /
T11arhebt2u:3634: tasya tu prāgapi bhāvāt pratyayāntarāpekṣā tadutpattirapyayukteti ata āha- “kārakasya” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:3635: yadi hi samagrāvasthāyāḥ prāgapi kārakasvabhāvo bhavet tadāsyākriyā na yujyate,
T11arhebt2u:3640: yadi ca pratyayāntarairapyasau na kriyeta tat kimiti mudhaiva tānyapekṣate? iti /
T11arhebt2u:3644: yo yatsvabhāvaḥ sa svahetorevotpadyamānaḥ tādṛśo bhavati punastadbhāve hetvantaramapekṣate';
T11arhebt2u:3646: tatra yena nyāyena kṣaṇikānāṃ hetuphalasvabhāvaḥ tasyākṣaṇikeṣvasambhavaṃ pratipādayituṃ
T11arhebt2u:3647: prāsaṅgikaṃ yadupakrāntaṃ tat parisamāpayya prakṛtamanubadhnannāha- “tasmād yo yadātmā” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:3648: yadi svabhāvenāsthitidharmaṇo bhāvasya na nāśakāraṇaiḥ prayojanaṃ svabhāvena sthitidharmaṇo bhaviṣyatītyata āha- “sthitidharmaṇo 'pi” ityādi
T11arhebt2u:3649: sthitidharmaṇo 'pi hi naiva nāśakāraṇaiḥ kiñcit prayojanam /
T11arhebt2u:3650: tasya svahetubhyaḥ samupajāto yaḥ sthiraḥ svabhavaḥ tadanyathātvasyāsthirātmatāpatteḥ (Hbṭ 139)
T11arhebt2u:3652: kāmaṃ hi bhāvāḥ svayaṃ na bhaveyuḥ /
T11arhebt2u:3653: na tu santa eva svaṃ svabhāvaṃ parityajanti /
T11arhebt2u:3655: eva” sthitidharmaiva “na syāt” ātmabhūtasyāsthitidharmaṇaḥ svabhāvasya paścāt sambhave
T11arhebt2u:3661: tathā ca sati “pūrva” eva “vikalpaḥ” svabhāvenāsthitidharmā bhāva iti /
T11arhebt2u:3665: anyathā nivṛttyayogādityata āha- “yaśca parasmāt” nāśahetoḥ sthitidharmaṇaḥ sata “anyathābhāvaḥ” asthitidharmatālakṣaṇo bhavati,
T11arhebt2u:3666: sa pūrvakāt sthitidharmaṇaḥ svahetusamudbhūtāt svabhāvāt “aparaḥ” anyaḥ “svabhāvastasminniṣpanne” paścā[jjanya]tvād bhinnahetukatvācca “kathaṃ tasya” svabhāvaḥ “syāt”? /
T11arhebt2u:3668: sārūpyādalakṣitavivekasya tathā pratibhāsanaṃ syāt yadyasau pūrvasvabhāve satyevānyato bhavet /
T11arhebt2u:3674: yo 'paraḥ svabhāvaḥ sa kimiti tasya na bhavati?
T11arhebt2u:3677: ityata āha- “tathā ca” vastvantaratve sati vināśahetorupajāyamānasya svabhāvasya pūrvako bhāvaḥ svahetubhyo yaḥ sthitidharmā jātaḥ so 'cyutidharme sthito nivṛttibhāṅna bhavati,
T11arhebt2u:3684: na ca pūrvakasya pracyutidharmatā ityata āha- “etena” anantaroktena “kaṭhinādīnām”
T11arhebt2u:3688: kathaṃ tarhi svabhāvāntarotpattiḥ pūrvasya cāpracyutidharme sthitasyābhāvo yuktaḥ?
T11arhebt2u:3691: sahakāriṇaḥ parasparopasarpaṇādyāśraya pratyayaviśeṣopajātātiśayā “dupādānācca” yat tat kaṭhinādirūpaṃ tāmrādi svarasato nirudhyate /
T11arhebt2u:3692: tata eva upādānakāraṇādagnyādisahakārikāraṇopādānapratyayopajātaviśeṣād “apara eva” anya eva dravakaṭhinādisvabhāvo dravagrahaṇasyopalakṣaṇatvāt,
T11arhebt2u:3693: “utpanno” na tu pūrvakameva kaṭhinadravādirūpaṃ tāmrādi vyavasthitātmakaṃ dravakaṭhinādisvabhāvena pariṇatamiti /
T11arhebt2u:3698: kintu sa svayaṃ sthitidharmaiva svahetubhirjanito nāsyāsthirasvabhāvatā vināśahetorupajāyate /
T11arhebt2u:3702: yadi svabhāvenāsthitidharmā svahetorjātaḥ syāt tadā tadasambhave 'pi nāvatiṣṭheta /
T11arhebt2u:3703: tasya svabhāvena sthitidharmaṇaḥ svahetubhirevāyamaparaḥ svabhāvo niyamito yaduta “parasmāt” virodhino 'gnyāde “rvināśaḥ svayaṃ bhavatīti” /
T11arhebt2u:3704: parasmāditi karmaṇi lyaplope pañcamī paramapekṣya ityarthaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:3706: jāto yathā tvayā virodhinamapekṣya svayaṃ nirva(va)
T11arhebt2u:3710: nanu yadyasya vināśao virodhisannidhāne svayameva bhavatyahetukaḥ prāpnoti,
T11arhebt2u:3711: ahetośca deśakālasvabhāvaniyamo na yukta ityata āha- “na ca” naiva vināśo nāma vinaṣṭuraparaḥ svabhāvaḥ,
T11arhebt2u:3721: nanu ca kālāntarasthitiradharmatāmupagacchato naiva nityavikalpasyāvakāśaḥ / na /
T11arhebt2u:3723: tathā hi- yadyayaṃ saṃvatsarasthitidharmā svahetubhirjanitastadā saṃvatsaraparisamāptau
T11arhebt2u:3724: yo 'syādāvudayakāle saṃvatsarasthitidharmā svabhāvo yato 'yaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ sthitaḥ
T11arhebt2u:3729: vināśahetusannidhau svayaṃ nivartata iti copagamādanityavikalpo naśvarātmatāvikalpaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:3730: tathā hi- vināśahetvabhimatasannidhau svayaṃ vinaśyato yo 'sya svabhāvaḥ sa eva bhāvasyaikarūpatvādutpannamātrasyeti
T11arhebt2u:3732: evaṃ vikalpe kṛte pāścātyavikalpopagame kālāntarasthitirevāsya truṭyatīti nityavikalpa evānenopagantavyaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:3733: tatra vināśahetusannidhau svayaṃ nāśopagame prāṅnityo bhūtvā paścādanityo vinaśvarasvabhāvo bhavatīti brūte /
T11arhebt2u:3738: yo 'sau nityaḥ svabhāvaḥ prāktanaḥ tasya nityābhimatasya svayaṃ paścānnāśaṃ brūvāṇaḥ sarvadā pratikṣaṇameva nāśaṃ prāha /
T11arhebt2u:3740: atha pratikṣaṇamasya nāśo na bhavati tadā paścādapi tadayogāt sarvadaivānāśaṃ prāheti kṛtvā pūrvasminnityābhimate svabhāve vināśaheturasamartho 'kiñcitkara eva /
T11arhebt2u:3741: nanu ca vināśahetornaiva sāmarthyamupagataṃ parena virodhisannidhimapekṣya svayaṃ nāśopagamāt / na /
T11arhebt2u:3745: svahetava evātrāparādhyanti yadakiñcitkare 'pi tatrāpekṣāyāṃ niyuñjata iti cet /
T11arhebt2u:3746: kaḥ punarayamasthānābhiniveśaḥ teṣāṃ yat tatra tathā niyuñjate /
T11arhebt2u:3752: yathānyeṣāṃ kṣaṇikavādināmakiñcitkaramapi mugdarādikamapekṣya ghaṭādipravāho nivartate tathāsmākamapi kālāntarasthāyī bhāvaḥ';
T11arhebt2u:3754: yato nāsmākaṃ pravāho nāma kṣaṇavyatirikto 'sti yo 'kiñcitkaramugdarādisannidhau nivarteta /
T11arhebt2u:3758: yā tu teṣāṃ kapālādivṛttilakṣaṇā paryudāsavṛttyā nivṛttiḥ yasyāṃ satyāmekatvābhiniveśino lokasya sadṛśāparabhāvarūpasya vibhramanimittasyāpagamāt
T11arhebt2u:3764: pratyayaviśeṣāt sañjātātiśayāt kapāladerbhavanadharmatvāt tasya ca tajjannasvabhāvatvāditi /
T11arhebt2u:3765: svabhāvadvayopagamaprasaṅgāditi parijihīrṣayā para āha- “na prāg” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:3768: sarvadaikasvabhāvasya sarvadā nityataiva na paścādanityasvabhāvatāsambhava iti /
T11arhebt2u:3769: siddhāntavādyāha- “sa tarhi bhāvaḥ” sarvadā nityasvabhāvaḥ svabhāvena “nāśamanāviśan” apratipadyamānaḥ kathaṃ naiva naṣṭo(kathaṃ naṣṭo) nāma?
T11arhebt2u:3772: upasaṃharannāha- “yata evaṃ” sthitidharmaṇāṃ vināśo naiva yujyate tasmāt sati asya
T11arhebt2u:3773: vināśe yadyavaśyambhāvī kṛtakarūpasya sato vināśa iṣyate paraistadā “vināśasvabhāvena“-
T11arhebt2u:3777: “tena” kṛtakarūpeṇa satā vastunā svahetubhyo “bhavitavyam” anyathāvaśyambhāvitayopagatasya kṛtakātmanāṃ satāṃ vināśasyaivāyogāt /
T11arhebt2u:3779: āha- “tathāpi” svayaṃ vināśasvabhāvatve 'pi na kevalamavinaśvarasvabhāvatve svabhāvānyathātvāsambhavād vyartho vināśaheturiti prathamavikalpopanyāsa evoktam na punarucyate /
T11arhebt2u:3781: tadevaṃ vināśaṃ pratyanapekṣāmasāmarthya- vaiyarthyābhyāṃ taddhetvayogena kṛtakalakṣaṇasya
T11arhebt2u:3782: sattvasya pūrvācāryadarśitāṃ pratipādya yathāsau viparyaye bādhakapramāṇatāmanubhavati
T11arhebt2u:3787: parairiti svabhāvahetuprasaṅgaprayogo viparyaye bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ pūrvācāryapradarśitam /
T11arhebt2u:3789: nāśasyākādācitkatvādudayānantaraṃ nāśa iti “yaḥ san” kṛtakalakṣaṇo bhāvaḥ “sa vināśī”
T11arhebt2u:3790: vinaśvarasvabhāvo naśvaratāyāḥ sādhyadharmasya nivṛttau ca kṛtakalakṣaṇasattvanivṛttiriti
T11arhebt2u:3793: tadevaṃ pūrvācāryān prati akṛtakasya sato 'bhāvāt “sadakāraṇavannityam” iti nityalakṣaṇavirahādeva na tannityatvam /
T11arhebt2u:3794: yattu sad utpattimat tad uktena nyāyenāvaśyaṃnāśitayopagataṃ paraiḥ kālāntarasthāyi na bhavatīti prati pāditam /
T11arhebt2u:3796: yadā tu yat sat tat kṣaṇikameveti sāmānyenocyate kṛtakākṛtakalakṣaṇaṃ sato bhedamanapekṣya prauḍhavāditayā kṛtakasyāpi cāvaśyambhāvī vināśa iti paropagamo nāpekṣyate,
T11arhebt2u:3797: tadā vināśaṃ pratyanapekṣatvameva sarvasya na sidhyati /
T11arhebt2u:3799: dṛṣṭo ghaṭādīnāṃ teṣāmeva taddhaitvayogat tatrānapekṣā yujyate /
T11arhebt2u:3800: ye tu deśādivyavahitāḥ parvatādayo vā vinaśāmāviśanto na dṛṣṭāḥ teṣāmavaśyaṃ vināśitvopagamanibandhanābhāvādantye
T11arhebt2u:3801: 'pyayaṃ vināśaṃ pratyanapekṣa eva vinaśyanna'viśeṣādādāvapi tadbhāvaniyata iti vaktumaśakyatvāt
T11arhebt2u:3805: tadā bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ tādātmyaprasādhakamabhidhānīyamiti manyamānaḥ pūrvapakṣamutthāpayannāha-
T11arhebt2u:3808: kṛtako 'pi sadrūpa ākāśādirvākṛtakaḥ sanna “'tatsvabhāvo 'pi” avināśisvabhāvo 'pi syāt /
T11arhebt2u:3811: tataśca vināśisvabhāvasāpekṣatvāt tadanapekṣatvamasiddhamiti tadvaśāt sādhyasya kṣaṇikatvasya sattvasvabhāvatvāsiddheḥ tannibandhanā nānvayavyatirekasiddhiriti
T11arhebt2u:3812: kiṃ punaratrāśaṅkānimittaṃ yena kaścidatatsvabhāvo 'pyāśaṅkayata ityāha- “na hi sarvaḥ sarvasya svabhāvaḥ” iti /
T11arhebt2u:3813: vicitrasvabhāvā hi bhāvā dṛśyante- kecit sapratighāḥ kecidapratighāḥ,
T11arhebt2u:3815: tathā kecidvināśinaḥ anye tvavināśisvabhāvāḥ śaṅkayanta iti pūrvapakṣāśaṅkā /
T11arhebt2u:3823: evaṃ manyate- iha tāvadidameva vicāraṇīyam kiṃlakṣaṇametad bhāvānāṃ sattvaṃ yuktamiti /
T11arhebt2u:3827: vandhyāsutādīnāmasattvāt kathaṃ sattāyogaḥ? iti cet / na /
T11arhebt2u:3830: yadi ca satāmeva sattāyogaḥ evaṃ tarhyanyat sattvalakṣaṇamabhidhānīyam sattāyogasya ca vaiyarthyam,
T11arhebt2u:3833: evaṃ sati yadevārthakriyasāmarthyayuktaṃ tasyaiva sattāyoga ityarthakriyāsāmarthyameva bhāvalakṣaṇamāyātamityapārthakaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:3836: anyathā sāmānyādīnāṃ kathaṃ svarūpaṃ sattvaṃ syāt? /
T11arhebt2u:3843: yathā ca dhrauvyaṃ na tathotpādavyayāviti naikaṃ vastu yathoktalakṣaṇaṃ syāt /
T11arhebt2u:3848: yasya tu na kvacicchaktiḥ sa evaikāntenābhāva ucyate /
T11arhebt2u:3849: śaktilakṣaṇameva sattvamakṣaṇike syāt tataḥ kṣaṇikātmatā sattvasya na sidhyatīti kuto 'nvayavyatirekau?
T11arhebt2u:3850: iti cet, āha- “na caivākṣaṇikasya” kvacit kārye 'ntaśo jñānalakṣaṇe 'pi śaktirasti tat kutastasya tallakṣaṇaṃ sattvamatītāderiva bhaviṣyati?
T11arhebt2u:3852: nanu ca śakteratīndriyatvāt kāraṇānāṃ kāryarambhaniyamābhāvācca kathaṃ tadviraho
T11arhebt2u:3854: sattvaṃ kṣaṇikātmatāmevānubhavet yato 'nvayavyatirekau syātāmityata āha- “kramayaugapadyābhyām” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:3857: tathā hi- kramayaugapadyābhyāṃ kāryakriyā vyāptā prakārāntarābhāvāt /
T11arhebt2u:3864: nanu ca prakārāntarābhāvāt kāryamaṅkurādikaṃ bījādinā kramayaugapadyābhyāmeva kriyata ityucyate sa eva tu prakārāntaravirahaḥ kāryātmanaḥ kutaḥ siddhaḥ? /
T11arhebt2u:3868: tataḥ prakarāntareṇārthakriyāsambhavāt kramayaugapadyanivṛttāvapi nārthakriyāsāmarthyanivṛttiriti kuto 'kṣaṇikatve sati sarvasāmarthyavirahalakṣaṇamasattvam?
T11arhebt2u:3871: tathā hi- kramo nāma paripāṭiḥ kāryāntarāsāhityaṃ kaivalyamaṅkurādeḥ,
T11arhebt2u:3874: tasya cāṅkurādisvabhāvasyānyasahitasya kevalasya vābhāve pratyakṣabodhagamyamāne satyupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpta eva svabhāvaḥ kramayaugapadyabhāvabahirbhūto nopalabhyate /
T11arhebt2u:3875: vastunaḥ upalabhyasyānyasāhitye kaivalye cāpanīte tadviviktadeśādipratibhāsinaḥ pratyakṣasyodayāt svabhāvānupalambhata evābhāvaniścayādilakṣaṇavyavahāravṛtteḥ
T11arhebt2u:3876: tasya cāṅkurādibhāvasyāvasthādvayabahirbhāvaniṣedhe kayościddeśakālayoḥ deśāntarādau krameṇāṅkurādibhāvavatīratarasmin vā bhāve 'pi na kācit kṣatiḥ /
T11arhebt2u:3877: tataḥ pratyakṣata eva prakārāntarābhāvasiddheḥ kathaṃ kramayaugapadyābhyāmarthakriyāśaktiravyāptā syāt? /
T11arhebt2u:3878: śāstrakārastu yathā pratyakṣata eva prakārāntarābhāvasiddhiḥ tathā svayam “etena kramākramādayo 'pī“ti atidiśan vakṣyati /
T11arhebt2u:3881: ddhi tathāhi- anyonyavyavacchedarūpāṇāmekaniṣedhenāparavidhānāt tasyāpratiṣedhe vidhipratiṣedhayorvirodhādubhayapratiṣedhātmanaḥ prakārāntarasya kutaḥ sambhavaḥ? /
T11arhebt2u:3882: atra prayogaḥ- yatra yatprakāravyavacchedena yaditaraprakāravyavasthānaṃ na tatra prakārāntarasambhavaḥ,
T11arhebt2u:3890: viruddhopalabdhiṣu bahirddharmiṇi hetoḥ sadbhāvamupadarśya virodhasādhanameva bādhakam,
T11arhebt2u:3892: tato viruddhayorekatrāsambhāvāt pratiyogyabhāvaniścayaḥ śītoṣṇasparśayoriva bhāvābhāvayoriva veti kuto 'navasthā? /
T11arhebt2u:3905: nityaśca yadā yugapat karoti tataḥ prāgapi bhāvāt tadaiva tatkriyāprasaṅgaḥ punastato 'pi pūrvataram ityevaṃ na kadācidyugapat kriyā syāt /
T11arhebt2u:3910: evamakṣaṇikatve sati cakṣurādyāyatanānāmasattvaprasaṅgāt kṣaṇikatāyāmeva sattvamiti yat sat tat kṣaṇikameveti sato naśvarātmatāsiddheḥ anvayavyatirekarūpavyāptisiddhiriti
T11arhebt2u:3915: prāgeva darśitatvāt tagdatamaparamapi pareṣāṃ bhrāntikāraṇapanetuṃ tadviṣayaṃ darśayannāha-
T11arhebt2u:3918: kasmāt punararthāntare kāryameva heturityāha- “avyabhicārāt” iti kāryameva hyarthāntaraṃ
T11arhebt2u:3919: na vyabhicarati nānyat yathoktaṃ prāk tataḥ kāryamevārthāntare gamye heturucyate
T11arhebt2u:3921: “na ca kenacit” ityādinā yaḥ sarvathā gamyagamakabhāvaprasaṅga ācāryeṇoktaḥ parasya,
T11arhebt2u:3922: tamihāpi kāryahetau paraḥ kadācit prasañjayedityāśaṅkamāna āha- “kāryakāraṇa- ” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:3923: yadi hi kāryaṃ heturucyate tadā kāryakāraṇabhāvena kāraṇenāsya gamakatvam /
T11arhebt2u:3924: tathā ca sati sarvathā gamyagamakabhāvaḥ prāpnoti /
T11arhebt2u:3925: agneḥ sāmānyadharmavad viśeṣadharmā api tārṇapārṇādayo gamyāḥ syuḥ /
T11arhebt2u:3926: dhūmasyāpi viśeṣadharmavad dravyatvapārthivatvādayo 'pi sāmānyadharmā gamakā bhaveyuḥ /
T11arhebt2u:3929: sa ca nāgnidhūmayoraṃśena api tu sarveṇa prakāreṇa /
T11arhebt2u:3930: tathāhi- yathā agniragnitvadravyatvasattvādibhiḥ sāmānyadharmairjanakaḥ tathā tārṇapārṇatvādibhirviśeṣadharmairapi,
T11arhebt2u:3931: yathā ca dhūmo dhūmatvapāṇḍutvādibhiḥ svaniyatairviśeṣadharmairjanyaḥ tathā sāmānyadharmairapi sattvadravyatvādibhiḥ /
T11arhebt2u:3932: tataśca yathā tayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ tathaiva gamyagamakabhāvaḥ prāpnoti,
T11arhebt2u:3934: atrāha- “na sarvathā janyajanakabhāvaḥ” tataśca kutastathā gamyagamakabhāvaḥ syāt? /
T11arhebt2u:3936: “tadabhāve” teṣāṃ tārṇapārṇatvādināṃ viśeṣadharmāṇāmabhāve “bhavato” dhūmamātrasya tebhya eva viśeṣadharmebhyo bhavatīti evamātmanaḥ “tadutpattiniyamasyābhāvāt”
T11arhebt2u:3937: tathā “tadabhāve” agnyabhāve bhavato dravyatvādeḥ sāmānyadharmasyāgnerevāyaṃ bhavatī tyevaṃrūpasya tadutpattiniyamasyābhāvāt kutaḥ sarvathā
T11arhebt2u:3939: na hyasati tadutpattiniyame janyajanakabhāvo vyavasthāpayituṃ yuktaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:3940: yata evaṃ “tasmāt kāryaṃ” dhūmādikaṃ “svabhāvairyāvadbhi” rdhūmatvādibhiḥ svagataiḥ /
T11arhebt2u:3946: kāraṇāśritairyāvadbhiḥ svabhāvairvinā te kāryagatāḥ svabhāvā na bhavanti hetuḥ taisteṣāmiti gamyate /
T11arhebt2u:3949: idānīṃ kāraṇasthaiḥ svabhāvairyāvadbhiragnitvadravyatvādibhiravinābhāvi teṣāṃ kāraṇagatānāṃ sāmānyadharmāṇāṃ hetuḥ kāryaṃ gamakam /
T11arhebt2u:3950: kasmāt? ityāha- “tatkāryatvaniyamāt” teṣāmeva kāraṇagatānāṃ sāmānyadharmānāṃ tat kāryamityevaṃrūpasya niyamasya sadbhāvāt /
T11arhebt2u:3951: nahi tān sāmānyadharmān kadācidapi kāryaṃ vyabhicarati /
T11arhebt2u:3952: evaṃ kāraṇagatamaṃśaṃ pāścātyenārthena nirūpya prāktanenārthena kāryagatamaṃśaṃ nirūpayannāha- “taireva ca” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:3953: kāryamapi taireva dharmaiḥ svagataiḥ kāraṇagatānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ gamakam yathāntarā sambhavino dhūmatvapāṇḍupārṇatvādayo viśeṣarūpāstaiḥ kāraṇagataiḥ sāmānyadharmairvinā na bhavanti /
T11arhebt2u:3957: na hi te viśeṣadharmāḥ kāryagatāḥ kāraṇasthasāmānyadharmairvinā kadācidapi bhavanti /
T11arhebt2u:3961: tadevaṃ kāraṇasya sāmānyadharmā eva gamyā na viśeṣadharmāḥ,
T11arhebt2u:3962: kāryasyāpi viśeṣadharmā eva gamakā na sāmānyadharmāḥ,
T11arhebt2u:3964: ye tu kāraṇasya viśeṣadharmā yaistatkāryatvaniyamaḥ kāryamātrasya nāstīti na te gamyāḥ /
T11arhebt2u:3965: ye ca kāryasya sāmānyadharmā dravyatvādayasteṣāmapi tatkāryatvaniyamābhāvādeva gamakatvaṃ
T11arhebt2u:3966: nāstīti kāryakāraṇabhāvena gamakatve kutaḥ sarvathā gamyagamakabhāvaḥ pareṣāmiva prasajyeta? /
T11arhebt2u:3967: [2. janyajanakabhāvasya sarvathā sattve 'pi gamyagamakabhāvasya na tathātvam /]
T11arhebt2u:3969: yadi hi kāraṇasya sāmānyadharmā eva gamyāḥ kāryasyāpi viśeṣadharmā eva gamakāḥ tatkāryatvaniyamādiṣyante,
T11arhebt2u:3971: kāraṇasya sāmānyadharmā eva janakā na viśeṣadharmāḥ,
T11arhebt2u:3972: kāryasyāpi viśeṣadharmā eva janyā na sāmānyadharmā iti syāt /
T11arhebt2u:3978: yadi hi kāryasya taiḥ kāraṇagatairviśeṣadharmairjanyo yo viśeṣaḥ sa grahītuṃ śakyate,
T11arhebt2u:3980: tathā liṅgaviśeṣo dhūmatvādi upādhirviśeṣaṇaṃ yeṣāṃ dravyatvādīnāṃ sāmānyānāṃ kāryagatānāṃ teṣāṃ cābhimatatvāgdamakatvasya /
T11arhebt2u:3981: tathā hi- agurudhūmagrahaṇe bhavatyeva tadagneranumānaṃ dhūmatvaviśeṣaṇena ca dravyatvādināgneranumānam /
T11arhebt2u:3982: na hi sarvathā janyajanakabhāvo 'stītyeva tathaiva gamyagamakabhāvo bhavati,
T11arhebt2u:3984: tathā hi- na sattāmātreṇa liṅgasya gamakatvam,
T11arhebt2u:3986: jñāpako hi svaniścayāpekṣo jñāpyamarthaṃ jñāpayati, nānyathā /
T11arhebt2u:3988: sarvathā janyajanakabhāvābhyupagame tadabhāve bhāvasyaivābhāvādityata āha- “aviśiṣṭa“- ityādi /
