T11arhebt2u:3989: yadi hi tajjanyaviśeṣa grahaṇarahitamaviśiṣṭaṃ kāryamātramupādīyate liṅgaviśeṣopādhirahitaṃ
T11arhebt2u:3991: bhāvāt tadaviśiṣṭasya ca dravyatvāderagnyabhāve 'pi bhāvād vyabhicāra iti sarvathā
T11arhebt2u:3996: tathā hi- yadi nāmadhūmamātraṃ tārṇapārṇādiviśeṣābhāve bhavati,
T11arhebt2u:4001: tathā yadyapi dravyatvasattvamātramagnyabhāve 'pi bhavati na tu dhūmātmakamiti tadviśiṣṭasyāvyabhicārād gamakatvamapi na vāryata iti /
T11arhebt2u:4003: atra parasya vacanāvakāśamāśaṅkayāha- “kasyacit” dhūmādeḥ “kadācit” kasmiṃścit kāle
T11arhebt2u:4004: “kutaścit” agnyādeḥ “bhāve 'pi” sati “sarvo” dhūmādiḥ “tādṛśo” yādṛśa ekadāgnyāderbhavana dṛṣṭa tajjātīyaḥ,
T11arhebt2u:4005: “tathāvidhajanmā” yathāvidhāt sa eko bhavan dṛṣṭaḥ tādṛśādeva janma yasya sa /
T11arhebt2u:4008: tathāhi- yadi nāma pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ kasyaciddhūmasyāgnyādisāmagrīkāryatvamavagataṃ kimetāvatānyasyāpi tādṛśasya tādṛśakāryatā sidhyati,
T11arhebt2u:4013: evaṃ hi kasyāściddhūmavyakteragnyādijanyatā dṛṣṭeti kinna ghaṭāderapi sābhyupagamyate?
T11arhebt2u:4017: iti cet ; tathā ca pramāṇābhāvena tathāvidhajanmatvāniścayādatādṛśādapi janmāśaṅkāyāṃ tādṛśasya dhūmāderagnyādinā'nvayavyatirekau na niścitāviti kutaḥ kāryahetorgamakatvam? /
T11arhebt2u:4018: na hi yo 'sāveko deśakālāvasthāniyato 'gniviśeṣahetuko dhūmo 'dhigataḥ pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ tasyaivānvayavyatirekau pratipattavyau /
T11arhebt2u:4021: tādṛśasya sāmānyātmana eva liṅgatvāt tasya cātathāvidhādapi janmāśaṅkāyāṃ kutastathāvidhenānvayo vyatireko vā? / taduktam-
T11arhebt2u:4026: evaṃ manyate- ihaikadā dhūmāderagnyādisāmagrījanyatayā pratyākṣānupalambhābhyāṃ niścitarūpatve 'pi tādṛśasyātādṛśādapi bhāvaḥ samāśaṅkyate yathāparidṛṣṭādanyatvena
T11arhebt2u:4027: tatra yo 'sāvagnyādisāmagrījanyo dhūmaviśeṣa ekadā niścitastadapekṣayā yathānyo dhūmaviśeṣastādṛśo yo 'nyādṛśādapi- bhāvānāṃ vicitraśaktitayā- bhavediti śaṅkayate,
T11arhebt2u:4029: tatra yadi tadanyasya tādṛśasyātādṛśājjanma syāt tadā tādṛśasya svabhāvasya nāgnyādisāmagrījanyasvabhāvateti paridṛṣṭasyāpi dhūmasya nāgnyādisāmagrī kāraṇamityāyātam /
T11arhebt2u:4031: tataścāgnyādisāmagryā akāraṇatvāt yo mayaikadā tato bhavan dṛṣṭo dhūmaḥ so 'pi na bhavet /
T11arhebt2u:4032: nahi yad yasya kāraṇaṃ na bhavati tat tataḥ sakṛdapi jāyate,
T11arhebt2u:4038: yasya tasyātadbhāvinastādṛśasya tallakṣaṇasya dhūmavastunaḥ “sakṛdapi” ekadāpi “tataḥ” agnyādeḥ “abhāvād” bhāvavirodhāt /
T11arhebt2u:4039: bhavati ca tādṛśo 'gnyādisāmagrītaḥ tatastādṛśasya svabhāvasya tādṛśameva kāraṇamityavagamyate sakṛtpravṛttābhyāmeva pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāmiti kuto vyabhicārāśaṅkā? /
T11arhebt2u:4040: tena yādṛśo dhūmo 'gnyādisāmagryā bhavan dṛṣṭaḥ sakṛt tādṛśasya tasya tajjanyasvabhāvatayā tādṛśādeva bhāvāt '
T11arhebt2u:4043: athavānyathā vyākhyāyate- iha pratyakṣānupalambhanibandhanā kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhiḥ prāguktā tannibandhanāvanvayavyatirekau pratipādayitum,
T11arhebt2u:4047: dhūmo dvitīyādikṣaṇeṣvapi tādṛśaḥ pratyakṣata eva tasya pūrvakṣaṇāvilakṣaṇatayā pratīteḥ /
T11arhebt2u:4048: “tathāvidhajanmā” iti yathāvidhādagnīndhanasāmagrīlakṣaṇāt kāraṇādādyo dhūmakṣaṇa utpannastathāvidhājjanma yasya sa “tathāvidhajanmetyetat kutaḥ” naiva tasya dhūmāderabhāvāt /
T11arhebt2u:4049: evaṃ ca yadyato dṛṣṭaṃ tasyānyato 'pi bhāvasya darśanāt sarvatrānāśvāsa iti manyamāna
T11arhebt2u:4050: āha- “tathā ca” anagnito dhūmādapi dhūmasya bhāve śakramūrddhāderapi tasya bhāvāvirodhādagninā
T11arhebt2u:4057: siddhāntavādyāha- nāgnīndhanasāmagrījanyo yādṛśo dhūmastādṛśa eva dhūmādapi bhavati kāraṇabhedena /
T11arhebt2u:4060: tādṛśo hyagnīndhanasāmagrīkṣaṇāntarajanya ādya evāparaḥ kṣaṇastathā tadanya ādya evāparāgnīndhanasāmagrījanya iti tādṛśasya dhūmasya dhūmādasambhavāt na kvacidanāśvāsaḥ kāryaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:4061: tathā yādṛśo dvitīyakṣaṇabhāvī prathamadhūmakṣaṇajanito dhūmakṣaṇastādṛśo 'paraprathamadhūmakṣaṇajanita eva dvitīyo dhūmakṣaṇo na tṛtīyādiḥ
T11arhebt2u:4064: iti cet, āha- “atadbhāvinaḥ” atasmād- anagnīndhanādirūpād dhūmād bhavanaśīlasya prathamakṣaṇāvilakṣaṇasya
T11arhebt2u:4066: yathā hi prathamakṣaṇāpekṣayā dvitīyastādṛśastathā tadapekṣayā prathamo 'pīti tādṛśatvāviśeṣāt tādṛśasyānagnito bhāve tādṛśo nāgnijanyasvabhāvaḥ iti sakṛdapi tato na bhavet /
T11arhebt2u:4067: bhavan vā tajjanyasvabhāvatāmātmānastādṛśaḥ khyāpayatīti kuto 'nyādṛśād bhavet?
T11arhebt2u:4068: tasmādanyādṛśād bhavannanyādṛśa eva tato na vyabhicāraḥ /
T11arhebt2u:4070: nanu sarveṣāṃ dhūmakṣāṇānāṃ kaṇṭhakṣaṇanākṣisrutikālīkaraṇādikāyāmarthakriyāyāmupayogāt kathaṃ tādṛśasvabhāvatā na syāt? /
T11arhebt2u:4071: na, tasyā apyarthakriyāyāḥ kṣaṇabhedopadhīyamānarūpāyāḥ tādṛśatvābhāvāt tatrāpi tulyadoṣatvāt /
T11arhebt2u:4072: kathaṃ tarhi loke sarvatra dhūmavyavahāraḥ iti cet;
T11arhebt2u:4074: sādṛśye sati kathaṃ na tādṛśatā? iti cet /
T11arhebt2u:4076: tathā hi- gosadṛśo bhavati gavayaḥ na tu tādṛśaḥ,
T11arhebt2u:4078: paramārthenātādṛśe 'pi tādṛśābhimāno mandamatīnāṃ bhavan kathaṃ nivārtyet? /
T11arhebt2u:4079: tathā hi- tattvādhyavasāyo 'pi tāvad- atasminnarvāgdṛśāṃ vinivārayituṃ na pāryate,
T11arhebt2u:4084: tattvacintakāstu tādṛśātādṛśakāraṇabhedāt tādṛśātādṛśatāṃ bhāvānāṃ anumanyante na tādṛśatām /
T11arhebt2u:4085: tad yadyatādṛśādapi tadṛśo bhavet tadā tasya tajjanyaḥ svabhāva ityatadbhāvinaḥ sakṛdapi tato bhāvo na syāt /
T11arhebt2u:4089: yato hi kāraṇād yad bhavad dṛṣṭam tasya tajjanyasvabhāvaḥ,
T11arhebt2u:4093: yadi nāmaivaṃ tataḥ prakṛte kiṃ siddham?
T11arhebt2u:4094: ityata āha- “tatra” etasmin nyāye sati “yadi dhūmo” yādṛśa ādyo 'gnyādisāmagrījanitastādṛśo
T11arhebt2u:4097: tadā “tasya” tādṛśasya dhūmasvabhāvasya “tajjanyo“'gnyādisāmagrījanyaḥ “svabhāvo na bhavati” kintu dhūmajanya eveti kṛtvā sakṛdapi “tato“'gnyādisāmagrīto “na bhaveta” /
T11arhebt2u:4099: nāgnyādijanyasvabhāvateti kutaḥ sakṛdapi tato bhāvo yujyeta /
T11arhebt2u:4101: yathā hyarthāntaramatajjanyābhimatamanyato bhavat na tajjanyasvabhāvaṃ nāgnyādisāmagrījanyasvabhāvamiti
T11arhebt2u:4102: sakṛdapi tato na bhavati tadvat tādṛśo dhūmo 'pīti tato bhavannanyādṛśa evāsāviti gamyate /
T11arhebt2u:4103: syānmatam- agnyādisāmagryāsāvatajjanyasvabhāvo 'pi tādṛśo balājjanyate kastasya tapasvino 'parādhaḥ?
T11arhebt2u:4104: ityata āha- “nāpi” na kevalaṃ svayamatajjanyasvabhāvatayā tato na bhavet,
T11arhebt2u:4105: kintvagnyādisāmagryapi taṃ tādṛśaṃ dhūmaṃ- yādṛśo dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvī- (Hbṭ 158) na janayet /
T11arhebt2u:4108: tādṛśasya hyanyato bhāve sa eva tajjananasvabhāvo nāgnyādisāmagrīti tajjananasvabhāvavikalā kathaṃ taṃ janayet? /
T11arhebt2u:4111: tathā hi- sā ātmīyaṃ svabhāvamanusṛtyaiva pravartate,
T11arhebt2u:4114: syānmatam- agnyādisāmagrījanyasvabhāvo 'pi tādṛśo dhūmo dhūmajanyasvabhāvo 'pi yathā sa eva dhūma indhanajanyasvabhāvo 'gnijanyasvabhāvaścobhayato bhavati /
T11arhebt2u:4115: tathā tādṛśo 'pi dhūma ubhayasāmagrījanyasvabhāvatayobhayato bhaviṣyatītyata āha-
T11arhebt2u:4121: tasya yadi tādṛśātādṛśakāraṇajanyatā syāt tatastādṛśātādṛśasvabhāvataiva syāt /
T11arhebt2u:4126: tenāgnidhūmalakṣaṇāt “dhūmādhūmajananasvabhāvāt” tādṛśātādṛśajananasvabhāvāt tādṛśātādṛśatayāsya bhavato dhūmādhūma[svabhāva]stādṛśātādṛśasvabhāvaḥ syāt kutastādṛśa eva? /
T11arhebt2u:4128: kāryāṇāṃ hi ye svabhāvāḥ parasparāsaṃbhavinaḥ te parasparavilakṣaṇakāraṇasāmagrīsvabhāvakṛtā na svābhāvikā ahetukatvaprasaṅgāt /
T11arhebt2u:4132: kāryāṇāmutpattimātra eva kāraṇāpekṣaṇādityata āha- “akāraṇāpekṣaṇe ca” tādṛśātādṛśarūpatāyāṃ tādṛśātādṛśa- kāraṇānapekṣaṇe ca tādṛśātādṛśatāyāḥ “ahetukatvaprasaṅgāt” /
T11arhebt2u:4133: na hi tādṛśātādṛśasvabhāvayorabhūtvā bhāvavyatirekeṇānyā kācidutpattiḥ yatra tādṛśātādṛśasvabhāvakāraṇanirapekṣāṇāmapi tadapekṣā syāt /
T11arhebt2u:4135: tatra kāraṇāpekṣopagame kathaṃ tādṛśātādṛśatāyāṃ kāraṇāpekṣā na syāt /
T11arhebt2u:4136: tasmāt sāmagrīṇāṃ tādṛśātādṛśatvādeva kāryāṇāṃ tādṛśātādṛśasvabhāvavibhāga iti kuto 'nyādṛśāttādṛśasambhavaḥ? iti /
T11arhebt2u:4137: yattūktaṃ 'yathaiko dhūmo 'gnīndhanābhyāṃ vilakṣaṇābhyāṃ janyate tathaikalakṣaṇamapi kāryaṃ vilakṣaṇādapi sāmagryantarād bhaviṣyati'; iti /
T11arhebt2u:4139: yato nāsmābhirvilakṣaṇānāṃ janakatvaṃ vāryate janayantyeva paraspavilakṣaṇā api svahetupariṇāmopanidhidharmāṇastadavasthāniyatāḥ tadekaṃ kāryaṃ,
T11arhebt2u:4140: tasya tu teṣāṃ ca parasparāpekṣayā janyajanakasvabhāvatāniyamāt tādṛśasya tādṛśādeva janmocyate nānyādṛśāt,
T11arhebt2u:4145: dhūmādikaṃ tādṛśaṃ dhūmaṃ janayet pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ ca tathāvagamyeta tadāgnyādivat
T11arhebt2u:4147: tadabhāve 'pi tu tādṛśasya bhāve tayorjanyajanakasvabhāvatāniyamābhāvāt kutaḥ kāryakāraṇatetyahetutaiva tādṛśasyānyādṛśād bhavataḥ syāt /
T11arhebt2u:4148: yata evaṃ “tasmāt” so 'gnīndhanādisāmagrīviśeṣo mantavyo “yaḥ” ādya “dhūmajanano” nānyaḥ “sa” dhūma ādyo yaḥ “gnyādisāmagrīviśeṣeṇa” janito nānya a (Hbṭ 160)
T11arhebt2u:4149: iti kṛtvā kāryakāraṇayorevaṃ yathoktena nyāyena janyajanakarūpasya svabhāvasya niyamād
T11arhebt2u:4151: 'nyādṛśāt kāraṇāt “utpattiḥ” tādṛśasya kāryasya “na bhavati” anyādṛśasya eva na vāryata iti /
T11arhebt2u:4153: “tat” tasmāt yādṛśaṃ kāryaṃ yādṛśāt kāraṇāt dṛṣṭaṃ pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ niścitamekadā
T11arhebt2u:4156: kāraṇamiti niścaye sati yathoditena nyāyena “kāryasya kāraṇena vyāptira“nvayavyatirekarūpā “siddhā” bhavati /
T11arhebt2u:4158: kāryasya vijātīyāt kāraṇānnotpattirityayamatrārtho 'bhimata iti manvānaḥ paraścodayannāha-
T11arhebt2u:4159: “nanu” svato “vijātīyādapi” kāraṇāt “kiñcit” kāryaṃ “bhavad dṛṣṭaṃ” tat kathaṃ na
T11arhebt2u:4161: kathaṃ yathā ityāha- “tad yathā gomayādeḥ” ādigrahaṇāt śṛṅgacandrakāntādeḥ ” śālūkādi” ādigrahaṇāccharodakādi /
T11arhebt2u:4162: tathā hi- gomayācchālūkasya bhāvaḥ śṛṅgāccharasya candrakāntādapāma /
T11arhebt2u:4163: na ca gomayādikaṃ śālūkāderna vijātīyam tat kimucyate na vijātīyādutpattiḥ iti /
T11arhebt2u:4164: siddhāntavādī parasya bhrāṃtatāṃ darśayannāha- “na vijātīyādutpattiḥ” iti /
T11arhebt2u:4165: yato hi kāraṇād yad bhavad dṛṣṭaṃ tat tato 'nyādṛśānna bhavati ityayamatrārtho vivakṣitaḥ,
T11arhebt2u:4169: ya ādiḥ prathama ārambhakṣaṇaḥ tasya kāraṇamiti kṛtvā śālūkādiprabandhasyāderna kāraṇābhedo (Hbṭ 161)
T11arhebt2u:4172: yadā tu prabandhena pūrvakṣaṇanimittānāmuttarottarakṣaṇānāṃ santānenotpattilakṣaṇā vṛttirbhavati śarasya tadā śarādbhāvaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:4173: tadevaṃ yasya prabandhādeḥ śṛṅgādibhyo bhāvo na tādṛśasya śarādeḥ yasya ca śārādestuduttarottarasya
T11arhebt2u:4174: bhāvo na tādṛśasya śṛṅgāderiti na dṛṣṭakāraṇavijātīyāt kāraṇāt tādṛśasya sambhava
T11arhebt2u:4176: yadāpi śālūkādayaḥ pūrvapūrvasvajātinibandhanā anādisantānapravṛttā iṣyante tadāpi gomayādibhyaḥ keṣāñcidbhāve 'pi tādṛśatvābhāvānna vyabhicāra iti darśayannāha- “asti ca” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:4177: yasya śālūkasantānasya gomayādi kāraṇaṃ yasya ca sarvadā svajātinimittatvaṃ tayorgomayetarajanmanoḥ śālūkayorastyeva svabhāvabhedaḥ parasparamanyādṛśatvaṃ “rūpasyābhede 'pi” sati /
T11arhebt2u:4180: yasmānnākāratulyataiva bhāvānāṃ “tattve” tādṛśatve nimittam yato gomayetarajanmanoḥ śālūkayorākārasāmyāt tādṛśatvameva syānna jātibhedaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:4182: yeṣāmapi hi samānākāratā keṣāñcidbhāvānāṃ teṣāmapi yata ākārādanyato viśeṣājjātibhedo dṛśyate tato nākārasāmyameva jātyekatve nibandhanam /
T11arhebt2u:4183: tathā hi- ākārasāmye 'pi kvacit puṣpād bhedo dṛśyate nīletarakusumayoriva sūryayoḥ,
T11arhebt2u:4190: iti pratyabhijñānaṃ sajātīyatāṃ goamayetarajanmanoḥ śālakayorūpakalpayati tathāpi vilakṣaṇasāmagrījanyatayā tayorjātibheda evāvagantavyaḥ,
T11arhebt2u:4192: tata eva pratyabhijñānasya bhrāntatayā tatkalpitasya tādṛśatvasyālīkatvāt /
T11arhebt2u:4195: yadi punargomayetarādijanmanaḥ śālūkākāderagnidhūmādijanmano vā dhūmādeḥ pratyabhijñāvaśād vilakṣaṇasāmagrīnibandhanatve 'pi samānasvabhāvataiva syāt ko doṣaḥ syāt?
T11arhebt2u:4197: yadi hi yā svajāti [lakṣaṇapratyayāntarasahitā sāmagrī yā ca] svajātinirapekṣā gomayādirūpā śālūkādeḥ,
T11arhebt2u:4198: dhūmasya vā yāgnīnadhanādilakṣaṇā yā ca śakramūrdvādisvabhāvā dhūmādyātmikā avi(kā tasyāḥ vi)
T11arhebt2u:4199: lakṣaṇāyā api sāmagryā avilakṣaṇaṃ tādṛśameva kāryaṃ dhūmaśālūkādikamutpadyeta tadā na '
T11arhebt2u:4204: tasmād yatra vilakṣaṇā sāmagrī tatra kutaścit sāmyāt sarūpatve 'pi vijātīyataiva kāryasyeti /
T11arhebt2u:4205: nanu dhūmendhanādisāmagrībhede 'pi dhūmasya na jātibhedamāmananti vidvāṃsaḥ,
T11arhebt2u:4221: tasmād indhanameva tayopādānakāraṇam agnyādisahakāripratyayāhitaviśeṣaṃ tathāvidhaṃ dhūmakāryamaṅgārādi bhinnākṛti janayatītyalamatiprasaṅgena
T11arhebt2u:4222: nanu ca yadi nāma sāmagrībhede 'pi kāryasya bhedo na jātaḥ tadā kāraṇabhede satyapi tasyābhāvāt tasyāhetukatāstu,
T11arhebt2u:4225: yadā hi sāmagrībhede satyapi kāryasya bhedo na jāta iti tasyāhetukatvam- na hi hetau
T11arhebt2u:4226: satyabhavataḥ kathañcidapi hetumattopapadyate- tadā yo 'pyasāvabhedaḥ kāryasya so
T11arhebt2u:4227: 'pi sāmagryoḥ bhinnatvādasatyabhede jāta iti kutastasyāpi hetumattā? /
T11arhebt2u:4228: yathā hi hetau satyabhavato na hetumattā tathā hetāvasatyapi bhavato hetumattā kutaḥ syāt? /
T11arhebt2u:4232: pratibhāsābhedasya ca kutaścid bhrāntinimittāt paramārthato bhede 'pyupalakṣaṇāt /
T11arhebt2u:4233: syādetat- yo hyatādṛśādapi tādṛśodbhavamicchati tasya bhedābhedayorahetukatvamiṣṭameva bhāvā eva kevalaṃ hetumanta ityata āha- “tadvyatiriktaśca” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:4234: nahi bhedābhedavyatiriktaḥ kaścid bhāvānāṃ svabhāvo 'sti yastayorahetukatve 'pi hetumān syāt /
T11arhebt2u:4239: ananyatve 'pi bhedābhedayorbhāvasvabhāvasya ca svātmanyevāvasthānāt anupakārācca kutaḥ sambandhitā? /
T11arhebt2u:4240: upakārakalpanāyāṃ ca yadi bhāvasvabhāvaḥ svahetubhya eva na kutaścid bhinno 'bhinno vā samutpanna itīṣyate,
T11arhebt2u:4241: tadā tadbhāve 'pi svabhāvānyathātvābhāvāt kuto bhinnābhinnatā bhāvasvabhāvasya syāt? /
T11arhebt2u:4244: tāvapi yadi bhinnau tadā bhāvasvabhāvastadavastha eveti na tasya kutaścit svarūpato bhedo 'bhedo vā syāt /
T11arhebt2u:4245: punastadvaśād bhedābhedakalpanāyāṃ bhāvasvabhāvasya tadavasthaṃ tādavasthyamanavasthā ca bhedābhedayoḥ /
T11arhebt2u:4246: athābhinnau tadā bhāvasvabhāva eva bhedābhedābhyāṃ kriyata iti syāt,
T11arhebt2u:4248: vāt; tasya ca hetvantarāt paścād bhavatastato 'nyatvāpatteḥ /
T11arhebt2u:4251: svahetubhya eva bhāvasvabhāvasya kutaścid bhinnābhinnātmana utpattikalpanāyāṃ vā bhedābhedayorvyatirekavatoḥ vaiyarthyam;
T11arhebt2u:4253: tasmād vaiśeṣikādikalpitayorbhedābhedayorviśeṣasāmānyātmanorayogāt bhāvasvabhāva eva bhedābhedaśabdavācyaḥ tayorahetukatve bhāvasvabhāvasyaivāhetukatvamāpatitam
T11arhebt2u:4255: ahetukatve hi bhāvānāṃ yadi kadācit sattvaṃ sarvadaiva syāt /
T11arhebt2u:4260: yasmā “dapekṣayā hi” tasyāpeṣaṇīyasya hetorbhāve bhavanto 'bhāve ca na bhavantaḥ “kādācitkāḥ” kadācidbhavā yujyante,
T11arhebt2u:4264: punarapi vilakṣaṇāyāḥ sāmagryāḥ avilakṣaṇasya kāryasyotpattau doṣāntaramāha- “vyavasthāvāṃśca”
T11arhebt2u:4266: ghaṭārthī mṛtpiṇḍameva tatra niyuṅkte na tantūn,
T11arhebt2u:4267: paṭārthī ca tantūneva na mṛtpiṇḍam ityādikaḥ sa na syāt /
T11arhebt2u:4268: kasmāt? ityāha- “kāraṇānāṃ“- sāmagrīṇāṃ yāḥ “śaktayaḥ“- ātmātiśayalakṣaṇāstāsāṃ “pratīniyame” kācideva sāmagrī kvacideva (Hbṭ 165)
T11arhebt2u:4269: kārye upayujyate nānyānyatretyevaṃrūpe “hi” yasmāt “kiñcideva” mṛdādikaṃ “kasyacideva” ghaṭādeḥ sādhanāyopādīyate “nāparaṃ” tadvilakṣaṇaṃ tantvādikam
T11arhebt2u:4272: kasmāttasyaiva tatra śaktirnānyasya ityata āha “tayoḥ” mṛdādestantvādeśca “tajjanasvabhāvatvena”
T11arhebt2u:4275: yadā tu sāmagrīṇāṃ parasparavilakṣaṇānāmapi śaktipratiniyamo neṣyate vilakṣaṇādapi
T11arhebt2u:4284: tato vilakṣaṇasāmagrījanmanaḥ kāryasya kutaścit sāmyāt sarūpasyopalakṣaṇe 'pyanyādṛśataiveti sarvastādṛśastathāvidhajanmeti siddham /
T11arhebt2u:4285: syānmatam- vilakṣaṇāyā api sāmagryāstallakṣaṇakāryajananaśaktiḥ samāneti tallakṣaṇaṃ
T11arhebt2u:4286: kāryaṃ bhaviṣyati kasyāścideva ca tathābhāvānna yathoditadoṣāvasara ityata āha “tajjananaśaktisāmye tu” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:4290: abhyupagamyāpīdamāha- “yādṛśī hyagnisahakāriṇaḥ” tadādhīyamānavikārasye “ndhanasya” svabhedena dhūmabhedahetoḥ “śaktiḥ” ātmātiśayastādṛśyeva śakramūrddhno (Hbṭ 166)
T11arhebt2u:4293: sa eva hyagnirya indhanavikāramādadhāno dhūmaṃ janayati,
T11arhebt2u:4295: yadi ca śakramūrdvāderapi evaṃ bhavatābhyupagamyate tadā kevalaṃ nāmni vivādaḥ syāt,
T11arhebt2u:4299: vā “na vyabhicarati” tadvilakṣaṇādanyato na bhavatīti kāryahetāvanvayavyatirekaniścayaḥ sidhyatīti /
T11arhebt2u:4303: tadevaṃ karyahetau yato yadbhavadṛṣṭaṃ sakṛt pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ tādṛśasya sarvasya
T11arhebt2u:4304: tathāvidhādeva janma na tadvijātīyadityekasyā api kāryavyakteḥ kutaścid bhāvadarśane
T11arhebt2u:4309: apare tu pratiṣedhyaviṣayajñānarūpeṇāpariṇāmamātmanaḥ tadanyavastuviṣayaṃ vijñānameva vābhāvasya gamakaṃ pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ pramāṇāntaramāhurmīmāṃsakāḥ
T11arhebt2u:4313: abhāvāṃśe tu nāstīti jñānaṃ janayat tadabhāvapramāṇākhyāṃ labhate,
T11arhebt2u:4320: tadevamanupalabdhau bhedaṃ gatā buddhayaḥ prativādināmiti tannirāsārthamanupalabdhisvarūpaṃ tāvadupadarśayannāha- “upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:4324: yaḥ svabhāvaḥ satsvanyeṣūpalambhapratyayeṣu san pratyakṣa eva bhavatī'tyevaṃrūpā śāstrakṛtānyatra (Hbṭ 168)
T11arhebt2u:4333: indriyatvāt tvagādivat kila prāpyakāri cakṣurityanumānataścākṣuṣo raśmirupalabhyate tasya pratyakṣato 'nupalabdhiḥ kathamabhāvavyavahāraṃ sādhayet? iti /
T11arhebt2u:4335: yadā hyupalambhapratyayāntarasākalyaṃ svabhāvaviśeṣaśca yathokta upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptirucyate na mahattvādikaṃ tadā kuto vyabhicārāvakāśaḥ?
T11arhebt2u:4338: nahi rūpādivyatiriktaṃ dravyaṃ tatpratibhāsavivekinākārāntareṇa svajñāne pratibhāsate /
T11arhebt2u:4343: tato na mahattvaṃ dravyasyopalambhakaṃ rūpaṃ vā /
T11arhebt2u:4346: na ca mahattvaṃ rūpaṃ vā dravyodayakāle 'bhyupagamyate,
T11arhebt2u:4348: tacca pratilabdhātmakameva tathātāmanubhavatīti prathame kṣaṇe dravyaṃ nirguṇameva /
T11arhebt2u:4349: na cāsya dvitīye kṣaṇe prāktanarūpatyāgo 'sti rūpāntaraṃ vāvirbhavati yataḥ prāgapratipannādhārabhāvaṃ (Hbṭ 169)
T11arhebt2u:4355: , yataḥ svotkalitaṃ kāryaṃ janayat tathā vyapadiśyate /
T11arhebt2u:4356: na caitat kṣaṇikatve sambhavati akṣaṇikatve vā prāga'nādhārasya paścādādhārābhāvaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:4357: samavāyikāraṇāsambhavādevānekadravyavattvamapyasmabhavi yasmādanekaṃ dravyamārambhakaṃ samavāyikāraṇātmanā yasya vidyate tadevaṃ vyapadiśyate
T11arhebt2u:4363: vā pratiṣedhyādanyasya sā “abhāvahetuḥ” kāryasya vyāpyasya ca “abhāvavyavahārahetuśca” /
T11arhebt2u:4365: yā tvanupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhiḥ pratyakṣānumānanivṛttilakṣaṇā sā saṃśayahetuḥ pramāṇanivṛttāvapyarthābhāvāsiddheḥ,
T11arhebt2u:4371: “atra” anupalabdhivākye yopalabdhiḥ śrūyate kriyārūpā sā yadā kartṛsthatayāpekṣyate
T11arhebt2u:4374: upalabhamānaśca buddhīndriyadehakalāpa eva ca pūrvakṣaṇasaṅgṛhīta upalabdhijanaka ucyate /
T11arhebt2u:4375: tathāhi- upalabdherjanaka āśrayo vā kartā parairucyate /
T11arhebt2u:4376: na (Hbṭ 170) cendriyāderanyasya janakatvaṃ sambhavati yato 'nvayavyatirekanibandhanaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvavyavahāraḥ,
T11arhebt2u:4377: tau cānvayavyatirekau nendriyāderanyasya sambhavataḥ satsvindriyādiṣu niyamenopalabdherbhāvāt /
T11arhebt2u:4378: yadi hīndriyādiṣu satsvapi kadācidupalabdhirnopajāyate tadā satsvapyanyeṣu sakaleṣu hetuṣu kāryānutpattiḥ kāraṇāntaravaikalyaṃ sūcayatīti tavdyatiriktakāraṇāntaraṃ parikalpyeta /
T11arhebt2u:4387: tathāhi- upalabdheravināśa eva sthitirucyate na pātābhāvaḥ tasyā gurutvābhāvāt “saṃyogābhāvena gurutvāt patanam” iti ca pareṣāṃ kṛtāntaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:4409: paryudāsena pratiṣedhyasyārthasya rvajanena yā viśiṣṭe 'rthe vṛttistayā ,
T11arhebt2u:4411: yatra vidheḥ prādhānyaṃ pratiṣedho 'rthagṛhītaḥ vidhibhāksvapadena nocyate ekavākyatā ca tatra paryudāsavṛttitā /
T11arhebt2u:4414: ityevaṃ vākyenānyopalabdhervidhānāt anyopalabdhisāmarthyādeva vivakṣitopalabdheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ pratīyate /
T11arhebt2u:4415: vivakṣitopalabdheranivartane tadapekṣayānyasyā vidhānāyogāt svapadena nañā vidhibhāṅ nocyate /
T11arhebt2u:4417: anyaśabdena paryudāsāśrayeṇānyaśabdasyaiva vākye prayogāt anyā upalabdhiranupalabdhiriti /
T11arhebt2u:4418: nañaśca subantena sāmarthyaṃ na tiṅantena ityekavākyatvaṃ '
T11arhebt2u:4421: tatra hi pratiṣedhasya prādhānyaṃ vidhirarthād gamyate vākyabhedaḥ svapadena nañā pratiṣedhabhāk sambadhyate /
T11arhebt2u:4422: tadevaṃ jñātṛdharmalakṣaṇāmanupalabdhiṃ vyākhyāya jñeyadharmalakṣaṇāṃ pratipādayannāha- “upalabhyamānadharmatve” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:4423: yadā karmasthakriyāpekṣayopalabhyamānasya vastuno dharma upalabdhirvivakṣyate tadā viṣayasvabhāva upalabdhirmantavyā /
T11arhebt2u:4426: pratiṣedhyasya ghaṭāderyadātmaviṣayaṃ vijñānaṃ tajjanane yā yogyata tallakṣaṇo viṣayasvabhāva upalabdhiśabdenocyate /
T11arhebt2u:4430: dharmadharmiṇośca bheda eva ityata āha- “yogyatāyāḥ” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:4431: yogyatā hi paramārthato bhāvarūpaiva na vasturūpāda bhidyate,
T11arhebt2u:4432: anyathā bhāvo yogya eva na syāt /
T11arhebt2u:4437: svaviṣayajñānajananayogyād yo 'nya upalambhajananayogya eva na tadviparītaḥ svabhāvo ghaṭaviviktapradeśarūpaḥ sa eva cātrānupalabdhiśabdenocyate
T11arhebt2u:4440: kathaṃ punarayaṃ naña anyārthavṛttiḥ sāmānyaśabdaḥ san ghaṭaviviktapradeśasya tajjñānasyaiva vā ghaṭaviviktasyānupalabdhitvaṃ paryudāsavṛttyā
T11arhebt2u:4445: ghaṭarūpāderupalabdhirbhavati “sa” ghaṭarūpādiḥ padārthaḥ “tatsaṃsṛṣṭaḥ” tena pradeśarūpādinā saṃsṛṣṭaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:4449: yadā hi pradeśarūpaṃ vyavadhānaviprakarṣādirahitaṃ vijñāne svākāraṃ samarpayati tadā ghaṭarūpamapi tatra tathāvidhaṃ svākāraṃ samarpayatyeva
T11arhebt2u:4450: yadi nāma yogyatā tasya tena tulyā svasvabhāvavyavasthitestu kathaṃ tatsaṃsṛṣṭatā?
T11arhebt2u:4452: ekatra hi jñāne dvāvapi tau svākāradvāreṇa saṃsṛṣṭau na sākṣāt,
T11arhebt2u:4454: kimiti punastat jñānaṃ padārthadvayākāramavaśyaṃ bhavati yatastayorjñānadvārakaḥ saṃsargaḥ?
T11arhebt2u:4456: yāvetau tulyayogyatārūpau tau yadi santau bhavatastadā naivaikākāraniyatā pratipattirbhavati /
T11arhebt2u:4458: na hyeṣa sambhavo 'sti- yattulyayogyatārūpayoreka eva pratibhāseta nāpara iti /
T11arhebt2u:4459: tathāhi- aviśiṣṭatvād yogyatāyāḥ kastatra svākāraṃ na samarpayet? /
T11arhebt2u:4466: karaṇadharma evāyaṃ yadekasminneva karmaṇi kriyāṃ niṣpādayatinānekatra,
T11arhebt2u:4473: na ca pratikṣaṇaviśarāruṣu bhāveṣu paramārthataḥ kartṛkaraṇādibhāvo yuktaḥ kriyā vā kācit /
T11arhebt2u:4474: na ca sarvakārakānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyini kārye kasyacidatiśayo 'sti yenāyaṃ kartā kā(ka)
T11arhebt2u:4479: na hyasati tulyayogyatārūpatve yugapadekendriyajanitajñānapratibhāsitā rūparasavat sambhavatīti /
T11arhebt2u:4483: ye tu 'tatrāpi pratyarthaṃ bhinnānyevaikendriyanimittānyekakālāni tadviṣayāṇāṃ yugapatsannihitānāṃ svajñāneṣu sāmarthyāviśeṣāt,
T11arhebt2u:4485: iti varṇayanti teṣāmekendriyajatvenaikāyatanaviṣayatvena caikakāleṣvekatvavyapadeśo loke tathādhyavasāyādaupacārikaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:4486: yadi nāmaikajñānasaṃsargāt tatsaṃsṛṣṭastathāpi sāmānyena sarvamanyamayaṃ nañ kinna pratipadayati?
T11arhebt2u:4488: yasmādaviśiṣṭatvādyogyatāyā yathoktena prakāreṇaikatra jñāne dvayorapi saṃsargaḥ
T11arhebt2u:4489: tasmādaviśiṣṭaṃ yogyatārūpaṃ yayoḥ tata evaikajñānasaṃsargiṇau tau tasmāt tayorevaṃrūpayoḥ
T11arhebt2u:4491: loke tu yadyapyaśeṣapadārthāntarāpekṣamanyatvaṃ nañā kvaciducyate vyāptinyāyasamāśrayāt,
T11arhebt2u:4498: sa eva yadā kevalaḥ pradeśo yathoktaghaṭāpekṣaya tasmādanya ucyate tadā ghaṭaviviktapradeśajñānaṃ vānupalabdhiḥ,
T11arhebt2u:4502: na tu tadviviktajñānameva yathāha kumārilaḥ “vijñānaṃ vānyavastuni” iti /
T11arhebt2u:4503: yathā hyanyavastuviṣayaṃ jñanamanubhūyamānaṃ pratiyogismaraṇāpekṣaṃ tadabhāvavyavahāranibandhanaṃ tathā tadviviktaḥ pradeśo 'pi /
T11arhebt2u:4505: yataḥ kealapradeśākārameva jñānaṃ mayā saṃvedyate na tu ghaṭākāramapi tasmādatra ghaṭo nāsti';
T11arhebt2u:4508: yataḥ kevalaḥ pradeśo 'yaṃ dṛśyate na tu ghaṭasahitaḥ tasmānnāstyatra ghaṭaḥ'; ityevam /
T11arhebt2u:4509: tasmādubhayornāstitājñānajanmani tulyaṃ sāmarthyamiti dvayorapi anupalabdhivyavasthā yukteti /
T11arhebt2u:4510: tatra yadā tajjñānaṃ tadā jñātṛdharmalakṣaṇānupalabdhiḥ kartṛsthakriyāpekṣayā,
T11arhebt2u:4512: evamanupalabdhiṃ paryudāsavṛttyā vyavasthāpya sādhyamasyā darśayannāha- “sā abhāvam” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:4513: sarvānyopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptavivikte 'pi pradeśādau dṛśyamāne yatra ghaṭādau pratiyoginyarthitvādibhiḥ smṛtirasya bhavati tasyābhāvaṃ sādhayati,
T11arhebt2u:4521: niḥśaṅkasya ca tatra pradeśe gamanāgamanalakṣaṇā pravṛttiriti /
T11arhebt2u:4523: atreśvarasena- kumārilayorvacanāvakāśamāśaṅkaya siddhāntavyavasthāmeva kurvatā tanmate niraste 'pyāhatya tanmatanirāsārthamāha- “kathamanyabhāva” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:4524: īśvaraseno hi manyate- kārya- svabhāvahetubhyāṃ bhāvarūpābhyāṃ anupalabdheḥ pṛthakkaraṇādavaśyamabhāvarūpatvamasyāḥ,
T11arhebt2u:4526: tvayā cānyasya pratiṣedhyaviviktasya pradeśādestajjñānasya vā bhāvarūpānupalabdhirākhyāyate tannūnamanyabhāvastadabhāvo yenaivamabhidhīyate
T11arhebt2u:4529: kumārilo 'pyevaṃ manyate- yeyaṃ jñātṛ- jñeyadharmalakṣaṇā dvidhānupalabdhirabhāvarūpā tvayocyate tasyā bhavatu nāstitājñānaṃ prati sādhanabhāvaḥ
T11arhebt2u:4530: kintu sa evānyasya pratiṣedhyaviviktasya vastunaḥ pratiṣedhyajñānādanyasya vā tajjñānasya yo bhāvo bhāvāṃśaḥ sa kathamabhāvaḥ?
T11arhebt2u:4540: na hi prasajyapratiṣedha evaiko nañarthaḥ kintu paryudāso 'pi /
T11arhebt2u:4547: vastubhūtaiva pradeśasya sādhyata iti na svabhāvahetoḥ svabhāvānupalabdhirbhidyata iti /
T11arhebt2u:4556: abhāvasya cānapekṣitasahakāriṇo anādheyātiśayatayā nāstīti jñānajanane nityaṃ tajjananaprasaṅgaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:4558: athavā tasya prasajyapratiṣedhātmana upalabdhyabhāvasya sādhanameva kiñcinna sidhyatīti /
T11arhebt2u:4573: tathā hi- abhāvāṃśo 'pi pararūpāsaṃsṛṣṭatayaivābhāva iti vyapadiśyate,
T11arhebt2u:4575: sā ca bhāvāṃśasyāpi samāneti sa evābhāvo 'stu tannimittasya samānatvāt kimanyenābhāvāṃśopagatena? /
T11arhebt2u:4577: yata (Hbṭ 177) evam “iti” tasmād “anyabhāvo 'pi” anyasya vastuno bhāvo 'pi tvadabhimato bhāvāṃśo 'pi na kevalamabhāvāṃśastvanmatyābhāva iti vyapadiśyate 'smābhiḥ /
T11arhebt2u:4578: tato bhāvāṃśasyābhāvarūpatā saṅgataiveti na kiñcid virudhyata iti /
T11arhebt2u:4579: yaduktaṃ 'jñātṛjñeyadharmalakṣaṇayā svabhāvānupalabdhyā abhāvavyavahāra eva sādhyate nābhāvaḥ';
T11arhebt2u:4583: iti dvitīye vyākhyāne pratiṣedhamātrasyānupalabdhi[ri]tyetasya sādhanaṃ darśayitumāha- “anyabhāvalakṣaṇa” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:4584: evaṃ manyate- loko hi kevalapradeśadarśanāt ghaṭābhāvameva prathamaṃ pratipadyate kevalapradeśajñānasaṃvedanadvāreṇa ghaṭajñānābhāvapratipattyā vā tato ghaṭābhāvasya vyavahāram /
T11arhebt2u:4585: tena lokapratītyanusāreṇa pratiṣedhyādanyasya pradeśasya pratiṣedhyajñānādvā tajjñānasya
T11arhebt2u:4587: ca siddho 'laṃ ghaṭābhāvaṃ sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa ca yathākramaṃ sādhayitum,
T11arhebt2u:4590: tathāhi- pāramparyeṇāpi yadanupalabdheḥ tvadabhyupagatāyāḥ siddhaṃ tat tata eva siddhaṃ bhavatīti pratiṣedhamātrasyānupalabdhitve tatsādhanapratipādane 'pi /
T11arhebt2u:4591: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- yathā bhavato jñātṛjñeyadharmalakṣaṇā bhāvarūpā dvividhānupalabdhistathā mamāpi jñātṛjñeyadharmalakṣaṇopalabdhyabhāvo 'pyanupalabdhisaṃjñito dvividho bhaviṣyati /
T11arhebt2u:4592: tatra jñeyadharmalakṣaṇenānyabhāvena pratyakṣasiddhena pratiṣedhyābhāvo jñeyadharmalakṣaṇopalabdhyabhāvarūpo 'nupalabdhisaṃjñitaḥ setsyati /
T11arhebt2u:4593: jñātṛdharmalakṣaṇena cānyabhāvena kevalapradeśajñānātmanā svasaṃvedanasiddhena jñātṛdharmaḥ pratiṣedhyajñānābhāvarūpo 'nupalabdhisamākhyātaḥ setsyati /
T11arhebt2u:4595: tatra “anyabhāvalakṣaṇa” iti pratiṣedhyāt tajjñānācca yo 'nyo bhāvaḥ pratiṣedhyaviviktaḥ
T11arhebt2u:4596: pradeśaḥ tajjñānaṃ ca tadātmako 'bhāvaḥ vivakṣitād bhāvāt pratiṣedhyād bhāvāt tajñānāccānyatvādanupalabdhitvena (Hbṭ 178)
T11arhebt2u:4600: siddho vā tadabhāvastasya pratiṣedhyasya tajjñānasya vābhāva iti evamapīṣyamāṇe “na
T11arhebt2u:4604: sādhayeditarā tu sākṣādityāha- sa viśeṣo nāsti yena viśeṣeṇānupalabdhyābhāvarūpayā
T11arhebt2u:4610: yataḥ sa eva tvadabhimato 'nyabhāvaḥ pratiṣedhyaviviktabhūtalātmakastadviṣayā copalabdhiranupalabdhitveneṣṭā
T11arhebt2u:4614: “kiṃ punaḥ” kasmāt punaḥ “abhāvasya” dvividhasya “siddhireva tadabhāvasiddhiḥ” na tatsādhyā kācidanyā vidyata ityasmanmataniṣedhārthaṃ lokātikrāntamiṣyata iti pūrvapakṣaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:4617: prathamaṃ tāvat kāraṇaṃ vivṛṇvannāha- “anyabhāvastadviviktadeśātmakastāvanna sādhanaṃ” liṅgaṃ pratiṣedhyābhāvasya,
T11arhebt2u:4622: ityāha- “yatsiddhau” yasya vastunaḥ siddhau pratītau “yasya” aparasya (Hbṭ 179)
T11arhebt2u:4623: vastuno “na siddhi“rna pratītiḥ tadvastu tasya vastuno liṅgaṃ bhavatītyayaṃ liṅgaliṅginornyāyaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:4625: yathā- yadā dhūmapratītau nāgniḥ pratīyate tadā tayorlliṅgaliṅgibhāvo bhavati,
T11arhebt2u:4628: ityata āha- “anyasya vastuno yo bhāvaḥ” svabhāva “tatsiddhyaiva” tatpratītyeva “tadabhāvaḥ”
T11arhebt2u:4631: naiyāyikāstu manyante- pratiṣedhyābhāvo hi prasajyapratiṣedhātmakastuccharūpastasya kathaṃ tadanyabhāvarūpatā?
T11arhebt2u:4634: ityata āha- “tasya” tadanyabhāvasya pradeśalakṣaṇasya tasmādanyena pratiṣedhyena ghaṭādinā “asaṃsṛṣṭarūpasya” rahitātmanaḥ kevalasya pratiṣedhyena śūnyātmanaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:4637: iti cet; na, pararūpeṇa tasyāpi tuccharūpatvāt /
T11arhebt2u:4638: yathā hyanapekṣitabhāvāntarasaṃsargaḥ prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ śūnyavikalpapratibhāsī pratiṣedhyena tuccharūpaḥ tadrūpavirahāt,
T11arhebt2u:4642: anyathā kathamasyānyabhāvatvaṃ parasya vā tatrābhāvaḥ syāt? /
T11arhebt2u:4643: yo hi yadabhāvarūpo na bhavati sa evāsau bhavati,
T11arhebt2u:4646: tasmāt sarvabhāvāḥ pararūpeṇa niḥsvabhāvāḥ svarūpeṇa rūpavattve 'pī tyanavadyam /
T11arhebt2u:4648: na kaścit, kevalamanapekṣitarūpāntaramabhāvamātraṃ prasajyapratiṣedha iti loke kathyate /
T11arhebt2u:4650: na tu rūpāntaraṃ pararūpatucchātmakaṃ na bhavati /
T11arhebt2u:4652: kathaṃ tasya prasajyapratiṣedhātmatā na syāt pararūpeṇa? /
T11arhebt2u:4655: tādātmyābhāve hi prasajyapratiṣedhasya paryudastāt pratītau tatkāraṇatve sati syāt pratipattiḥ nānyathā /
T11arhebt2u:4656: tasya tadanyāsaṃsṛṣṭarūpasya yat tattvaṃ tasya pratiṣedhyatuccharūpatāyā vyavasthāpakaṃ pramāṇaṃ pratyakṣarūpam tata eva- na taduttarakālabhāvino
T11arhebt2u:4659: tasya gṛhītagrāhitayā smṛtitvenāpramāṇatvāt- anyasya ghaṭādestatrāsato vyavacchedasyābhāvasya siddhestadabhāvātmakasyaiva pradeśasya tena grahaṇāt
T11arhebt2u:4660: dvividho hyayaṃ pradeśo ghaṭāsaṃsṛṣṭarūpsastavdyāvṛttarūpatayā tato 'nyo ghaṭavānapi,
T11arhebt2u:4662: tasya tadvivekena pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇe ghaṭādanyatvaṃ ghaṭavirahaśca gṛhīta eva bhavatīti na vastvasaṃkarasiddhyartham,
T11arhebt2u:4666: yataścānyabhāvasiddhyaiva tadabhāva uktena nyāyena siddhyati tato nānyabhāvaḥ pratiṣedhyābhāvasya liṅgam /
T11arhebt2u:4673: anyathoktena nyāyenānyabhāvasyaiva tadabhāvarūpatve tādātmyāt kathaṃ sambandhābhāvaḥ? /
T11arhebt2u:4676: “tacca tasya” ityādyasyaiva vivaraṇaṃ vyatirekamukhena “ekārthasamavāya” iti paradarśanenoktaṃ /
T11arhebt2u:4677: pareṣāṃ hi naiyāyikādīnāṃ vyatiriktāveva kṛtakānityatvākhyau dharmāvekasminneva dharmiṇi
T11arhebt2u:4678: samavetāviti kṛtakasyānityatvenaikasminnarthe dharmiṇi samavāyaḥ sambandhaḥ dhamasya veti (Hbṭ 181)
T11arhebt2u:4680: atraikarthasamavāya iti saṃyogaḥ sa eva samavāyaśabdenoktaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:4682: pareṣāṃ tvagnidhūmau svāvayaveṣveva samavetāviti na tayorekārthasamavāya ādhārādheyabhāvo veti dhūmasyāgnerupari darśanāllaukikaḥ sambandha uktaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:4685: nanu ceśvarasenena saha vicāraḥ prakrāntaḥ tat kimiti naiyāyikābhimasyāpi sambandhasyānyabhāvatadabhāvayorabhāva ucyate /
T11arhebt2u:4687: pūrvaṃ hyanyabhāvagrāhipratyakṣasiddhatvāt pratiṣedhyābhāvasya na tadarthaṃ pratyakṣāntaraṃ '
T11arhebt2u:4690: adhunā tu prasaṅgādidamucyate- yadānyabhāvagrāhipratyakṣasiddho 'yaṃ tadabhāvo na bhavati tadā pratyakṣāntaraṃ '
T11arhebt2u:4695: tataḥ kutastallakṣaṇāt sannikarṣāt tadabhāve pratyakṣaṃ bhavediti /
T11arhebt2u:4697: sambandho naivaṃ kaścid bhāvābhāvayoḥ sambandho yena “asya” tadabhāvasyānyabhāvaḥ sādhanaṃ syāt /
T11arhebt2u:4699: anyabhāvaśca pradeśākhyaḥ svāvayaveṣu yeṣu vartate na tatra ghaṭābhāvaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:4700: evaṃ hi pradeśāvayaveṣu ghaṭo nāstīti syāt na pradeśe /
T11arhebt2u:4744: samavāyopyasyānantarameva nirasta iti kutaḥ svakāraṇasattāsamavāyarūpā kāryatā tadabhāvasya syāt? /
T11arhebt2u:4748: yathā hi artho viṣayaḥ śabdo viṣayīti tayorviṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ sambandhaḥ,
T11arhebt2u:4756: tenārthena vivakṣāviparivartinā śabdasya kāryakāraṇalakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ syāt /
T11arhebt2u:4761: paro hyavinābhāvalakṣaṇaḥ śabdārthayoḥ sambandha iti vyavaharati /
T11arhebt2u:4765: nahi ghaṭābhāvapratipādanābhiprāye sati anyabhāvasya pradeśalakṣaṇasya prayogo niṣpattirbhavati,
T11arhebt2u:4766: ghaṭābhāvapratipādanābhiprāyāt prāgapi pradeśasya svahetubhya eva niṣpatteḥ /
T11arhebt2u:4771: syānmatam- yathā śabdārthayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvanimitto viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ tathā anyabhāvatadabhāvayorapi ityetāvanmātreṇa śabdārthayordṛṣṭāntatetyata āha- “siddhe hi” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:4773: tadayogāt tathehāpi yadi tadabhāvānyabhāvayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ sidhyet tadā tanmukhena
T11arhebt2u:4775: yāvatā sa eva sādhyasādhanabhāvo 'sati sambandhe kāryakāraṇabhāvādike na sidhyati,
T11arhebt2u:4784: naiva sambandhāntaranibandhano 'nyabhāvatadabhāvayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvo 'pi tu viṣayaviṣayibhāvanimitta eveti cet;
T11arhebt2u:4785: āha- “anyathā” yadi sambandhāntaraṃ neṣyate kintu viṣayaviṣayibhāvāt sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ tasmācca viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ,
T11arhebt2u:4788: kiñcānyabhāvācca liṅgabhūtādabhāvasya liṅginaḥ siddhāvanumitāviṣyamāṇāyāṃ asamudāyaśca sādhyaḥ syāt,
T11arhebt2u:4789: anyabhāvena tadabhāvasya kevalasyaiva sādhanāt na kevalasambandhābhāvāt sādhyasādhanabhāvāyogaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:4790: samudāyaśca viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvāpanno dharmadharmilakṣaṇaḥ sādhyo ya iṣṭastadabhāvadoṣaśceti 'ca'; śabdaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:4794: ityevaṃrūpe prayoge ghaṭasya sarvatra deśe sarvadā cābhāvaḥ prasajyeta /
T11arhebt2u:4795: dharmiṇi hi kvaciddharmasya guṇabhūtasya sādhane tatraiva tatkāla eva ca bhāvo yukto nānyadeti sarvatra samudāya eva sādhyo 'bhyupagantavyaḥ na kevalo dharma iti /
T11arhebt2u:4796: atrāha paraḥ- nāsamudāyasya sādhyatā anyabhāvatadabhāvayorasambandho vā /
T11arhebt2u:4800: ityevaṃ ghaṭābhāvena pradeśādirdharmī viśeṣyate saghaṭāt pradeśāderbhedenāvasthāpyata
T11arhebt2u:4801: iti tadviśeṣaṇatvaṃ prāptasādhyate na tu ghaṭo nāstītyevaṃ “kevalo” dharmiṇaḥ kasyacigduṇabhāvamanāpannaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:4807: tathā hi- śabdādidharmiṇā kṛtakatvādestādātmyalakṣaṇa eva sambandha iṣyate bhavatā /
T11arhebt2u:4811: siddhāntavādī tu sādhyadharmalakṣaṇasya liṅgino ghaṭābhāvākhyasyānyabhāvena liṅgena
T11arhebt2u:4812: sambandhābhāvaḥ prāgukto na dharmiṇā tataḥ damuttaraṃ sāṃbadhyata iti manyamāno dharmiṇāpyanyabhāvākhyasya
T11arhebt2u:4813: liṅgasya sambandhābhāvaṃ darśayannāha- “na” liṅgaliṅginorasambandho na ceti sambadhyate /
T11arhebt2u:4815: kintu liṅgaliṅginorasambandha evāsamudāyasādhanameva ca evamapi bruvataḥ /
T11arhebt2u:4818: etadeva darśayati- yatraiva hi pradeśādau dharmitayā tvayā kalpyamāne yad ghaṭādikaṃ
T11arhebt2u:4819: nāsītyucyate lokena sa eva pradeśādistena ghaṭādināsaṃsṛṣṭassaṃsargarahitaḥ “anyabhāvo”
T11arhebt2u:4820: liṅgatayeṣṭo nāparaḥ kaścit yataḥ “taddarśanādeva” ghaṭāsaṃsṛṣṭapradeśādidarśanādevāsya pratipattuḥ '
T11arhebt2u:4824: yadeva hi dṛśyamānaṃ liṅgijñānaṃ janayati tadeva liṅgamucyate /
T11arhebt2u:4827: tataḥ kathaṃ tasyaivānyabhāvasya vyāvṛttito 'pi bhedamananubhavato liṅgaliṅgibhāvo liṅgatvaṃ liṅgitvaṃ vā? /
T11arhebt2u:4833: tataḥ śabdādidharmipratipattāvapyanityatvādyapratītau kṛtakatvādinā tat sādhyata iti yuktam /
T11arhebt2u:4834: syānmatam- sāmānyaviśeṣakalpanayā liṅgaliṅgitaikasyāpi bhaviṣyatītyata āha- “na cātra” prakṛte 'nyabhāve “sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvakalpanā sambhavati“,
T11arhebt2u:4835: yena sāmānyaviśeṣavikalpena sāmānyaṃ heturbhaved viśeṣo dharmī,
T11arhebt2u:4838: kuto na sambhavatītyāha- tadviśeṣapratipattereva” ghaṭaviviktapradeśaviśeṣapratipattereva “tadabhāvasya” ghaṭābhāvasya pratīteḥ /
T11arhebt2u:4839: yataśca viśeṣa eva ghaṭābhāvapratītinibandhanaṃ tataḥ kiṃ tatra sāmānyakalpanayā kriyata iti /
T11arhebt2u:4840: sa eva viśeṣo 'nyatra vartamānaḥ sāmānyarūpatāṃ pratipatsyata iti cet,
T11arhebt2u:4841: āha- “tasya” ghaṭaviviktapradeśaviśeṣasya “anyatra” sajātīye “anvayasya” anuvṛtterabhāvāt kutaḥ sāmānyātmatā? /
T11arhebt2u:4844: yadi hi ghaṭavivikta eva pradeśaviśeṣo dharmī,
T11arhebt2u:4846: tadā pratijñāyā yo 'rtho dharmadharmisamudāyastadekadeśa eva dharmilakṣaṇo hetuḥ syāt,
T11arhebt2u:4849: atha mā bhūt eṣa doṣa iti na ghaṭavivikta eva pradeśaviśeṣo heturiṣyate,
T11arhebt2u:4850: kintu pradeśamātraṃ ghaṭaviviktatāviśeṣarahitamityata āha- “na ca yatra pradeśamātraṃ tatra ghaṭābhāvaḥ” /
T11arhebt2u:4851: saghaṭe 'pi pradeśe pradeśamātrasya bhāvādanaikāntiko hetuḥ syāt /
T11arhebt2u:4853: yādṛśo ghaṭaviviktaḥ kevalaḥ pradeśo 'grataḥ sthitastādṛśe sarvatra pradeśe ghaṭasyābhāva iti kuto 'nekāntaḥ? /
T11arhebt2u:4855: yo 'sau kevalaḥ pradeśaviśeṣo dharmitayāvasthāpitastasyaiva yat kaivalyaṃ kevala ityanena viśeṣaṇenocyate bhavatā,
T11arhebt2u:4856: ta deva ghaṭaviraho ghaṭābhāva iti kathyate /
T11arhebt2u:4857: sa ca ghaṭaviraho liṅgabhūtasya kevalasya pradeśasya pratipattāveva siddho na tūttarakālaṃ tato 'nya eva ākārāntareṇa dhūmādivāgniḥ sidhyati
T11arhebt2u:4862: yatra yatra kevalaḥ pradeśastatra tatra ghaṭavirahaḥ';
T11arhebt2u:4865: yata evaṃ tasmādanyabhāvaḥ kevalapradeśalakṣaṇaḥ sādhyasādhanayorbhedābhāvānna sādhanamabhāvasyeti sthitam /
T11arhebt2u:4866: tadevaṃ samudāyasādhyatāṃ liṅgasya ca dharmiṇāsambandhaṃ pratipādayituṃ yaduktaṃ pareṇa- '
T11arhebt2u:4869: viṣayaviṣayibhāvena tu sambandhapratipādane niraste paro 'nyathā sambandhaṃ sādhyasādhanayorddarśayannāha- “astya“nyabhāvatadabhāvayoḥ sambandho virodhākhyaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:4871: siddhāntavādī tu sādhyasādhanayorvirodhamevāsambhāvayan pṛcchati- “kena kasya virodhaḥ” iti /
T11arhebt2u:4873: paro virodhamabhiprāyanabhijñatayā darśayati- “anyabhāvena” kevalapradeśātmanā “pratiyogino” yasyābhāvaḥ pramātumiṣṭo ghaṭādestasyeti /
T11arhebt2u:4874: parasyaivaṃvādino asambandhābhidhāyitāmādarśayannāha- “kiṃ nu vai pratiyogī” ghaṭādiḥ pramātumiṣṭo yena pratiyoginaḥ prameyatvena liṅgaliṅginorvirodhaḥ sambandho 'bhidhīyate? /
T11arhebt2u:4875: naiva pratiyogī pramātumiṣṭaḥ kintu tadabhāva iti cet,
T11arhebt2u:4877: [kumārilastu manyate bhavāṃśādbhinno ']yamabhāvāṃśastato nānyabhāva eva tadabhāva iti kathaṃ tatpratipattireva tadabhāvapratipattiriti /
T11arhebt2u:4879: na cāvastuno bhedaḥ sambhavati ato 'yaṃ vasturūpa eva / yadāha-
T11arhebt2u:4887: “tasyā“nyasya pradeśasya kevalasya yat tat “kaivalya” mekākikatvamasahāyatā tadeva
T11arhebt2u:4889: bhāvāṃśa eva tvadabhimataḥ “tadabhāvaḥ” pratiyogyabhāvāṃśo na tataḥ pṛthagbhūtaṃ
T11arhebt2u:4891: tataśca “tatpratipattireva ca” tasyānyabhāvasya pratipattireva ca “tadapratipattiḥ” tasya pratiyogino 'pratipattirabhāvapratipattiriti yāvat
T11arhebt2u:4892: evaṃ manyate- yo 'yamabhāvāṃśo bhāvāṃśāt pṛthagbhūto vastuno dharmaḥ parikalpyate sa ghaṭādyabhāvātmakatāṃ tadrūpavaikalyādevānubhavati nānyathā
T11arhebt2u:4895: nahi yad yadrūpavikalaṃ na bhavati tat tato 'nyatvamanubhavati,
T11arhebt2u:4900: sarvasya ca sarvatropayogaḥ syādityavaśyamanyavastuno bhāvarūpatā tadanyābhāvātmikaiva /
T11arhebt2u:4902: tatsaṃyoga eva cendriyasya tadanyābhāvasaṃyoga iti kimucyate-
T11arhebt2u:4907: pratyakṣeṇa tadākārotpattyā tadanyabhāvātmake eva vasturūpe pratipanne pāścātyasya (Hbṭ 189)
T11arhebt2u:4909: vistarataścāyamabhāvavicāraḥ pramāṇadvitvasiddhāvabhāvaṃ prameyaṃ pramāṇaṃ ca vicārayatā vihita iti tata evāvavadhārya iti /
T11arhebt2u:4914: yadi tatpratipattireva tadabhāvapratipattiriti neṣyate tadā “tasya” anyavastunaḥ
T11arhebt2u:4916: “tatpariccheda eva na syāt“- tasya tadanyavastunaḥ svarūpapratipattireva na syāt /
T11arhebt2u:4919: yaccātadrūpaṃ tadrūpaṃ na bhavati pararūpaṃ tayoḥ “avivekād” avivecanād vivekenāvyavasthāpanādasāṅkaryeṇāprasādhanāt /
T11arhebt2u:4920: sakalapararūpāsaṅkirṇaṃ hi tadrūpam taccet tatsāmarthyabhāvinā pratyakṣeṇa tathā nānukṛtaṃ kevalaṃ sammugdhākārameva tadutpannaṃ tadā kathantena tatparicchedaḥ syāt? /
T11arhebt2u:4921: na hi yadrūpaṃ yadvastu tadrūpānanukāriṇā jñānena tatparicchedo yukto yathā- śukuśaṅkharūpānanukāriṇā kāmalinaḥ pītaśaṅkhāvabhāsinā jñāneneti
T11arhebt2u:4926: ityata āha- “ya eṣa vyavahāraḥ” sarvajanapratitaḥ “kasyacid” agnyādervastuno darśanāt
T11arhebt2u:4927: “kvaciddeśe” tatsambandhini “prāptyartho” dṛṣṭasyādṛṣṭasya ca “parihārārthaḥ” pravṛttinivṛttilakṣaṇaḥ “sa na syāt” /
T11arhebt2u:4929: “na hi” yasmād “ayaṃ” pratipattā “analaṃ paśyannapi” saṅkīrṇatadadrūpapratibhāsinā pratyakṣeṇa,
T11arhebt2u:4931: tathā hi- asaṅkīrṇasyādarśane saṅkīrṇamapi yadi na paśyet tadā loṣṭādiprakhyaṃ kathaṃ kasyacidetaddarśanaṃ syāt? /
T11arhebt2u:4935: tataḥ kathaṃ “salilārthī tatra” agnimati pradeśe “na pravarteta”? /
T11arhebt2u:4939: tato jñānadvayena tadatadrūpayorvivekālloke pravṛttinivṛttilakṣaṇaḥ pratiniyato vyavahāraḥ sidhyatīti /
T11arhebt2u:4941: kadācit paro brūyāt salilopalambhavirahamātramityata āha- “yadi salila” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:4946: kintu yo 'sāvātmanaḥ pratiṣedhyavastupratibhāsijñānātmanāpariṇāmaḥ sa tadanyavastupratibhāsijñānasahacarito 'bhyupagantavyo na kevala iti paramabhyupagamayitumasyopanyāsaḥ
T11arhebt2u:4949: na ca tadanyavastuvijñānapariṇāmādanya eva tasyāpariṇāmo nāma bhavato 'bhimato bhāvāntarasyaivābhāvatvenopagatatvāt /
T11arhebt2u:4950: tulyayogyatārūpasyaikajñānasaṃsargiṇa eva cānyavastuno vijñānaṃ tathopeyaṃ nānyasya,
T11arhebt2u:4954: rūpāntarāvabhāsitve hi tasya salilopalambhābhāva eva na sidhyet /
T11arhebt2u:4960: atha na tasya pratipattirūpateṣyate kintu taddhetubhāva ityata āha- “pratipattiheturvā” iti /
T11arhebt2u:4961: nahi sarvasāmarthyavirahalakṣaṇasyābhāvasya pratipattiṃ prati hetubhāvo yuktaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:4962: hetubhāve vā tasyānapekṣitasahakāriṇo nityaṃ tajjñānajananādabhāvajñānamevaikaṃ pratipattuḥ syāt,
T11arhebt2u:4964: na cājñātasyāsya nāstitājñānajananaṃ yuktamityāha- “tasyāpi” salilopalambhābhāvasya kathaṃ pratipattiḥ? /
T11arhebt2u:4965: athāyaṃ salilopalambhābhāvaḥ svayamapratīta eva salilābhāvapratītiṃ janayati tadā kasyacidapi /
T11arhebt2u:4969: tatrāpi tadaṅgīkaraṇe cātmano 'pariṇāmasya tadātmakatvānna tato bhedena vyavasthāpyeta /
T11arhebt2u:4970: tataśca kasyacidapi tasya tadanyasya vāpratipattāvapi yadyabhāvaḥ salilādeḥ pratīyate tadā svāpādyavasthāsvapi salilādyabhāvaḥ kiṃ na pratīyate?
T11arhebt2u:4980: iti nādhyavasyati anadhyavasyaṃśca salilarūpasyāpi pratibhāsanāt tadarthī “na tiṣṭhet” pravarteta “nāpi pratiṣṭheta” salilārthī na pravarteta
T11arhebt2u:4981: tathāhi- salilaṃ nāma taducyate yat sarvodanyāsantāpādyapanayanakṣamaṃ sakalatadanyarūpāsaṃkīrṇapratiniyatākārajñānāvabhāsi /
T11arhebt2u:4985: na mayā salilopalambhanivṛttimātrāt tu ccharūpāt tadabhāvagatirucyate,
T11arhebt2u:4987: kintu yadetadekasya kevalasyānalasya darśanaṃ tata evānyasya tatrāpratibhāsamānasya salilasyābhāvagatirbhavati '
T11arhebt2u:4997: tathāhi- anala iva salilamapi yadi tatrābhaviṣyat tadapyanalavad darśane pratyayabhāsiṣyata tayoḥ svajñānaṃ pratyaviśiṣṭatvād yogyatāyā naikasya pratibhāso yuktaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:4998: tasmādekapratibhāsanamanyābhāvanāntarīyakaṃ ityanyābhāve tato jñānamutpadyate anyavastuni ca vijñānaṃ nāstīti jñānaṃ janayati /
T11arhebt2u:5000: tadrūpatayaiva ca tajjñānamanyat pratiyadevaṃ vyapadiśyate 'nyathā tadayogādityanyapratipattireva tadabhāvavikalpaheturiti siddhāntavādyāha- “idameva” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:5001: nanvasmābhiridameva prāgabhihitaṃ “tayoḥ satoḥ naikarūpaniyatā pratipattiḥ asambhavāt” ityādibhirvacanaiḥ /
T11arhebt2u:5002: tato yadevānyāsaṃsargiṇaḥ kevalasya pratibhāsanaṃ tadeva tadanyābhāvasyāpi,
T11arhebt2u:5004: tataḥ pratyakṣāvabhāsitatvāt tadabhāvasya tabdalāt pāścātyaṃ vyavahārapravartanarūpaṃ nāstitājñānaṃ vikalpakamājāyate /
T11arhebt2u:5006: yatastadanyavastuni vijñānaṃ pratyakṣātmakamapyanavagate tadanyābhāve jñānaṃ janayat pṛthagabhāvapramāṇatayā vyavasthāpyeta /
T11arhebt2u:5007: tathā hi- tadanyākāraśūnya eva tadekajñānākāraḥ saṃvedyate /
T11arhebt2u:5013: iti pāścātyo vikalpo vyavahārapravartanamātraṃ na tataḥ pṛthak pramāṇaṃ yathoktaṃ prāk,
T11arhebt2u:5014: tathā nāstitājñānamapi vikalpakaṃ tatphaṃladvāreṇa vānyavastuvijñānaṃ na pratyakṣāt pṛthagabhāvākhyaṃ pramāṇamiti /
T11arhebt2u:5016: tadeva tvayāpyabhidhīyata iti kasmāt paruṣamivābhāti yatastadanabhyupagamena pṛthagabhāvākhyaṃ pramāṇamabhyupagatamityupahasati /
T11arhebt2u:5017: tathā hyagatyedānīṃ tvayocyate na madhyasthatayā anyathedameva kiṃ na pūrvamevābhihitam?
T11arhebt2u:5018: , yata ālajālabhidhānenātmā parikleśita ityupasaṃharannāha- ” tasmāt tīrādarśineva” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:5019: yathā kila vahanārūḍhairvarṇigbhiḥ śakunirmucyate api nāma tīraṃ drakṣyatīti /
T11arhebt2u:5020: sa yadā sarvataḥ paryaṭaṃstīreṃ nāsādayati tadā vahanamevāgacchati tadvadetadapi draṣṭavyam /
T11arhebt2u:5021: yataścāvaśyabhyupagamanīyo 'yaṃ pakṣastasmānna kiñcidanayāvidyamānapratiṣṭhānayā diśaḥ pratipattyā prayojanam /
T11arhebt2u:5028: iti prasādhayatā kumārilaparikalpitaḥ kasyacidabhāvaniścayārthamabhāvapramāṇavādaḥ prasaṅgato nirastaḥ samprati tu-
T11arhebt2u:5032: yadi hi “ekasya” kevalasya paricchedādanyasya “vyavacchedaḥ” pratiṣedhaḥ sidhyati tadā sarvasyā a(syā)
T11arhebt2u:5034: na tu viśeṣaparigraheṇa tulyā svajñānajananaṃ prati yogyāvasthā yasya tasyaiveti /
T11arhebt2u:5035: tathā hi- asau yathā tulyayogyatārūpapadārthaviviktarūpa upalabhyate,
T11arhebt2u:5038: tataśca tadviviktākāratayā tadanyābhavasādhane viśeṣābhāvāt pradeśarūpajñānaṃ ghaṭābhavamiva rasādyabhāvamapi sādhayet,
T11arhebt2u:5044: yato ye 'pyanupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptāsteṣāmapi tatra deśe tadekākāratayā jñānasya vyavacchedo bhavatyeva /
T11arhebt2u:5045: tathā hi- yathopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptāstadekākāravati jñāne na pratibhāsante tataśca vyavacchidyante tathānupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptā apīti kim '
T11arhebt2u:5047: evaṃ pūrvapakṣe vyavasthite yadi tadanyavyavacchedaḥ- tataḥ pṛthakkaraṇamanyatvena vyavasthāpanamabhimataṃ tadabhyupagamyata eva /
T11arhebt2u:5050: yena hi sāmarthyena tulyayogyatārūpasyopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya cābhāvaṃ sādhayati na tatsāmarthyamatulyayogyatārūpe 'nupalbdhilakṣaṇaprāpte vā sambhavati /
T11arhebt2u:5054: yat puro 'vasthitaṃ pratyakṣe 'vabhāsate tasyaikasyātmanaḥ pratiniyatasya rūpasya
T11arhebt2u:5055: paricchedāt tadākārotpattyā vidhivikalpotpādanena ca yaḥ “tadanyaḥ” tato 'nyastadvayatiriktastasya
T11arhebt2u:5058: kathaṃ punarekātmaparicchedādeva tasya tadanyātmano vyavacchedaḥ pratyakṣeṇa kriyate?
T11arhebt2u:5060: yattu tadvayatiriktamaśeṣapadārthajātaṃ tadātmanastasya puro 'vasthitasya kathaṃ tavdyavacchedakam?
T11arhebt2u:5068: tasmin pararūpāsaṃkīrṇe svabhāvata eva tadātmaniyato yaḥ pratibhāsaḥ pararūpapratibhāsāsaṃkīrṇaḥ
T11arhebt2u:5069: tadekapadārthasāmarthyabhāvini pratyakṣe pararūpapratibhāsāyogāt tasya bhrāntatāpattyā pratyakṣātāhāneḥ /
T11arhebt2u:5071: tasya tadātmaniyatapratibhāsaya jñānāt pratyakṣeṇa svasaṃvittyā saṃvedanāt /
T11arhebt2u:5072: tatsaṃvedanameva hi pratyakṣasyātadrūpād “vyavacchedanaṃ” pṛthakkaraṇaṃ tabdalenaiva ca pāścātyaḥ '
T11arhebt2u:5077: yadi nāma tadātmaniyatapratibhāsajñānaṃ tathāpi kathamanyātmanaḥ tasya pṛthakkaraṇam?
T11arhebt2u:5079: yasmāttasya vastuno ya ātmā pararūpāsaṃkīrṇaḥ sa tadanyasya śeṣasya vastuna ātmā na bhavati,
T11arhebt2u:5087: tadāsya viṣayasyānyātmanaḥ sakāśādavyavacchede pṛthagavyavasthāpane parātmano 'pi tatra paricchedaḥ syāt,
T11arhebt2u:5092: ca” agrataḥ sthitaṃ deśakālasvabhāvāvasthāniyataṃ tadanyadeśādibhyo vyāvṛttātmanaḥ
T11arhebt2u:5097: kasmātpunaranyadeśāditāṃ tataḥ pṛthagavasthāpayati ityata āha- “evaṃ hi” yasmādanyadeśatādestataḥ pṛthakkaraṇe sati taddeśādiniyataḥ padārthaḥ paricchinno bhavati,
T11arhebt2u:5099: yadyanyathābhāvo 'nyadeśāditā tadrūpānanukārāvdyavacchinnaḥ- bhavati tathātvaṃ ca taddeśādiniyatatvaṃ ca,
T11arhebt2u:5101: yata evam “iti” tasmādanyathābhūtādanyadeśādimatastathābhūtaṃ taddeśādimaṃtaṃ “vyavacchindatyeva” nivartayantyeva tat paricchinattīti pūrvakasyopasaṃhāraḥ
T11arhebt2u:5102: tathā “tathābhūtādanyathābhūtaṃ vyavacchindatyeva” iti dvitīyasyopasaṃhāraḥ kārya iti /
T11arhebt2u:5103: “evam” uktena nyāyena “ekasya” pramāṇasya pratyakṣasyānumānasya vā tasyāpyevameva
T11arhebt2u:5112: taddhi pratyakṣaṃ vidhipratiṣedhavikalpau yadā svaviṣaye janayati tadaivāsya sāphalyam,
T11arhebt2u:5116: syānmatam- dvairāśyasādhane 'pyasāṃkaryasiddhyarthā mā bhūdabhāvapramāṇakalpanā kintu prakārāntarābhāvasiddhyarthā bhaviṣyati /
T11arhebt2u:5117: na hi tadabhāvasiddhau pratyakṣasya kaścid vyāpāraḥ pratipādita iti ata āha “tadvyatirikte“tyādi /
T11arhebt2u:5118: tasmāt paridṛśyamānād vyatiriktasyāśeṣasya vastuno vyavacchedena tataḥ pṛthakkaraṇenānyatvena yā vyāptistatsādhanādeva prakārāntarasya tattvānyatvabahirbhūtasyābhāvaḥ sidhyati /
T11arhebt2u:5120: atha matam- sarvasyāparidṛṣṭasya dṛśyamānādanyatayā vyāptiṃ naivaṃ pratyakṣaṃ sādhayati tat kutastṛtīyarāśyabhāvaḥ pratyakṣata eva syāt,
T11arhebt2u:5121: yato 'bhāvaprāmāṇyakalpanā vyarthā bhavedityata āha- “tasya” tṛtīyarāśitayā kalpyamānasya
T11arhebt2u:5122: tato dṛṣṭādanyatayā vyāptyabhāve “tena” pratyakṣeṇa “tato“'rthāt svaviṣayasya “avyavacchedā” dapṛthakkaraṇāt,
T11arhebt2u:5123: tadarthasya ca rāśyantaratvena kalpyamānasya svaviṣayādavyavacchedāt apṛthakkaraṇāt punarapi bhāvasya svaviṣayasyāparicchedaprasaṅgāt /
T11arhebt2u:5124: sa hi tadviṣayaḥ sakalapararūpāsaṃkīrṇātmā yadi tenātmanā na paricchinnaḥ kathaṃ tena tasya paricchedaḥ? /
T11arhebt2u:5125: tenātmanā paricchede vā kathaṃ sarvasya tadanyatayā vyāptyasādhanam?
T11arhebt2u:5135: evamekasya pramāṇasya vyāpāra eṣo 'nantarokta iti tamevopasaṃhṛtya sukhapratipattaye
T11arhebt2u:5137: tadanyasmāt “pārūpād vyavacchinatti” tataḥ pṛthakkaroti tadasaṃkīrṇarūpatayā pratipadyate,
T11arhebt2u:5138: paramārthatastasya tadrūpatvāt yathāvastu ca pratyakṣeṇa rūpānukārāt /
T11arhebt2u:5141: tathā “tadanyadeva ca” tasmād dṛśyamānādanyadeva ca vyavacchinatti /
T11arhebt2u:5147: anyasya pararūpasya tatra khālambane 'paricchedādavaśyamevāparicchinnasya paricchinnādanyatvaṃ bhavati /
T11arhebt2u:5148: yata evamataḥ “tad” eva pramāṇamekavastuparicchedakaṃ prakārāntarābhāvaṃ sādhayati,
T11arhebt2u:5151: tasmiṃ dṛśyamāne vastuni dṛṣṭatadanyatvena tasyānyasya tatrāparicchidyamānasyānyatvaṃ
T11arhebt2u:5152: tadanyatvaṃ dṛṣṭāt tadanyatvaṃ “dṛṣṭatadanyatvaṃ” tena sarvasya tavdyatiriktasya
T11arhebt2u:5154: tadanyasyaiva ca yadanyanna bhavati puro 'vasthitaṃ sakalaparabhāvavyāvṛttaṃ tasyaiva tattvena dṛśyamānaprakāratayā vyavasthāpanāditi /
T11arhebt2u:5157: tadviparītarūpaṃ sarvaṃ svaviṣayād vyavacchindatī dvairāśyaṃ tṛtīyaprakārābhāvaṃ
T11arhebt2u:5158: ca sādhayatīti ye kecidanyonyavyacchedarūpāḥ kramākramanityānityādayaḥ te vyākhyātāḥ /
T11arhebt2u:5159: (Hbṭ 199) tathā hi- kāryasya kramamananyasahāyatāṃ pratiyatyeva buddhistasyākramaṃ kāryāntarasāhityaṃ tataḥ pṛthakkaroti /
T11arhebt2u:5160: tataḥ kramākramatayā dvaitasiddheḥ tṛtīyasya prakārasya sambhavo nirasto bhavati /
T11arhebt2u:5162: evamudayānantaradhvaṃsitā kṣaṇikatocyate iti pratīyatī vyavasthāpanākāla eva buddhistadviparītarūpatāyāḥ
T11arhebt2u:5165: uktena nyāyena “ekasya” pratiniyatātmana upalambhāt tasyopalabhyamānasya yastato
T11arhebt2u:5168: tathā tasya svaviṣayasya tadanyātmatāyā bhāvapradhānatvānnirddeśasya “vyavacchedo bhavati” asāṅkaryaṃ sidhyati /
T11arhebt2u:5169: tad yadyetadaviśeṣeṇānyasya sarvasya tannābhāvasiddhiḥ syādityatrābhimataṃ tadā siddhasādhanam,
T11arhebt2u:5170: yataḥ sarvamaviśeṣeṇaiva tadekākārayā budhyā tadrūpavikalaṃ svaviṣayādavacchidyate,
T11arhebt2u:5172: atha taddeśakālayorabhāvaḥ sarvasya tadviparītarūpasya vyavacchedo 'bhimataḥ sa na
T11arhebt2u:5173: yukta iti darśayati- “na taddeśakālayoḥ” yatrāsau pratiniyatātmā sakalatrailokyavilakṣaṇaḥ
T11arhebt2u:5174: padārtha upalabhyate tatra sarvasyānyasya bhāvasya tattulyayogyatārūpasyetarasya
T11arhebt2u:5176: yena hi kāraṇena tattulyayogyatārūpasya tatrāpratibhāsamānasya pratiṣedhastasmin
T11arhebt2u:5177: sati tadekarūpaniyatāyāḥ pratipatterasaṃbhavāt tadabhāvanāntarīyikā sā bhāvantī tatpratiṣedhaṃ
T11arhebt2u:5178: gamayatīti tatkāraṇamanupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpte tadatulyayogyatārūpe ca na sambhavatīti
T11arhebt2u:5182: prasādhitaḥ syāt “taddeśakālaśca” tasya pratibhāsamānasya yau deśakālau tau yasya, sa ca syāt /
T11arhebt2u:5185: nahi rūpapratibhāsinā jñānena tadrūpavikalasya rasasya svaviṣayāt pṛthakkaraṇe 'pi tadasāṃkaryasādhane 'pi taddeśakālayorabhāvaḥ sidhyati /
T11arhebt2u:5195: sa evānyabhāvastadviṣayā copalabdhiḥ tadabhāvasya kiṃ na sādhanam';
T11arhebt2u:5196: iti tatrānyabhāvasya tadabhāvaṃ prati liṅgatve niraste tadviṣayāyā upalabdhernirākurvannāha- “anyābhāvaviṣaye“tyādi /
T11arhebt2u:5202: yataḥ tatrāpyanyabhāvaviṣayāyāmupalabdhāva'bhāvasya pṛthaganyabhāvāt sādhyatve kalpyamāne sambandhābhāvasya tadabhāvena tulyatvāt /
T11arhebt2u:5203: na hi tasyā api anyabhāvarūpāyāḥ tadabhāvena kaścidekārthasamavāyādirūpaḥ sambandho 'stīti /
T11arhebt2u:5206: “avirbhāvakāla eva” janmakāle pratītikāla eva vā tadabhāvasiddheśca /
T11arhebt2u:5208: tadeva sādhayati- na hyanyasya tadviviktasya bhāvaṃ pratipadya pratipattā punaruttarakālaṃ
T11arhebt2u:5212: tadanyaṃ tadviviktarūpaṃ pratipadyamāna eva tasya pratiyogino 'bhāvaṃ pratipadyate,
T11arhebt2u:5214: tathā hi- saghaṭapradeśāsaṃkīrṇarūpasya kevalapradeśasya darśanameva ghaṭābhāvadarśanam /
T11arhebt2u:5234: atha tadviviktopalabdhisāmānyaṃ heturūcyate- yatra yatra ghaṭaviviktabhūtalopalabdhistatra
T11arhebt2u:5235: tatra ghaṭābhāvo yathā pūrvānubhūte ghaṭavivikte pradeśa ityāha- “sāmānyena pradarśane
T11arhebt2u:5236: kriyamāṇe” dṛṣṭānte 'pi pūrvānubhūtaghaṭavivikte pradeśe ghaṭābhāvasya prasādhakaṃ
T11arhebt2u:5238: kiṃ tu saiva tadanyabhāvopalabdhiḥ sādhyadharmasya tadabhāvalakṣaṇasya sādhikā /
T11arhebt2u:5239: (Hbṭ 202) sā ca yathā sādhyadharmiṇi tadabhāvasiddhye dṛṣṭāntamapekṣate tathā dṛṣṭānte 'pi /
T11arhebt2u:5250: yastvamūḍho viṣayapratipattau viṣayiṇaṃ smaratyeva tasyābhāvavyavahāraḥ pratyakṣanibandhana eveti na tatrānupalabdherliṅgateti sucarccitamevānyatretīhālaṃ prasaṅgeneti /
T11arhebt2u:5254: siddhe tatprasādhakena pramāṇena kāryakāraṇabhāve sati kāraṇasyānupalabdhiḥ /
T11arhebt2u:5257: tathā, vyāpyavyāpakabhāvasiddhau satyāṃ tatprasādhanapramāṇabalenaiva siddhābhāvasyaiva vyāpakasya nānyasya vyāpakānupalabdherevāsiddhatāprasaṅgād
T11arhebt2u:5260: kathaṃ punaḥ kāraṇavyāpakayorabhāvavyavahāraḥ sidhyati yatastayoḥ siddhābhāvatocyata ityāha- “tatra kāraṇavyāpakayorapi” na kevalaṃ yasya sākṣādabhāvavyavahāraḥ sādhyate /
T11arhebt2u:5266: atha kiṃ svabhāvānupalabdhāvapyabhāvo liṅgatayā sādhyata ityāha- “svabhāvānupalabdhau tu” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:5269: atra parasya vacanāvakāśamāśaṅkayāha- “yadi” tarhi “kāraṇavyāpakau” siddho 'savdyavahāro yayoḥ tau santau /
T11arhebt2u:5272: anyasya kāryasya vyāpyasya vābhāvamabhāvavyavahāraṃ ca sādhayataḥ /
T11arhebt2u:5274: sādhikā nānyathā ityevamiṣyamāṇe sati kathaṃ tayoḥ kāraṇavyāpakānupalabdhyoḥ parokṣe
T11arhebt2u:5276: yadā kāryasvabhāvahetvorvyatirekaprayogaḥ kriyate- yatra yatrāgnirnāsti tatra tatra dhūmo 'pi nāsti,
T11arhebt2u:5277: tathā yatra yatra vṛkṣo nāsti kṣaṇikatā vā tatra tatra śiṃśapā nāsti sattvaṃ vā ityaśeṣapadārthaparigraheṇa vyatirekaprayoge sati /
T11arhebt2u:5280: tataśca kathaṃ tadviviktopalabdhilakṣaṇānupalabdhiḥ pratiyogino vopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatā siddhā? /
T11arhebt2u:5281: tathā ca kathamaśeṣopasaṃhāreṇa vyāptyā kāryasvabhāvahetvo 'rvyatirekaḥ sidhyet? /
T11arhebt2u:5286: siddhāntavādyāha- “naiva” parokṣe 'rthe kāraṇavyāpakānupalabdhyoḥ “prayogo” vyatirekopadarśanakāle “pramāṇatayā” kāraṇasya vyāpakasya vānupalabdhiḥ pramāṇabhūtā naiva prayujyate /
T11arhebt2u:5288: “liṅgasya” kāraṇavyāpakānupalabdhilakṣaṇasya tadabhāvalakṣaṇasya vā “aniścayāt” tadanupalabdhyoḥ sandeharūpatvāt tadabhāvasya ca sandigdhatvāt
T11arhebt2u:5292: pūrvoktena pramāṇena vyāpyavyāpakabhāvasādhakena ca tadutpattilakṣaṇe tādātmyalakṣaṇe
T11arhebt2u:5293: ca sambandhe sādhite siddhasambandhayoryadyabhāvo yatra yatrā bhāvaḥ syāt parasyāpi
T11arhebt2u:5296: taddvāreṇa pratibandhaprasādhake pramāṇe smṛtiḥ kathaṃ nāma syādityetasyārthasya darśanārthamete kāraṇavyāpakānupalabdhī prayujyete iti /
T11arhebt2u:5297: darśanādarśanabalena tu sādhane yatraivaikadarśane paro dṛṣṭo 'darśane vā na dṛṣṭaḥ tatraiva tasya bhāvo 'bhāvo vā bhavatu sarvatra tu kasmād bhavati? /
T11arhebt2u:5298: na hyapratibaddhātmanāṃ gavāśvādīnāṃ kvacit tathābhāvadarśane 'pi sarvatra tathābhāvo bhavati,
T11arhebt2u:5299: puruṣasya tu sarvadā kvacidekabhāvābhāvayoraparasya bhāvābhāvādarśanaṃ yadṛcchāsaṃvādaḥ sambhāvyeta asati pratibandhe / tathā cāha-
T11arhebt2u:5304: na cāsau vyāptyānvayavyatirekopadarśanamantareṇa khyāpayituṃ śakyata iti '
T11arhebt2u:5307: pratibandhe hi pramāṇasiddhe satyavaśyameva yatra yatra kāryaṃ tatra tatra kāraṇam,
T11arhebt2u:5308: yatra yatra tadabhāvaḥ tatra tatra ca kāryasyāpyabhāvo 'nyathā kāraṇamantareṇa kāryasya bhāve tasyāhetutaiva syāt /
T11arhebt2u:5310: tathā yatra yatra yatsvabhāvastatra tatra tadbhāvaḥ anyathā tasya nairātmyameva syāditi
T11arhebt2u:5311: vyāptyaivānvayavyatirekopadarśane pratibandhaḥ khyāpayituṃ śakyate nānyatheti prāgeva
T11arhebt2u:5314: evaṃ kāryasvabhāvānupalabdhilakṣaṇe eva pakṣadharme tatsādhakapramāṇasadbhāvādanvayavyatirekasadbhāvo nānyatreti pratipādyopasaṃharannāha- (Hbṭ
T11arhebt2u:5316: yataśvānvayavyatirekavān pratibandhaprasādhakapramāṇasadbhāvāduktena nyāyena “iti” tasmāt “tadaṃśena vyāpto“'nvayavyatirekaniścayenaiva tadaṃśavyāpterniścayād yathoktaṃ prāk,
T11arhebt2u:5317: tataśca tadaṃśavyāptivacanāt trilakṣaṇa eva “trirūpa eva” trividha eva heturgamako
T11arhebt2u:5318: nānyalakṣaṇo 'nyo vā yathoktatrairūpyasadbhāve rūpāntarasya vaiyarthyāt yathoktatrairūpyābhāve
T11arhebt2u:5320: kasmāt trilakṣaṇa eva trividha eva heturgamako nānyalakṣaṇo 'nyo veti darśayati “svasādhyadharmāvyabhicārād” iti trilakṣaṇasyaiva svasādhyadharmāvyabhicārāt
T11arhebt2u:5321: svasādhyadharmāvyabhicāra eva ca gamakatvamiti rūpāntarakalpanā vyarthā /
T11arhebt2u:5324: ityasya trilakṣaṇa eva “sa heturaḥvinābhāvasya” svasādhyadharmāvyabhicārasya “niyamād” avaśyantayā sadbhāvāt pratibandhanimittatadaṃśavyāptyanabhyupage
T11arhebt2u:5326: vikalpyamānā hetvābhāsā avinābhāvasya svasādhyadharmāvyabhicārasya teṣvabhāvādityaparo 'rtho darśita iti /
T11arhebt2u:5329: iti tatra pareṣāṃ vipratipattiṃ darśayannāha- “ṣaḍlakṣaṇo heturityapare” naiyāyika- mimāṃsakādayo manyante /
T11arhebt2u:5333: abādhitaḥ pramāṇenānirākṛto viṣayaḥ sādhyadharmalakṣaṇo yasya sa tathoktaḥ tasya bhāvaḥ tattvamaparaṃ rūpam /
T11arhebt2u:5336: tadekasaṃkhyaṃ vivakṣitamekasaṃkhyaṃ hetudravyamāśrayatvena yasya hetusāmānyasya tadvivakṣitaikasaṃkhyaṃ tadbhāvo 'paraṃ rūpam /
T11arhebt2u:5337: yadyekasaṃkhyāvyāvacchinnāyāṃ pratiheturahitāyāṃ hetuvyaktau hetutvaṃ bhavati tadā gamakatvaṃ na tu pratihetusahitāyāmapi dvisaṃkhyāyuktāyāmiti
T11arhebt2u:5338: yadi viruddhāvyabhicāryaparaṃ hetvantaraṃ nopadarśyata iti yāvat /
T11arhebt2u:5340: nahyajñāto hetuḥ svasattāmātreṇa gamako yuktaḥ iti /
T11arhebt2u:5341: tatraiteṣu rūpāntareṣu yadetabādhitaviṣayatvaṃ nāma tat tāvat pratibandhanibandhanānvayavyatirekātmakāvinābhāvasambhave sati tataḥ pṛthaganyallakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati /
T11arhebt2u:5345: tathā hi- satyapyavinābhāve yathokte bādhāsambhavaṃ manyamānairabādhitaviṣayatvaṃ rūpāntaramucyate /
T11arhebt2u:5349: satyeva hi sādhyadharme bhāvo hetoravinābhāva ucyate /
T11arhebt2u:5351: yadi hi satyeva tasmiṃstadabhāvaviṣayaṃ pramāṇaṃ pravarteta tadāsya bhrāntatvādapramāṇataiva syāt iti kuto bādhā? /
T11arhebt2u:5353: atra ca sādhyadharmaḥ kathaṃ na bhavet”?
T11arhebt2u:5358: tameva virodhaṃ spaṣṭīkartuṃ paropahāsavyājenāha- “pratyakṣānumāne hi” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:5362: niṣkāsyamānaṃ gale gṛhītvā haṭhāt “tatraiva” dharmiṇyavasthāpayatīti “paraṃ” prakṛṣṭaṃ bata “bhāvānāṃ” sādhyadharmalakṣaṇānāmasvāsthyaṃ vartate
T11arhebt2u:5363: tathā hi- yantradvayaniyantritānāṃ nirucchāvasitayā maraṇameva prāptamiti /
T11arhebt2u:5364: paro bādhāvinābhāvayorviṣayabhedādavirodhaṃ darśayannāha- “anyatra” sādhyadharmiṇaṃ parihṛtya dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi sādhyadharmeṇāvinābhāvī heturna punaḥ sādhyadharmiṇyeva /
T11arhebt2u:5365: tataḥ kuto bādhāvinābhāvayorvirodho 'nyatra bādhayā sādhyadharmābhāvasādhanādanyatra ca hetunā tadbhāvasādhanāt /
T11arhebt2u:5366: tathā caivaṃvidhe satyapi avinābhāve bādhāsambhavād abādhitaviṣayatvasya rūpāntarasya sambhava iti /
T11arhebt2u:5370: mudvāhya tasmiṃn” sādhyadharmasādhanaśaktivikalaṃ hetuṃ pariṇāyya sādhyadharmalakṣaṇaṃ “putraṃ mṛgayate?” /
T11arhebt2u:5374: na hy ambhastvasya samudre lavaṇatvenāvinābhāve 'pi tavdyatirikte 'mbhasi lavaṇatayā sādhyatveneṣṭe 'mbhastvabhāve 'pi lavaṇatvasiddhiriti /
T11arhebt2u:5377: yata eva heturanyathāpi sādhyadharmamantareṇāpi dharmiṇi bhavedambhastvādiṣu tathādarśanāt,
T11arhebt2u:5378: sādhyadharmiparihāreṇa cāvinābhāvopagamāt ata eva kāraṇāt pramāṇābhyāmabādhitadharmā dharmītyucyate /
T11arhebt2u:5380: sādhyadharmiṇi hetorviṣayaḥ sādhyadharmo na bādhyate yathāmbhastvasya lavaṇatvam,
T11arhebt2u:5383: tato 'nyatrāvinābhāvamātreṇa sādhyasiddheranabhyupagamāt na yathokto doṣa iti /
T11arhebt2u:5384: siddhāntavādyāha- “tat kim” idānīṃ yadā hetordharmiṇyavinābhāvitānabhyupagamāt sādhyasiddherabhāvāt tatsiddhaye rūpāntaramabādhitaviṣayatvamucyate tadā hetorna kiñcit sāmarthyam /
T11arhebt2u:5386: tathā hyatra kalpanādvayam- bādhakapramāṇavṛttau sādhyābhāvo niyato vā syād? aniyato vā? /
T11arhebt2u:5387: tatra yadi pūrvo vikalpastadā sādhyābhāvo hi bādhakapramāṇasya vṛttau niyataḥ,
T11arhebt2u:5389: tasmād “abādhāyāṃ” bādhakapramāṇavṛttyabhāve tanniyatasya sādhyābhāvasyāpyabhāvāt “sādhyasiddhiḥ” bhavatyeveti vyartha eva heturiti nopanyasanīya eva /
T11arhebt2u:5391: syānmatam- mā bhud bādhakapramāṇavṛttyabhāve hetoḥ sāmarthyam,
T11arhebt2u:5392: yadā tu sādhyasya bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ dharmiṇi vartate tadā hetoḥ sādhyasādhane sāmarthyaṃ bhaviṣyatītyata āha- “bādhāyāmapi” iti /
T11arhebt2u:5393: yadi bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ vartate tadā tena sādhyābhāvasya dharmiṇi sādhanāt punarbrahmaṇāpi
T11arhebt2u:5394: tadbhāvasya kartumaśakyatvāt kimaṅga punaḥ śaṭhena hetuneti kutaḥ sādhanasya hetoḥ sāmarthyam? /
T11arhebt2u:5395: ata eva hi bhavadbhirabādhitaviṣayatvaṃ rūpāntaramucyata iti /
T11arhebt2u:5396: atha bādhakapramāṇavṛttau sādhyābhāvo na niyataḥ tadabhāve 'pi bhāvāditi dvitīyaḥ
T11arhebt2u:5397: pakṣa iṣyate tadāpyabādhāyāḥ sāmarthyaviraha iti darśayannāha- “aniyame” bādhakapramāṇavṛttau
T11arhebt2u:5399: na ca- bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ syāt “sādhyābhāvasya ca sambhavaḥ“- iti “na” sādhyasādhane
T11arhebt2u:5400: “sāmarthyam abādhāyāḥ” satyāmapi tasyāṃ sādhyābhāvasya sambhavāditi tadyogino 'pi hetvābhāsataiveti /
T11arhebt2u:5402: yaduktam “abādhayaiva sādhyasiddhervyartho hetuḥ” iti tatrānyathārthamabādhāyā darśayan hetusāmarthyaṃ pratipādayannāha paraḥ- na bādhāyā abhāvo mamābādhābhimatā /
T11arhebt2u:5405: sā ca tadanupalabdhiḥ puruṣasya śaktivaikalyāt kvacid deśādau bādhāyāḥ sambhave 'pi syāt /
T11arhebt2u:5406: tato bādhānupalabdhimātreṇa sādhyasiddherabhāvāt tatsiddhaye 'vaśyaṃ heturabhidhānīya iti sa hetuprayogasya viṣayastadā hi hetuḥ svasādhyaṃ sādhayan kathamasamarthaḥ syāt? iti /
T11arhebt2u:5407: siddhāntavādyāha- kiṃ nu vai heturbbādhāyā yā upalabdhistasyāḥ vibheti na punarbbādhāyā yena bādhāṃ sambhavantīmapyanādṛtya tadanupalabdhau satyāṃ prayoktavya iṣṭo bhavataḥ /
T11arhebt2u:5408: kadācit paro brūyāt- kiṃ kariṣyati vidyamānāpi bādhā tapasvinī,
T11arhebt2u:5410: tasmāt tata eva hetorbhayaṃ tadabhāve hetuḥ prayoktavya evetyata āha- “sa tarhi” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:5411: evaṃ tarhi paramārthena bādhā kimasti nāstītyetadanapekṣya bādhāyā anupalabdhau satyāṃ prayoktavya iti kākvā pṛcchati /
T11arhebt2u:5412: kadācit paro brūyāt- uktamevaitat kimarthaṃ pṛcchyate?
T11arhebt2u:5415: paro 'navagatābhiprāya āha- “sādhyasiddhyartham” iti bādhakapratyayābhāve pramāṇyasyeṣṭatvāt tataḥ sādhyasiddhiraviruddhaiveti manyate /
T11arhebt2u:5416: siddhāntavādī satyāṃ bādhāyāṃ tadanupalambhe 'pi sādhyasiddhimasambhāvayan pṛcchati “sa kiṃ kvacid” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:5417: kiṃ punarasau hetuḥ satyāmapi bādhāyāṃ sādhyaṃ sādhayediti sambhāvyate bhavatā yenāsyā bādhāyā abhāvaniścayaṃ prati yatno na kriyate hetuśca prayujyata iti /
T11arhebt2u:5419: tathā satyāmapi bādhāyāṃ sādhyasādhanasāmarthopagame satyabādhitaviṣayatvaṃ hetulakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati /
T11arhebt2u:5422: taddhi hetorlakṣaṇamucyate yena vinā sādhyaṃ na sādhayediti /
T11arhebt2u:5426: evaṃ hi sati bādhāyāḥ sadbhāvasambhave 'pi tāmabhyupagamya tadanupalambhamātreṇa hetoḥ prayogaḥ prāptaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:5427: yadi hi bādhāmabhyupagamya hetuprayogo nābhimataḥ syāt tadānupalambhamātreṇa bādhāyaṃ
T11arhebt2u:5428: saṃśayāt- satāmapi keṣāñcit kathañcidanupalambhasambhavāt- saṃśayitasya hetuprayoge
T11arhebt2u:5430: tasmād yo yatsaṃśaye 'pi pravartate sa tasya bhāvapakṣamabhyupetyaiva pravartate /
T11arhebt2u:5431: tathā ca yathā bādhānupalabdhau tāmabhyupagamya hetuḥ prayujyate tathā tadupalabdhāvapi prayujyatām,
T11arhebt2u:5433: hetulakṣaṇaṃ yujyata iti kuto bādhakapratyayavirahe 'pyasati pratibandhe prāmāṇyasya sambhava iti /
T11arhebt2u:5435: naiva hi bādhāyāṃ saṃtyāṃ hetoḥ sāmarthyamiṣyate tat kathaṃ tadupalambhe 'pi prayogaḥ syāt? /
T11arhebt2u:5436: siddhāntavādyāha- “yadyevaṃ” bādhāyāṃ satyāṃ heturasamartho yadīṣyate tadānirṇīto bādhāyā asaṃbhavo yasya hetoḥ sa tathāvidhaḥ prayogaṃ bādhānupalambhamātreṇa nārhati /
T11arhebt2u:5438: mā bhūd bādhāyāḥ sambhavapakṣe “prayuktasyāpi” hetoḥ sādhyasiddhau “asāmarthyamiti” /
T11arhebt2u:5439: pūrvapakṣavādyāha- bādhānupalambhe sati bādhāyā abhāvāt sadupalambhakapratyayābhāve
T11arhebt2u:5440: satyavaśyamarthānāmasattvāddhetoḥ sāmarthyam iti cenmanyase siddhāntavādyāha- “kimupalambho bādhām” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:5452: iti anenaiva nyāyena jñānanivṛttyā bādhānivṛtterityāha- ta- thāpi vyartho hetuḥ /
T11arhebt2u:5457: tathā hi- yatra bādhāyā anupalambhastatra paramārthata eva sā na vidyata iti manyase /
T11arhebt2u:5458: yatra cāsau paramārthato nāsti tatra sādhaydharmasyābhāvo 'pi paramārthenaiva nāstyanyathā paramārthena bādhāyā abhāvāyogāt /
T11arhebt2u:5459: tataśca sādhyadharmasyābhāvābhāve sati bhāva iti bhavanmatyā sādhyapratītervyarthatā hetoriti /
T11arhebt2u:5460: atha mā bhūd yuktivirodha iti nopalambhanivṛttau bādhānivṛttiriṣyate,
T11arhebt2u:5461: tatrāha- upalambhasya nivṛttāvapi satyāṃ bādhāyā anivṛttāviṣyamāṇāyāṃ tadavasthaṃ
T11arhebt2u:5462: hetorasasāmarthyam yadavasthaṃ bādhopalambha iti hetoraprayoga iti kasyābādhitaviṣayatvaṃ rūpāntaraṃ syāt? /
T11arhebt2u:5464: yata evaṃ vyāptyā hetoḥ sarvatra sādhyenāvinābhāvābhyupagame bahirvyāptāviṣyamāṇāyāṃ
T11arhebt2u:5466: 'pyabhavanna'bhāve 'pi ca bhavan heturdharmiṇi kiñcit sādhyaṃ “na bhāvayati” na sādhayati
T11arhebt2u:5467: “na vibhāvayati” tadviparītaṃ na niṣedhayati “iti” tasya vidhipratiṣedhāvakurvata
T11arhebt2u:5473: yata evaṃ tena kāraṇenābādhā rūpāntaraṃ na bhavati /
T11arhebt2u:5475: satyabādhā gamyate rūpāntaraṃ tu kimiti na bhavati?
T11arhebt2u:5478: lakṣaṇakāraiśca rūpāntaratvenopādānamarhati yasya viśeṣaṇasya bhāve 'pi yasyāparasyābhāvaḥ syāt /
T11arhebt2u:5479: yataḥ sambhave vyabhicāre ca viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo na sambhava eva kevale /
T11arhebt2u:5481: satyapi hi dharmisambandhe śrāvaṇatvādeḥ sapakṣe bhāvo nāsti /
T11arhebt2u:5482: satyapi ca cākṣuṣatvādeḥ sapakṣe bhāve sādhyadharmiṇi śabde sambandho nāsti /
T11arhebt2u:5484: ihāpyevaṃ bhaviṣyatīti ced āha- “na caitad” anantaroditamabādhāyā avinābhāve sati sambhavati /
T11arhebt2u:5485: satyavinābhāve niyamenābādhāyāḥ sambhavāvdyabhicārābhāvāt kuto viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo kṣaṇāntaratvena copādānamarhati?
T11arhebt2u:5486: iti na hetoḥ sādhyāvinābhāvino viruddhasya ca sādhyaviparyayāvinābhāvino viṣaye bādhā sambhavati /
T11arhebt2u:5487: uktena prakāreṇa viparyaye samyaggheturevāviṣaye tu prayogāddhetvābhāsa ucyate /
T11arhebt2u:5488: yata evam “iti” tasmānna tadabhāvo bādhāvirahaḥ pṛthagavinābhāvādanvayavyatirekātmano 'nayorhetuviruddhayorlakṣaṇāntaratvena vācyaḥ,
T11arhebt2u:5490: yataścāvinābhāve sati bādhā na sambhavati virodhāt,
T11arhebt2u:5491: tasmāddhetoryathoktalakṣaṇasya prayoge sati gamyārthāyā api pratijñāyā doṣāṇāṃ pratyakṣaviruddhādīnāṃ sambhavo nāsti,
T11arhebt2u:5497: hetuprayoge hyasati kevalā pratijñaiva na prayujyate,
T11arhebt2u:5499: tataśca śāstrakārairna pratijñādoṣāḥ pratyakṣaviruddhādayo vācyā iti /
T11arhebt2u:5501: vipratipattidarśanādaprayogārhasyāpi pakṣasya lakṣaṇavidhāne nyāyaprāptamevāpakṣatva na ni(tvaṃ ni)
T11arhebt2u:5509: paraḥ pṛcchati- “katham” iti kena prakāreṇa- yathā bādhāvinābhāvayoḥ sahānavasthānaṃ tathā pratihetvavinābhāvayorapi?
T11arhebt2u:5516: yatraiva dharmiṇi sa tallakṣaṇa eko bhavati tatraiva dharmiṇi tasmādanyo 'pi pratiheturviruddhastena hetulakṣaṇayuktaḥ kathaṃ bhavati? /
T11arhebt2u:5517: ekasya hetoryat sādhyaṃ tabdādhakasya tadviruddhasyāparasya dharmasya bhāva eva nābhāve
T11arhebt2u:5518: bhāvādavinābhāvāditi bādhayā samānaṃ bādhāsambhavena samānaḥ pratiheturiti tannirāsenaiva nirasta iti /
T11arhebt2u:5520: “vastutaḥ” paramārthato yasya pratiheturna sambhavati kimasau samyagjñānasya viparyasya
T11arhebt2u:5521: vopanyastasādhyaviparītajñānasya vā heturiṣṭo yato vivakṣitaikasaṃkhyatvaṃ tallakṣaṇamucyate,
T11arhebt2u:5522: āhosvid yasya pratihetustatsādhyaviparītasādhako na pradarśitaḥ paramārthataḥ sannapīti /
T11arhebt2u:5524: yadi nāma purvo vikalpa uttaro vā tataḥ ko doṣaḥ? iti /
T11arhebt2u:5529: aśakyo niścayo yasya vastuto 'sambhavatpratihetutvasya sa tathoktaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:5533: sa cānupalabhyamāno 'pi kadācit syāditi vastutastadabhāvo niścīyate /
T11arhebt2u:5535: nahi tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇe pratibandhe pramāṇataḥ siddhe tannimittāvinābhāvitayā
T11arhebt2u:5536: ekena hetunā svasādhye sādhite punastatraiva dharmiṇi tallakṣaṇasya tadviruddhārthasādhakasya
T11arhebt2u:5540: viruddhadharmasādhakasambhave ca tasyaiva svasādhyāvinābhāvinaḥ prathamasya tatra pramāṇato bhāvasiddhayayogāditi /
T11arhebt2u:5541: syānmatam- yadi nāma prastutaḥ pratihetvasambhavo 'smābhirniścetumaśakyastathāpyasambhavatpratihetutvaṃ vivakṣitaikasaṃkhyatvapratipāditaṃ hetulakṣaṇaṃ kasmānna bhavati?
T11arhebt2u:5543: pratipādako yo dharmo hetostasyāniścitasvabhāvasya yasmāt tallakṣaṇatvaṃ pratipādakadharmatā na bhavati /
T11arhebt2u:5545: nāpi sandhigdhaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yasya sa heturbhavatīti na kaściddheturbhavediti hetvabhāvo vā ityasya samarthanam /
T11arhebt2u:5547: syānmatam- yasya pratiyogī dṛśyate tasyaiva pratihetubhāvāt ahetutvaṃ bhavatu,
T11arhebt2u:5548: yasya tu pratiyogī heturna dṛśyate sa vastuta evāsambhavatpratihetuḥ /
T11arhebt2u:5549: na hi tatra vastutaḥ pratihetusambhavaḥ śaṅkayate,
T11arhebt2u:5555: tasmin dṛṣṭaḥ pratiyoginaḥ pratihetorbbādhakasya sambhavaḥ sa yeṣāmapi tattulyalakṣaṇānāṃ
T11arhebt2u:5556: pratiyogī na dṛśyate teṣvapi śaṅkāṃ pratihetusambhavaviṣayāmutpādayati /
T11arhebt2u:5563: atha viśeṣaḥ pratibandhalakṣaṇo 'vinābhāvaniścāyako dṛṣṭapratihetoradṛṣṭapratiyogina iṣyate yataḥ pratiyogisambhavāśaṅkāstamupaiti /
T11arhebt2u:5564: tadā sati vā viśeṣe sa viśeṣo hetorlakṣaṇam /
T11arhebt2u:5566: yatastato viśeṣāddheturekāntena niścayena nirastapratipakṣastathāvidhe dharmiṇi pratihetvasambhavāt svasādhyaṃ niścāyayatīti /
T11arhebt2u:5567: yastathāvidho na bhavati tadviśeṣavirahāt dṛṣṭapratihetuḥ so 'tallakṣaṇo na hetuḥ syāt /
T11arhebt2u:5571: yathoktāvinābhāvavacanenaiva tannivṛtterityāha- “tathā ca hetau” tadviśeṣayogini “pratihetvasambhave” sati “vyarthā” niṣprayojanā “ekasaṃkhyāvivakṣeti”
T11arhebt2u:5572: yathoktaviśeṣāṅgīkarane tallakṣaṇasya pratihetorasambhavāt kasyaikasaṃkhyāvivakṣayā vyavacchedaḥ kriyate?
T11arhebt2u:5575: vastuto 'sambhavatpratihetutvasiddhaye ca pratibandhalakṣaṇe viśeṣe hetāviṣyamāṇe viruddhāvyabhicāryapi hetvābhāso na bhavati /
T11arhebt2u:5577: iti darśayannāha- “ataḥ” pratibandhalakṣaṇaviśeṣopagamāt “viruddhāvyabhicāriṇo hetvābhāsasya yallakṣaṇaṃ taddhīyeta” na sambhavet /
T11arhebt2u:5581: dharmiṇi virodhena parasparaviruddhasādhyasādhakatvenopanipāte sati viruddhāvyabhicārīti viruddhāvyabhicāriṇo lakṣaṇam /
T11arhebt2u:5582: na ca tat pratibandhāṅgīkaraṇe sati sambhavati /
T11arhebt2u:5583: nahi tādātmyatadutpattibhyāṃ svasādhyapratībandhavatyekatra hetau kvaciddharmiṇi saṃbhavati dvitīyastallakṣastatraiva hetuḥ sambhavet,
T11arhebt2u:5586: tadavyabhicāriṇo hetordvitīyasya tatra kutaḥ sambhavāvakāśa iti /
T11arhebt2u:5587: nanu yadi tathavidhāviśeṣasambhave sati viruddhāvyabhicārilakṣaṇaṃ hīyate,
T11arhebt2u:5590: tat kimuktaṃ hetvabhāvo vetyata āha- “na ca” naiva “tasya” viśeṣasya pratibandhalakṣaṇasya,
T11arhebt2u:5592: “svarūpaṃ” tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇaṃ nirddiśyate bhavadbhiḥ yathāsmābhirnirdiṣṭaṃ yadrūpaṃ “pratītya” pratipadya pratiyoginaḥ ambhavāsambhavāvutpaśyāmaḥ
T11arhebt2u:5593: yatra sa viśeṣo nāsti tatra pratiyoginaḥ sambhavaḥ kalpita āgamāśraye 'numāne /
T11arhebt2u:5594: yatra tvasti sa viśeṣo vastubalapravṛtte 'numāne tatra pratiyogino 'sambhava iti /
T11arhebt2u:5595: yata evaṃ tasmānnāstyeva bhavatāṃ sa viśeṣaḥ- bhavadbhirna jñāyata eva sa viśeṣa iti /
T11arhebt2u:5596: tasmāt sarvatra yatrāpi pratiyogī na dṛśyate tatrāpi śaṅkayā pratiyogiviṣayayā bhavitavyam /
T11arhebt2u:5598: yasyāpi hi pratiheturdṛṣṭasyāpi prāk praityogidarśanāditareṇa sarvakālamadṛṣṭapratiyoginā na kaścid viśeṣo lakṣyate yaddarśanājjñāyeta '
T11arhebt2u:5601: tathāpi paścāttatra pratiyogī dṛṣṭa iti sarvatra tattulyalakṣaṇe pratiyogisadbhāvaśaṅkā na nivartata iti /
T11arhebt2u:5602: syānmatam- yeṣu pratiyogī sambhavati teṣvaśyameva kadācidasāvupalabhyate /
T11arhebt2u:5603: yeṣu tu puruṣāyuṣeṇāpi nopalabhyate teṣvasau nāstyeva /
T11arhebt2u:5607: yeṣāmapi hi pratihetuḥ sambhavati teṣāmapi naiva sarvadā tasya pratihetorūpalabdhiḥ pratipattṝṇām /
T11arhebt2u:5611: pratiyogī na dṛśyate tatra tadāśaṅkākathaṃ kriyate? / tathā cāha-
T11arhebt2u:5615: sa sarvavyavahāreṣu saṃśayātmā kṣayaṃ vrajet //” iti /
T11arhebt2u:5617: tathā hi kasyacideva pramātuḥ kuśāgrīyamateratiśayavatī prajñā pratihetūtprekṣiṇī
T11arhebt2u:5619: tenaiva prajñātiśayaśālinā pratihetava utprekṣitāḥ tatastaddarśanāt yāvajjīvaṃ adṛṣṭapratihetuṣvapi tadāśaṅkā na nivartate /
T11arhebt2u:5628: yata evaṃ sarvatra pratiyogyāśaṅkā na nivartate bhavaddarśane tena kāraṇenāniścayaḥ pratiyoginaḥ sambhavāsambhavayoḥ '
T11arhebt2u:5629: iha pratiyogī sambhavati iha tu na sambhavati';
T11arhebt2u:5635: iti amuṃ vikalpaṃ nirākṛtya dvitīyaṃ vikalpaṃ nirācikīrṣurāha- “athāpradarśitapratihetuḥ” samyagjñānaviparyaheturiṣṭa iti sambandhaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:5636: ayaṃ ca pakṣaḥ kila diṅnāgācāryasyāpyabhimata iti para upadarśayannāha- “yathāha diṅnāgācāryaḥ” /
T11arhebt2u:5638: “śrāvaṇatvasya hi na kathañcivdyavacchedahetutvam” iti diṅnāgācāryeṇokte pareṇābhihitam-
T11arhebt2u:5639: “yadā tarhi vaiyākaraṇaḥ śabdatvaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣaṃ nityamabhyupagacchati tadāyaṃ śrāvaṇatvalakṣaṇaḥ
T11arhebt2u:5641: nityaḥ śabdaḥ śrāvaṇatvāt śabdatvavat” ityevaṃ pareṇokte satyācāryeṇoktam- “yadyatra
T11arhebt2u:5644: tadevāmācāryapādaiḥ sākṣitve datte bhujamutkṣipya śāstrakāraḥ pūtkurvannāha- “idamidānīm” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:5645: yadā hyācāryasyāpyetadabhimatamiti kaiścivdyākhyāyate tadidaṃ sumahavdyasanamāyātam- gurubhirabhihitatvādaprakāśyam,
T11arhebt2u:5648: tat kiṃ gurūn dūṣayāma uta nyāyamapyupekṣāmahe ityubhayamapyaśakyamiti “kaṣṭataraṃ vyasanaṃ kathaṃ nirvoḍhuṃ śakyeta?” /
T11arhebt2u:5650: kaḥ punaratra doṣo yenedaṃ kaṣṭataramityāha- “sa tāvadayaṃ” śrāvaṇatvalakṣaṇo “heturvastūni”
T11arhebt2u:5651: śabdādīni svasādhyaṃ tattvaṃ nityatvaṃ “tatprakṛtīni” tadātmakāni “kṛtvā” tacchrāvaṇatvaṃ
T11arhebt2u:5654: tathā hi- vastutattvaṃ bhāvayan yāvat kleśānn prajahāti tāvat svargamāsādayati,
T11arhebt2u:5656: athāvā śabdanityatvapratītau vedaprāmāṇyāt tadvihitāgnihotrānuṣṭhānāt svargo vedāntaniṣevaṇādaparvaggaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:5661: tāṃśca tatpramāṇakān puruṣān svargāpavargasampadaḥ pracyāvya śrāvaṇatvalakṣaṇo hetuḥ
T11arhebt2u:5662: śaktivaikalyāt paritrātumaśakto bhraṣṭarājya ieva rājā tapovanaṃ gacchati svaireva
T11arhebt2u:5665: yada hyapradarśitapratiheturheturheturiṣyate tadā puruṣapratibhākṛtaṃ sādhanatvamabhyupagataṃ bhavati /
T11arhebt2u:5666: tataśca vastuto na kiñcit sādhanamasādhanaṃ vā prāptam /
T11arhebt2u:5667: tathā hi- yadā pratiheturnopadarśyate tadā sādhanam,
T11arhebt2u:5668: yadā tūpadarśyate tadā na sādhanamiti puruṣapratibhākṛtaṃ sādhanatvamāyātamiti /
T11arhebt2u:5669: api ca- apradarśitapratihetorhetorhetutve 'ṅgikriyamāṇe vikalpadvayam- kiṃ paramārthato hetustaddharmabhāvī,
T11arhebt2u:5671: tatrādyaṃ vikalpamadhikṛtyāha- “sa ca” heturyo 'sau prathamaṃ upādīyate /
T11arhebt2u:5672: sa “yadi svabhāvata” eva “tasmin” sādhyadharme “satyeva bhavati” ityevaṃśīlo 'smadupavarṇitapratibandhopagamāt
T11arhebt2u:5673: yadīṣyate “tadā kathamanyathā kriyeta” hetvantareṇātaddharmabhāvī kathaṃ kriyeta? /
T11arhebt2u:5677: satyameva sādhyadharme bhavanātmakaḥ'- “tadanyathābhāvasya” tadviparyayasya “abhāvād” ubhayośca svasādhyadharmāvinābhāvitve (Hbṭ 220)
T11arhebt2u:5678: svabhāvata eva dharmiṇyekatra tayorbhāve viruddhāvubhau svabhāvāvekasya syātām /
T11arhebt2u:5681: atha dvitīyo vikalpastadā “ataddharmabhāvī ca” asatyapi sādhyadharme bhavanaśīlaḥ pratibandhānabhyupagamāt “kathamanyadāpi” apradarśitapratihetvavasthāyāmapi “sādhanaṃ” kasyacit? /
T11arhebt2u:5685: yata evaṃ bhāvānāṃ svabhāvo 'nyathā kartuṃ na śakyate,
T11arhebt2u:5686: viruddhobhayasvabhāvaścaiko na sambhavati tasmāt paramārthataḥ svena svena sādhyenāvinābhāvinoryathoktalakṣaṇayoḥ
T11arhebt2u:5692: sa ca pratihetuḥ svalakṣaṇayuktayoḥ kāryasvabhāvayorna bhavatyeveti kathaṃ taddhetulakṣaṇaṃ syāditi /
T11arhebt2u:5693: tadevamanayordvayo rūpayoryaḥ sambhavo yathoktāvinābhāvāsambhave satīti rūpāntaropagame 'pi hetvābhāsataiveti “hetvābhāsāstato 'pare iti” ityasyārtho vivṛta iti /
T11arhebt2u:5695: avādhitaviṣayatvaṃ vivakṣitaikasaṃkhyatvaṃ ca kārya- svabhāvahetvorevāvinābhāve sati
T11arhebt2u:5696: bādhāpratihetvorasambhavāt vyavacchedyābhāvatvena satyapi liṅgadharmatve tallakṣaṇaṃ na bhavatītyuktam /
T11arhebt2u:5702: na ca tat liṅgasyātmarūpamiti kathaṃ liṅgalakṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati? /
T11arhebt2u:5703: yadyapi vikalpapratibhāsī sāmānyākāro liṅgatayāvasthāpyate tathāpi na jñānasya liṅgadharmatā /
T11arhebt2u:5709: tvanusmaranto vikalpā nānaikavyatirekān saṃdarśayanto vastuni paramparayā pratibandhādavisaṃvādakāḥ
T11arhebt2u:5715: yasmādabādhyasyāpi bāhyatayā vyavasitasyānanuyāyino 'pyanuyāyitayā sāmānyātmakatvaṃ tathātve cāsya vikalparūpatā kutaḥ? yadāha-
T11arhebt2u:5720: kimātmakāt “hetoranumeyo 'rtho jñātavyaḥ iti cintāyāṃ” prakṛtāyāṃ “pratipattuḥ” puṃso
T11arhebt2u:5721: yadavisaṃvādakaṃ liṅgaṃ tasya svarūpamabhidhīyate śāstrakāraiḥ yasya rūpasya darśanādayaṃ pratipattā '
T11arhebt2u:5723: iti pravibhāgena vyavasthāpya yattatra sādhanatvena vyavasthāpitaṃ tasyeṣṭārthasannidhānasampratyayāt pravṛttimavalambate /
T11arhebt2u:5724: tathā, etasmiṃśca nyāye vyavasthite yadasya liṅgasyātmarūpaṃ tallakṣaṇaṃ bhavitumarhati pakṣadharmādivat na tu yat pararūpam /
T11arhebt2u:5725: syādetat- jñātasya liṅgasya sādhakatvād yuktaiva sādhyasiddhyupayogino jñānasya liṅgalakṣaṇatetyata āha- “pratipattijanmani” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:5726: yadyanumeyapratītijanmanyupayujyate jñānamiti tanmātreṇa liṅgasya lakṣaṇamiṣyate tadātiprasaṅgaḥ prāpnoti /
T11arhebt2u:5729: atra kāraṇamāha- “nahi teṣvapi” prameyādiṣu asatsu liṅgini jñānaṃ bhavatīti kṛtvā /
T11arhebt2u:5731: yadi pararūpatvājjñānaṃ liṅgalakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati tadā ca yadetadācāryeṇa-
T11arhebt2u:5735: tathā hi- niścayo hi liṅgasya pararūpameva /
T11arhebt2u:5737: jñānaṃ kimiti neṣyate yato niścayo vijñānameva tadviśeṣatvādasyeti /
T11arhebt2u:5738: siddhāntavādyāha- “na na kartavyaṃ” kintu kartavyameva tasya niścitagrahaṇasya liṅgarūpapratipādanyārthatvāt /
T11arhebt2u:5740: pare hi sapakṣe darśanamātreṇāsapakṣe cādarśanamātrato gamakaṃ hetumicchanti /
T11arhebt2u:5741: teṣāṃ naiva darśanamātreṇa sādhyasiddhau samartho heturbhavatīti jñāpanārthaṃ niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam /
T11arhebt2u:5744: yata evaṃ tena kāraṇena sapakṣe bhāvena vipakṣe sarvatrābhāvaviśiṣṭenāsapakṣe ca
T11arhebt2u:5747: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yāveva sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ bhāvābhāvau pratibandhasādhakapramāṇavṛttyā niścitau tābhyāmeva heturgamako bhavati,
T11arhebt2u:5748: na tu yathākathañciddarśanamātreṇetyasyārthasya jñāpanāya niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtamiti /
T11arhebt2u:5753: tena pararūpaṃ liṅgasya lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati /
T11arhebt2u:5754: yataḥ tena jñānādinā pararūpeṇa liṅgasya na kaścid rūpaviśeṣo 'bhidhīyata iti /
T11arhebt2u:5756: nanu ca pare 'pi sapakṣavipakṣayorbhāvābhāvābhyāṃ gamakaṃ hetumicchanti,
T11arhebt2u:5760: yadyapi pare bhāvābhāvābhyāmeva gamakaṃ hetumicchanti tathāpi sapakṣa eva bhāvo 'sapakṣe cābhāva eveti bhāvābhāvau darśanādarśanamātrato vyavasthāpayanti
