T11arhebt2u:5763: tasmād yau 'hetoḥ sapakṣe eva bhāvo 'sapakṣe cābhāva eva';
T11arhebt2u:5764: ityevamātmakau bhāvābhāvau tau tadbhāvasya sādhakaṃ yat pramāṇaṃ tādātmyatadutpattisādhanaviṣayaṃ taddhṛttyā voddhavyau /
T11arhebt2u:5766: tadanabhyupagame hi hetoḥ sapakṣa eva bhāvaḥ sarveṣāṃ hetumatāṃ bhāvānāṃ sādhyenānugamadarśane
T11arhebt2u:5767: sati vipakṣe cābhāva eva sādhyavikalānāṃ sarvārthānāṃ hetuviviktānāṃ upalambhe sati syāt /
T11arhebt2u:5769: yata upāyāntaraṃ nāsti tena kāraṇena tayorviśiṣṭayorbhāvābhāvayoḥ pratipādanāya niścitaśabdaḥ prayukto lakṣaṇe lakṣaṇakāreṇeti /
T11arhebt2u:5770: nanu ca bhāvābhāvavacanamātrādeva pramāṇato niścayo labhyate anyathā tayoreva sattā na prasidhyediti,
T11arhebt2u:5773: ityanenaiva sapakṣāsapakṣayoḥ bhāvābhāvavacanamātreṇā niścitagrahaṇanirapekṣeṇa tayorbhāvābhāvayoryat sādhanaṃ pramāṇaṃ tasya vṛttiryadyapyākṣipyate
T11arhebt2u:5776: tadā “tayoreva” sapakṣavipakṣayoreva bhāvābhāvayoryā sattā svarūpavyavasthā tasyā “aprasiddheḥ” /
T11arhebt2u:5778: ityāha- “jñānasya” upalabdheryā sattā utpattiḥ tannibandhanatvājjñeyasya bhāvābhāvalakṣaṇasya sattāvyavasthāyāḥ svarūpavyavasthiteḥ /
T11arhebt2u:5782: yata evaṃ tasmāt sarvatra śāstre loke vā jñeyasattāvyavasthaiva niścitagrahaṇaṃ vināpi “tatsādhanaṃ” tatsattāsādhanaṃ pramāṇam “ākarṣati” ākṣipatīti
T11arhebt2u:5783: kiñca, parārthatvācca śāstrapraṇayanasya tatsādhanapramāṇavṛttirākṣipyate iti sambandhaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:5784: kīdṛśaṃ punastacchāstrapraṇayanaṃ yat parārtharūpatayā svavyavasthāpitajñeyasattāsādhanaṃ pramāṇamākṣipati?
T11arhebt2u:5785: ityāha- ” trirūpaṃ liṅgaṃ vaḥ saṃvādakaṃ prāpakaṃ” vāñchitasyārthasyeti /
T11arhebt2u:5786: yadi nāmaivaṃrūpaṃ parārthaṃ śāstrapraṇayanaṃ tathāpi kathaṃ tat sādhanapramāṇavṛttimākṣipatītyāha-
T11arhebt2u:5787: “tadrūpaṃ” tasya liṅgasya trirūpasya rūpaṃ svabhāvaṃ śāstroktaṃ ye pratipattāro na vidanti,
T11arhebt2u:5790: yata evam “iti” tasmāt paropalakṣaṇatvādeva pareṣāṃ jñāpakatvādeva pravartake trirūpaliṅge
T11arhebt2u:5791: jñānaṃ siddhamiti yadyapi niścitagrahaṇamatiricyate tathāpi tāveva liṅgasya sapakṣāsapakṣayorbhāvābhāvau
T11arhebt2u:5795: pare darśanādarśanamātreṇa- ye darśanādarśane pratibandhasādhake na bhavataḥ- tanmātreṇa
T11arhebt2u:5796: vyavasthāpayanti “yata eva iti” tasmātteṣāṃ vādināṃ niṣedhārtho 'yaṃ lakṣaṇe niścitaśabdaḥ
T11arhebt2u:5798: yadi tu paravipratipattiḥ na syāt tadā naivāsau prayujyeteti /
T11arhebt2u:5799: kimiti punarddarśanādarśanābhyāṃ bhāvābhāvaviṣayābhyāṃ sapakṣā [sa]pakṣayoḥ viśiṣṭau bhāvābhāvāvanvayavyatirekātmakau neṣyete ityāha- “satorapi” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:5800: satyapi kvacit sapakṣe bhāvadarśane hetoḥ kvaciccāsapakṣe 'bhāvadarśane 'sa śyāmaḥ,
T11arhebt2u:5803: tathā hi- anvayo nāma sarvatra satyeva sādhye hetorbhāvo (Hbṭ 225)
T11arhebt2u:5805: na ca kvacit sati sādhye hetorbhāvadarśane 'pi tanmātreṇa tathābhāvaḥ sarvatra bhavati,
T11arhebt2u:5807: tathā kvacit sādhyābhimatasyābhāve satyabhāvadarśane 'pi hetoḥ sarvatra tadabhāve 'vaśyamabhāvaḥ,
T11arhebt2u:5810: sidhyataḥ nānyatheti vipratipattinirāsārthameva niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtamityupadarśayannāha- “tasmāt” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:5813: asatyāṃ tu vipratipattau tanna kartavyameveti pratipādya ata eva nyāyāt jñātatvaṃ rūpāntaraṃ na bhavatīti darśayannāha- “yato 'pi“ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:5817: yathā pakṣadharmatvavacanenaiva hetorupanayasyārtho 'vagatastasya dharmiṇi hetoḥ sadbhāvapradarśanātmakatvāt,
T11arhebt2u:5818: pakṣadharmavacanasya ca tadrūpatvāt tataḥ pṛthagupanayo rūpāntaraṃ na bhavati;
T11arhebt2u:5822: yadi trairūpyavacanenaiva sāmarthyājjñānaṃ labhyata iti tat tataḥ pṛthag na vaktavyam “hantaḥ” tarhi anvayāt pṛthag vyatireko na vaktavyaḥ vyatirekācca pṛthaganvayaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:5826: tathā jñātatvasyāpi trairūpyād gamyamānasyāpi pṛthagvacanaṃ kartavyamiti /
T11arhebt2u:5833: na ca tau parasparamākṣipataḥ parasparamantarbhavato vidhipratiṣedharūpayorbhinnasvabhāvatvāt /
T11arhebt2u:5834: na ca yo yato bhinnasvabhāvaḥ sa tatrāntarbhūto yukto /
T11arhebt2u:5835: nanu ca yadyanvayavyatirekayorbhinnarūpatā kathaṃ tarhi trirūpaṃ liṅgamucyate? /
T11arhebt2u:5839: yato yathānvayavyatirekau vyavasthāpyete na vā nayo (pyete tathā tayo)
T11arhebt2u:5844: vyāvṛttibhede 'pi ca paramārthato bhedo nāstītyekaṃ liṅgaṃ trirūpamityucyate iti /
T11arhebt2u:5849: anvayamukhena vyatirekamukheṇa vā prayuktamekaṃ vākyamubhayamanvayaṃ vyatirekaṃ ca bhinnalakṣaṇameva gamayatītyucyate 'smabhirnaiko 'rthaḥ svabhāvo
T11arhebt2u:5851: atra para āha- “na tu tatraiva” ityādi /
T11arhebt2u:5861: tataścaikenaiva sapakṣāsapakṣayorbhāvābhāvapratipādakena prativiśiṣṭena lakṣaṇavākyenobhayagaterdvitīyavacanaṃ na kartavyamiti /
T11arhebt2u:5881: vaidharmyaprayoge ca sādharmyavacanamiti na punarekābhidhānenānavagatasya rūpāntarasya pratipādanārtham /
T11arhebt2u:5882: na ca tathā trairūpyavacanena jñānanibandhanena jñeyasattāvyavasthāyāḥ propalakṣaṇārthena
T11arhebt2u:5884: punarvacane na kiñcit prayojanamastīti nāsya pṛthagvacanaṃ yuktamiti /
T11arhebt2u:5886: tata evaivakavākyārthāntarbhāvādityata āha- “na punaḥ kevalau” ekavākyārthānapekṣau
T11arhebt2u:5890: tayoḥ parasparākṣepe kevalayorapi tatprasaṅga ityata āha- “niyamavantau ca” sāvadhāraṇavākyapratipāditau “na kevalau” kintu sahitāveva /
T11arhebt2u:5893: tadevaṃ sāvadhāraṇena vākyena naiva kevalo 'nvayo vyatireko vābhidhīyate /
T11arhebt2u:5894: tadantarbhāvāttu dvitīyagatiḥ kintu parasparāntarbhūtāveva sahitāvekena vākyenābhidhīyete iti pratipādyopasaṃharannāha- “tasmāt” tatraiva sapakṣa eva bhāva (Hbṭ 228)
T11arhebt2u:5895: ityanena vākyena na sapakṣe bhāva evocyate /
T11arhebt2u:5898: tathā cetareṇāpyasapakṣe 'bhāva eveti vacanena nābhāva eva kevala ucyate kintu sapakṣe bhāvo 'pi,
T11arhebt2u:5899: yena kevalavacanena bhāvo 'bhāvo vā tadātmakatayā dvitīyamākṣiped yato 'nayoḥ pṛthagvacanaṃ na syāt /
T11arhebt2u:5900: tasmād yadānvayavyatirekau bhavābhāvāvabhipretau tadā tau bhinnarūpāveveti kathaṃ tayoḥ na pṛthaktvam? /
T11arhebt2u:5901: atha niyamavatā vākyenābhihitau tadaikavākyādevobhayagateḥ pṛthagvacanaṃ na kartavyameva /
T11arhebt2u:5903: syānmatam- yathānvayavyatirekau bhāvābhāvalakṣaṇau na parasparātmakau tataśca tayoḥ parasparato rūpāntaratvam,
T11arhebt2u:5904: evaṃ paropalakṣaṇaśāstrapratipāditāt trailakṣaṇyād bhidyata eva jñānam,
T11arhebt2u:5911: trairūpyaviṣayāṃ pratītiṃ kāryante yena śāstreṇa tato yat trailakṣaṇyaṃ pratīyate āgṛhītajñānaṃ tasmādavyatirekādāgṛhītajñāne trailakṣaṇye 'ntarbhāvāditi
T11arhebt2u:5913: tadayamatra samudāyārthaḥ- yadi jñātatvaṃ jñānaśabdapravṛttinimittaṃ uktena prakāreṇa jñānamevocyate tadā talliṃgasyānātmabhūtamiti na tallakṣaṇam
T11arhebt2u:5914: athāvi(pi) jñānāpekṣaḥ karmabhāvo jñātatvamucyate tadāpi jñeyasattāvyavasthāyā jñānasattānibandhanatvāt trairūpyavyavasthaiva tatsattāvyavasthāpakaṃ jñānamākṣipati /
T11arhebt2u:5915: tatastadapekṣo 'pi karmabhāvo 'nuktasiddha iti na tadvacanaṃ pṛthakkartavyam /
T11arhebt2u:5917: tadevamabādhitaviṣayatvādikaṃ rūpatrayaṃ nirākṛtya nigamayannāha- “tasmānna hetuḥ ṣaḍlakṣaṇaḥ /
T11arhebt2u:5926: mā yatata imā yā tadrūpā vala (?)
